yad acchinat  BrP rājño bāhusahasrasya haimaṃ tālavanaṃ yathā tṛṣitena kadācit sa bhikṣitaś citrabhānunā  BrP sa bhikṣām adadād vīraḥ sapta dvīpān vibhāvasoḥ purāṇi grāmaghoṣāṃś ca viṣayāṃś caiva sarvaśaḥ  BrP jajvāla tasya sarvāṇi citrabhānur didhṛkṣayā sa tasya puruṣendrasya prabhāveṇa mahātmanaḥ  BrP dadāha kārtavīryasya śailāṃś caiṣa vanāni ca sa śūnyam āśramaṃ ramyaṃ varuṇasyātmajasya vai  BrP dadāha balavadbhītaś citrabhānuḥ sa haihayaḥ yaṃ lebhe varuṇaḥ putraṃ purā bhāsvantam uttamam  BrP vasiṣṭhaṃ nāma sa muniḥ khyāta āpava ity uta yatrāpavas tu taṃ krodhāc chaptavān arjunaṃ vibhuḥ  BrP yasmān na varjitam idaṃ vanaṃ te mama haihaya tasmāt te duṣkaraṃ karma kṛtam anyo haniṣyati  BrP rāmo nāma mahābāhur jāmadagnyaḥ pratāpavān chittvā bāhusahasraṃ te pramathya tarasā balī  BrP tapasvī brāhmaṇas tvāṃ tu haniṣyati sa bhārgavaḥ anaṣṭadravyatā yasya babhūvāmitrakarṣiṇaḥ  BrP pratāpena narendrasya prajā dharmeṇa rakṣataḥ prāptas tato sya mṛtyur vai tasya śāpān mahāmuneḥ  BrP varas tathaiva bho viprāḥ svayam eva vṛtaḥ purā tasya putraśataṃ tv āsīt pañca śeṣā mahātmanaḥ  BrP kṛtāstrā balinaḥ śūrā dharmātmāno yaśasvinaḥ śūrasenaś ca śūraś ca vṛṣaṇo madhupadhvajaḥ  BrP jayadhvajaś ca nāmnāsīd āvantyo nṛpatir mahān kārtavīryasya tanayā vīryavanto mahābalāḥ  BrP jayadhvajasya putras tu tālajaṅgho mahābalaḥ tasya putraśataṃ khyātās tālajaṅghā iti smṛtāḥ  BrP teṣāṃ kule muniśreṣṭhā haihayānāṃ mahātmanām vītihotrāḥ sujātāś ca bhojāś cāvantayaḥ smṛtāḥ  BrP tauṇḍikerāś ca vikhyātās tālajaṅghās tathaiva ca bharatāś ca sujātāś ca bahutvān nānukīrtitāḥ  BrP vṛṣaprabhṛtayo viprā yādavāḥ puṇyakarmiṇaḥ vṛṣo vaṃśadharas tatra tasya putro bhavan madhuḥ  BrP madhoḥ putraśataṃ tv āsīd vṛṣaṇas tasya vaṃśakṛt vṛṣaṇād vṛṣṇayaḥ sarve madhos tu mādhavāḥ smṛtāḥ  BrP yādavā yadunāmnā te nirucyante ca haihayāḥ na tasya vittanāśaḥ syān naṣṭaṃ prati labhec ca saḥ  BrP kārtavīryasya yo janma kathayed iha nityaśaḥ ete yayātiputrāṇāṃ pañca vaṃśā dvijottamāḥ  BrP kīrtitā lokavīrāṇāṃ ye lokān dhārayanti vai bhūtānīva muniśreṣṭhāḥ pañca sthāvarajaṅgamān  BrP śrutvā pañca visargāṃs tu rājā dharmārthakovidaḥ vaśī bhavati pañcānām ātmajānāṃ tatheśvaraḥ  BrP labhet pañca varāṃś caiva durlabhān iha laukikān āyuḥ kīrtiṃ tathā putrān aiśvaryaṃ bhūtim eva ca  BrP dhāraṇāc chravaṇāc caiva pañcavargasya bho dvijāḥ kroṣṭor vaṃśaṃ muniśreṣṭhāḥ śṛṇudhvaṃ gadato mama  BrP yador vaṃśadharasyātha yajvinaḥ puṇyakarmiṇaḥ kroṣṭor vaṃśaṃ hi śrutvaiva sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate yasyānvavāyajo viṣṇur harir vṛṣṇikulodvahaḥ  BrP lomaharṣaṇa uvāca gāndhārī caiva mādrī ca kroṣṭor bhārye babhūvatuḥ gāndhārī janayām āsa anamitraṃ mahābalam  BrP mādrī yudhājitaṃ putraṃ tato nyaṃ devamīḍhuṣam teṣāṃ vaṃśas tridhā bhūto vṛṣṇīnāṃ kulavardhanaḥ  BrP mādryāḥ putrau tu jajñāte śrutau vṛṣṇyandhakāv ubhau jajñāte tanayau vṛṣṇeḥ śvaphalkaś citrakas tathā  BrP śvaphalkas tu muniśreṣṭhā dharmātmā yatra vartate nāsti vyādhibhayaṃ tatra nāvarṣas tapam eva ca  BrP kadācit kāśirājasya viṣaye munisattamāḥ trīṇi varṣāṇi pūrṇāni nāvarṣat pākaśāsanaḥ  BrP sa tatra cānayām āsa śvaphalkaṃ paramārcitam śvaphalkaparivartena vavarṣa harivāhanaḥ  BrP śvaphalkaḥ kāśirājasya sutāṃ bhāryām avindata gāndinīṃ nāma gāṃ sā ca dadau viprāya nityaśaḥ  BrP dātā yajvā ca vīraś ca śrutavān atithipriyaḥ akrūraḥ suṣuve tasmāc chvaphalkād bhūridakṣiṇaḥ  BrP upamadgus tathā madgur meduraś cārimejayaḥ avikṣitas tathākṣepaḥ śatrughnaś cārimardanaḥ  BrP dharmadhṛg yatidharmā ca dharmokṣāndhakarus tathā āvāhaprativāhau ca sundarī ca varāṅganā  BrP akrūreṇograsenāyāṃ sugātryāṃ dvijasattamāḥ prasenaś copadevaś ca jajñāte devavarcasau  BrP citrakasyābhavan putrāḥ pṛthur vipṛthur eva ca aśvagrīvo śvabāhuś ca svapārśvakagaveṣaṇau  BrP ariṣṭanemir aśvaś ca sudharmā dharmabhṛt tathā subāhur bahubāhuś ca śraviṣṭhāśravaṇe striyau  BrP asiknyāṃ janayām āsa śūraṃ vai devamīḍhuṣam mahiṣyāṃ jajñire śūrā bhojyāyāṃ puruṣā daśa  BrP vasudevo mahābāhuḥ pūrvam ānakadundubhiḥ jajñe yasya prasūtasya dundubhyaḥ prāṇadan divi  BrP ānakānāṃ ca saṃhrādaḥ sumahān abhavad divi papāta puṣpavarṣaś ca śūrasya janane mahān  BrP manuṣyaloke kṛtsne pi rūpe nāsti samo bhuvi yasyāsīt puruṣāgryasya kāntiś candramaso yathā  BrP devabhāgas tato jajñe tathā devaśravāḥ punaḥ anādhṛṣṭiḥ kanavako vatsavān atha gṛñjamaḥ  BrP śyāmaḥ śamīko gaṇḍūṣaḥ pañca cāsya varāṅganāḥ pṛthukīrtiḥ pṛthā caiva śrutadevā śrutaśravā  BrP rājādhidevī ca tathā pañcaitā vīramātaraḥ śrutaśravāyāṃ caidyas tu śiśupālo bhavan nṛpaḥ  BrP hiraṇyakaśipur yo sau daityarājo bhavat purā pṛthukīrtyāṃ tu saṃjajñe tanayo vṛddhaśarmaṇaḥ  BrP karūṣādhipatir vīro dantavakro mahābalaḥ pṛthāṃ duhitaraṃ cakre kuntis tāṃ pāṇḍur āvahat  BrP yasyāṃ sa dharmavid rājā dharmo jajñe yudhiṣṭhiraḥ bhīmasenas tathā vātād indrāc caiva dhanaṃjayaḥ  BrP loke pratiratho vīraḥ śakratulyaparākramaḥ anamitrāc chanir jajñe kaniṣṭhād vṛṣṇinandanāt  BrP śaineyaḥ satyakas tasmād yuyudhānaś ca sātyakiḥ uddhavo devabhāgasya mahābhāgaḥ suto bhavat  BrP paṇḍitānāṃ paraṃ prāhur devaśravasam uttamam aśmakyaṃ prāptavān putram anādhṛṣṭir yaśasvinam  BrP nivṛttaśatruṃ śatrughnaṃ śrutadevā tv ajāyata śrutadevātmajās te tu naiṣādir yaḥ pariśrutaḥ  BrP ekalavyo muniśreṣṭhā niṣādaiḥ parivardhitaḥ vatsavate tv aputrāya vasudevaḥ pratāpavān adbhir dadau sutaṃ vīraṃ śauriḥ kauśikam aurasam  BrP gaṇḍūṣāya hy aputrāya viṣvakseno dadau sutān cārudeṣṇaṃ sudeṣṇaṃ ca pañcālaṃ kṛtalakṣaṇam  BrP asaṃgrāmeṇa yo vīro nāvartata kadācana raukmiṇeyo mahābāhuḥ kanīyān dvijasattamāḥ  BrP vāyasānāṃ sahasrāṇi yaṃ yāntaṃ pṛṣṭhato nvayuḥ cārūn adyopabhokṣyāmaś cārudeṣṇahatān iti  BrP tantrijas tantripālaś ca sutau kanavakasya tau vīruś cāśvahanuś caiva vīrau tāv atha gṛñjimau  BrP śyāmaputraḥ śamīkas tu śamīko rājyam āvahat jugupsamāno bhojatvād rājasūyam avāpa saḥ  BrP ajātaśatruḥ śatrūṇāṃ jajñe tasya vināśanaḥ vasudevasutān vīrān kīrtayiṣyāmy ataḥ param  BrP vṛṣṇes trividham evaṃ tu bahuśākhaṃ mahaujasam dhārayan vipulaṃ vaṃśaṃ nānarthair iha yujyate  BrP yāḥ patnyo vasudevasya caturdaśa varāṅganāḥ pauravī rohiṇī nāma madirāditathāvarā  BrP vaiśākhī ca tathā bhadrā sunāmnī caiva pañcamī sahadevā śāntidevā śrīdevī devarakṣitā  BrP vṛkadevy upadevī ca devakī caiva saptamī sutanur vaḍavā caiva dve ete paricārike  BrP pauravī rohiṇī nāma bāhlikasyātmajābhavat jyeṣṭhā patnī muniśreṣṭhā dayitānakadundubheḥ  BrP lebhe jyeṣṭhaṃ sutaṃ rāmaṃ śaraṇyaṃ śaṭham eva ca durdamaṃ damanaṃ śubhraṃ piṇḍārakam uśīnaram  BrP citrā nāma kumārī ca rohiṇītanayā nava citrā subhadreti punar vikhyātā munisattamāḥ  BrP vasudevāc ca devakyāṃ jajñe śaurir mahāyaśāḥ rāmāc ca niśaṭho jajñe revatyāṃ dayitaḥ sutaḥ  BrP subhadrāyāṃ rathī pārthād abhimanyur ajāyata akrūrāt kāśikanyāyāṃ satyaketur ajāyata  BrP vasudevasya bhāryāsu mahābhāgāsu saptasu ye putrā jajñire śūrāḥ samastāṃs tān nibodhata  BrP bhojaś ca vijayaś caiva śāntidevāsutāv ubhau vṛkadevaḥ sunāmāyāṃ gadaś cāstāṃ sutāv ubhau  BrP agāvahaṃ mahātmānaṃ vṛkadevī vyajāyata kanyā trigartarājasya bhāryā vai śiśirāyaṇeḥ  BrP jijñāsāṃ pauruṣe cakre na caskande ca pauruṣam kṛṣṇāyasasamaprakhyo varṣe dvādaśame tathā  BrP mithyābhiśasto gārgyas tu manyunātisamīritaḥ ghoṣakanyām upādāya maithunāyopacakrame  BrP gopālī cāpsarās tasya gopastrīveṣadhāriṇī dhārayām āsa gārgyasya garbhaṃ durdharam acyutam  BrP mānuṣyāṃ gargabhāryāyāṃ niyogāc chūlapāṇinaḥ sa kālayavano nāma jajñe rājā mahābalaḥ  BrP vṛttapūrvārdhakāyas tu siṃhasaṃhanano yuvā aputrasya sa rājñas tu vavṛdhe ntaḥpure śiśuḥ  BrP yavanasya muniśreṣṭhāḥ sa kālayavano bhavat āyudhyamāno nṛpatiḥ paryapṛcchad dvijottamam  BrP vṛṣṇyandhakakulaṃ tasya nārado kathayad vibhuḥ akṣauhiṇyā tu sainyasya mathurām abhyayāt tadā  BrP dūtaṃ saṃpreṣayām āsa vṛṣṇyandhakaniveśanam tato vṛṣṇyandhakāḥ kṛṣṇaṃ puraskṛtya mahāmatim  BrP sametā mantrayām āsur yavanasya bhayāt tadā kṛtvā viniścayaṃ sarve palāyanam arocayan  BrP vihāya mathurāṃ ramyāṃ mānayantaḥ pinākinam kuśasthalīṃ dvāravatīṃ niveśayitum īpsavaḥ  BrP iti kṛṣṇasya janmedaṃ yaḥ śucir niyatendriyaḥ parvasu śrāvayed vidvān anṛṇaḥ sa sukhī bhavet  BrP lomaharṣaṇa uvāca kroṣṭor athābhavat putro vṛjinīvān mahāyaśāḥ vārjinīvatam icchanti svāhiṃ svāhākṛtāṃ varam  BrP svāhiputro bhavad rājā uṣadgur vadatāṃ varaḥ mahākratubhir īje yo vividhair bhūridakṣiṇaiḥ  BrP tataḥ prasūtim icchan vai uṣadguḥ so gryam ātmajam jajñe citrarathas tasya putraḥ karmabhir anvitaḥ  BrP āsīc caitrarathir vīro yajvā vipuladakṣiṇaḥ śaśabinduḥ paraṃ vṛttaṃ rājarṣīṇām anuṣṭhitaḥ  BrP pṛthuśravāḥ pṛthuyaśā rājāsīc chāśibindavaḥ śaṃsanti ca purāṇajñāḥ pārthaśravasam antaram  BrP antarasya suyajñas tu suyajñatanayo bhavat uṣato yajñam akhilaṃ svadharme ca kṛtādaraḥ  BrP śineyur abhavat putra uṣataḥ śatrutāpanaḥ marutas tasya tanayo rājarṣir abhavan nṛpaḥ  BrP maruto labhata jyeṣṭhaṃ sutaṃ kambalabarhiṣam cacāra vipulaṃ dharmam amarṣāt pratyabhāg api  BrP sa satprasūtim icchan vai sutaṃ kambalabarhiṣaḥ babhūva rukmakavacaḥ śataprasavataḥ sutaḥ  BrP nihatya rukmakavacaḥ śataṃ kavacināṃ raṇe dhanvināṃ niśitair bāṇair avāpa śriyam uttamām  BrP jajñe ca rukmakavacāt parajit paravīrahā jajñire pañca putrās tu mahāvīryāḥ parājitāḥ  BrP rukmeṣuḥ pṛthurukmaś ca jyāmaghaḥ pālito hariḥ pālitaṃ ca hariṃ caiva videhebhyaḥ pitā dadau  BrP rukmeṣur abhavad rājā pṛthurukmasya saṃśrayāt tābhyāṃ pravrājito rājā jyāmagho vasad āśrame  BrP praśāntaś ca tadā rājā brāhmaṇaiś cāvabodhitaḥ jagāma dhanur ādāya deśam anyaṃ dhvajī rathī  BrP narmadākūlam ekākīm ekalāṃ mṛttikāvatīm ṛkṣavantaṃ giriṃ jitvā śuktimatyām uvāsa saḥ  BrP jyāmaghasyābhavad bhāryā śaibyā balavatī satī aputro pi sa rājā vai nānyāṃ bhāryām avindata  BrP tasyāsīd vijayo yuddhe tatra kanyām avāpa saḥ bhāryām uvāca saṃtrastaḥ snuṣeti sa janeśvaraḥ  BrP etac chrutvābravīd devī kasya deva snuṣeti vai abravīt tad upaśrutya jyāmagho rājasattamaḥ  BrP rājovāca yas te janiṣyate putras tasya bhāryopapāditā  BrP lomaharṣaṇa uvāca ugreṇa tapasā tasyāḥ kanyāyāḥ sā vyajāyata putraṃ vidarbhaṃ subhāgā śaibyā pariṇatā satī  BrP rājaputryāṃ tu vidvāṃsau snuṣāyāṃ krathakaiśikau paścād vidarbho janayac chūrau raṇaviśāradau  BrP bhīmo vidarbhasya sutaḥ kuntis tasyātmajo bhavat kunter dhṛṣṭaḥ suto jajñe raṇadhṛṣṭaḥ pratāpavān  BrP dhṛṣṭasya jajñire śūrās trayaḥ paramadhārmikāḥ āvantaś ca daśārhaś ca balī viṣaharaś ca saḥ  BrP daśārhasya suto vyomā vyomno jīmūta ucyate jīmūtaputro vikṛtis tasya bhīmarathaḥ smṛtaḥ  BrP atha bhīmarathasyāsīt putro navarathas tathā tasya cāsīd daśarathaḥ śakunis tasya cātmajaḥ  BrP tasmāt karambhaḥ kārambhir devarāto bhavan nṛpaḥ devakṣatro bhavat tasya vṛddhakṣatro mahāyaśāḥ  BrP devagarbhasamo jajñe devakṣatrasya nandanaḥ madhūnāṃ vaṃśakṛd rājā madhur madhuravāg api  BrP madhor jajñe tha vaidarbhyāṃ purudvān puruṣottamaḥ aikṣvākī cābhavad bhāryā madhos tasyāṃ vyajāyata  BrP satvān sarvaguṇopetaḥ sātvatā kīrtivardhanaḥ imāṃ visṛṣṭiṃ vijñāya jyāmaghasya mahātmanaḥ yujyate paramaprītyā prajāvāṃś ca bhavet sadā  BrP lomaharṣaṇa uvāca satvataḥ sattvasaṃpannān kauśalyā suṣuve sutān bhāginaṃ bhajamānaṃ ca divyaṃ devāvṛdhaṃ nṛpam  BrP andhakaṃ ca mahābāhuṃ vṛṣṇiṃ ca yadunandanam teṣāṃ visargāś catvāro vistareṇeha kīrtitāḥ  BrP bhajamānasya sṛñjayyau bāhyakāthopabāhyakā āstāṃ bhārye tayos tasmāj jajñire bahavaḥ sutāḥ  BrP krimiś ca kramaṇaś caiva dhṛṣṭaḥ śūraḥ puraṃjayaḥ ete bāhyakasṛñjayyāṃ bhajamānād vijajñire  BrP āyutājit sahasrājic chatājit tv atha dāsakaḥ upabāhyakasṛñjayyāṃ bhajamānād vijajñire  BrP yajvā devāvṛdho rājā cacāra vipulaṃ tapaḥ putraḥ sarvaguṇopeto mama syād iti niścitaḥ  BrP saṃyujyamānas tapasā parṇāśāyā jalaṃ spṛśan sadopaspṛśatas tasya cakāra priyam āpagā  BrP cintayābhiparītā sā na jagāmaiva niścayam kalyāṇatvān narapates tasya sā nimnagottamā  BrP nādhyagacchat tu tāṃ nārīṃ yasyām evaṃvidhaḥ sutaḥ bhavet tasmāt svayaṃ gatvā bhavāmy asya sahānugā  BrP atha bhūtvā kumārī sā bibhratī paramaṃ vapuḥ varayām āsa nṛpatiṃ tām iyeṣa ca sa prabhuḥ  BrP tasyām ādhatta garbhaṃ sa tejasvinam udāradhīḥ atha sā daśame māsi suṣuve saritāṃ varā  BrP putraṃ sarvaguṇopetaṃ babhruṃ devāvṛdhaṃ dvijāḥ atra vaṃśe purāṇajñā gāyantīti pariśrutam  BrP guṇān devāvṛdhasyāpi kīrtayanto mahātmanaḥ yathaivāgre tathā dūrāt paśyāmas tāvad antikāt  BrP babhruḥ śreṣṭho manuṣyāṇāṃ devair devāvṛdhaḥ samaḥ ṣaṣṭiś ca ṣaṭ ca puruṣāḥ sahasrāṇi ca sapta ca  BrP ete mṛtatvaṃ prāptā vai babhror devāvṛdhād api yajvā dānapatir dhīmān brahmaṇyaḥ sudṛḍhāyudhaḥ  BrP tasyānvavāyaḥ sumahān bhojā ye sārtikāvatāḥ andhakāt kāśyaduhitā caturo labhatātmajān  BrP kukuraṃ bhajamānaṃ ca sasakaṃ balabarhiṣam kukurasya suto vṛṣṭir vṛṣṭes tu tanayas tathā  BrP kapotaromā tasyātha tiliris tanayo bhavat jajñe punar vasus tasmād abhijic ca punar vasoḥ  BrP tathā vai putramithunaṃ babhūvābhijitaḥ kila āhukaḥ śrāhukaś caiva khyātau khyātimatāṃ varau  BrP imāṃ codāharanty atra gāthāṃ prati tam āhukam śvetena parivāreṇa kiśorapratimo mahān  BrP aśītivarmaṇā yukta āhukaḥ prathamaṃ vrajet nāputravān nāśatado nāsahasraśatāyuṣaḥ  BrP nāśuddhakarmā nāyajvā yo bhojam abhito vrajet pūrvasyāṃ diśi nāgānāṃ bhojasya prayayuḥ kila  BrP somāt saṅgānukarṣāṇāṃ dhvajināṃ savarūthinām rathānāṃ meghaghoṣāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi daśaiva tu  BrP raupyakāñcanakakṣāṇāṃ sahasrāṇy ekaviṃśatiḥ tāvaty eva sahasrāṇi uttarasyāṃ tathā diśi  BrP ābhūmipālā bhojās tu santi jyākiṅkiṇīkinaḥ āhuḥ kiṃ cāpy avantibhyaḥ svasāraṃ dadur andhakāḥ  BrP āhukasya tu kāśyāyāṃ dvau putrau saṃbabhūvatuḥ devakaś cograsenaś ca devagarbhasamāv ubhau  BrP devakasyābhavan putrāś catvāras tridaśopamāḥ devavān upadevaś ca saṃdevo devarakṣitaḥ  BrP kumāryaḥ sapta cāsyātha vasudevāya tā dadau devakī śāntidevā ca sudevā devarakṣitā  BrP vṛkadevy upadevī ca sunāmnī caiva saptamī navograsenasya sutās teṣāṃ kaṃsas tu pūrvajaḥ  BrP nyagrodhaś ca sunāmā ca tathā kaṅkaḥ subhūṣaṇaḥ rāṣṭrapālo tha sutanur anāvṛṣṭis tu puṣṭimān  BrP teṣāṃ svasāraḥ pañcāsan kaṃsā kaṃsavatī tathā sutanū rāṣṭrapālī ca kaṅkā caiva varāṅganā  BrP ugrasenaḥ sahāpatyo vyākhyātaḥ kukurodbhavaḥ kukurāṇām imaṃ vaṃśaṃ dhārayann amitaujasām  BrP ātmano vipulaṃ vaṃśaṃ prajāvān āpnuyān naraḥ  BrP lomaharṣaṇa uvāca bhajamānasya putro tha rathamukhyo vidūrathaḥ rājādhidevaḥ śūras tu vidūrathasuto bhavat  BrP rājādhidevasya sutā jajñire vīryavattarāḥ dattātidattau balinau śoṇāśvaḥ śvetavāhanaḥ  BrP śamī ca daṇḍaśarmā ca dantaśatruś ca śatrujit śravaṇā ca śraviṣṭhā ca svasārau saṃbabhūvatuḥ  BrP śamiputraḥ pratikṣatraḥ pratikṣatrasya cātmajaḥ svayaṃbhojaḥ svayaṃbhojād bhadikaḥ saṃbabhūva ha  BrP tasya putrā babhūvur hi sarve bhīmaparākramāḥ kṛtavarmāgrajas teṣāṃ śatadhanvā tu madhyamaḥ  BrP devāntaś ca narāntaś ca bhiṣagvaitaraṇaś ca yaḥ sudāntaś cātidāntaś ca nikāśyaḥ kāmadambhakaḥ  BrP devāntasyābhavat putro vidvān kambalabarhiṣaḥ asamaujāḥ sutas tasya nāsamaujāś ca tāv ubhau  BrP ajātaputrāya sutān pradadāv asamaujase sudaṃṣṭraś ca sucāruś ca kṛṣṇa ity andhakāḥ smṛtāḥ  BrP gāndhārī caiva mādrī ca kroṣṭubhārye babhūvatuḥ gāndhārī janayām āsa anamitraṃ mahābalam  BrP mādrī yudhājitaṃ putraṃ tato vai devamīdhuṣam anamitram amitrāṇāṃ jetāram aparājitam  BrP anamitrasuto nighno nighnato dvau babhūvatuḥ prasenaś cātha satrājic chatrusenājitāv ubhau  BrP praseno dvāravatyāṃ tu nivasan yo mahāmaṇim divyaṃ syamantakaṃ nāma sa sūryād upalabdhavān  BrP tasya satrājitaḥ sūryaḥ sakhā prāṇasamo bhavat sa kadācin niśāpāye rathena rathināṃ varaḥ  BrP toyakūlam apaḥ spraṣṭum upasthātuṃ yayau ravim tasyopatiṣṭhataḥ sūryaṃ vivasvān agrataḥ sthitaḥ  BrP vispaṣṭamūrtir bhagavāṃs tejomaṇḍalavān vibhuḥ atha rājā vivasvantam uvāca sthitam agrataḥ  BrP yathaiva vyomni paśyāmi sadā tvāṃ jyotiṣāṃ pate tejomaṇḍalinaṃ devaṃ tathaiva purataḥ sthitam  BrP ko viśeṣo sti me tvattaḥ sakhyenopagatasya vai etac chrutvā tu bhagavān maṇiratnaṃ syamantakam  BrP svakaṇṭhād avamucyātha ekānte nyastavān vibhuḥ tato vigrahavantaṃ taṃ dadarśa nṛpatis tadā  BrP prītimān atha taṃ dṛṣṭvā muhūrtaṃ kṛtavān kathām tam abhiprasthitaṃ bhūyo vivasvantaṃ sa satrajit  BrP lokān bhāsayase sarvān yena tvaṃ satataṃ prabho tad etan maṇiratnaṃ me bhagavan dātum arhasi  BrP tataḥ syamantakamaṇiṃ dattavān bhāskaras tadā sa tam ābadhya nagarīṃ praviveśa mahīpatiḥ  BrP taṃ janāḥ paryadhāvanta sūryo yaṃ gacchatīti ha svāṃ purīṃ sa visiṣmāya rājā tv antaḥpuraṃ tathā  BrP taṃ prasenajitaṃ divyaṃ maṇiratnaṃ syamantakam dadau bhrātre narapatiḥ premṇā satrājid uttamam  BrP sa maṇiḥ syandate rukmaṃ vṛṣṇyandhakaniveśane kālavarṣī ca parjanyo na ca vyādhibhayaṃ hy abhūt  BrP lipsāṃ cakre prasenasya maṇiratne syamantake govindo na ca taṃ lebhe śakto pi na jahāra saḥ  BrP kadācin mṛgayāṃ yātaḥ prasenas tena bhūṣitaḥ syamantakakṛte siṃhād vadhaṃ prāpa vanecarāt  BrP atha siṃhaṃ pradhāvantam ṛkṣarājo mahābalaḥ nihatya maṇiratnaṃ tad ādāya prāviśad guhām  BrP tato vṛṣṇyandhakāḥ kṛṣṇaṃ prasenavadhakāraṇāt prārthanāṃ tāṃ maṇer baddhvā sarva eva śaśaṅkire  BrP sa śaṅkyamāno dharmātmā akārī tasya karmaṇaḥ āhariṣye maṇim iti pratijñāya vanaṃ yayau  BrP yatra praseno mṛgayāṃ vyacarat tatra cāpy atha prasenasya padaṃ gṛhya puruṣair āptakāribhiḥ  BrP ṛkṣavantaṃ girivaraṃ vindhyaṃ ca girim uttamam anveṣayan pariśrāntaḥ sa dadarśa mahāmanāḥ  BrP sāśvaṃ hataṃ prasenaṃ tu nāvindata ca tanmaṇim atha siṃhaḥ prasenasya śarīrasyāvidūrataḥ  BrP ṛkṣeṇa nihato dṛṣṭaḥ padair ṛkṣas tu sūcitaḥ padais tair anviyāyātha guhām ṛkṣasya mādhavaḥ  BrP sa hi ṛkṣabile vāṇīṃ śuśrāva pramaderitām dhātryā kumāram ādāya sutaṃ jāmbavato dvijāḥ  BrP krīḍayantyā ca maṇinā mā rodīr ity atheritām  BrP dhātry uvāca siṃhaḥ prasenam avadhīt siṃho jāmbavatā hataḥ sukumāraka mā rodīs tava hy eṣa syamantakaḥ  BrP vyaktitas tasya śabdasya tūrṇam eva bilaṃ yayau praviśya tatra bhagavāṃs tad ṛkṣabilam añjasā  BrP sthāpayitvā biladvāre yadūṃl lāṅgalinā saha śārṅgadhanvā bilasthaṃ tu jāmbavantaṃ dadarśa saḥ  BrP yuyudhe vāsudevas tu bile jāmbavatā saha bāhubhyām eva govindo divasān ekaviṃśatim  BrP praviṣṭe tha bile kṛṣṇe baladevapuraḥsarāḥ purīṃ dvāravatīm etya hataṃ kṛṣṇaṃ nyavedayan  BrP vāsudevo pi nirjitya jāmbavantaṃ mahābalam lebhe jāmbavatīṃ kanyām ṛkṣarājasya saṃmatām  BrP maṇiṃ syamantakaṃ caiva jagrāhātmaviśuddhaye anunīyarkṣarājaṃ tu niryayau ca tato bilāt  BrP upāyād dvārakāṃ kṛṣṇaḥ sa vinītaiḥ puraḥsaraiḥ evaṃ sa maṇim āhṛtya viśodhyātmānam acyutaḥ  BrP dadau satrājite taṃ vai sarvasātvatasaṃsadi evaṃ mithyābhiśastena kṛṣṇenāmitraghātinā  BrP ātmā viśodhitaḥ pāpād vinirjitya syamantakam satrājito daśa tv āsan bhāryās tāsāṃ śataṃ sutāḥ  BrP khyātimantas trayas teṣāṃ bhagaṃkāras tu pūrvajaḥ vīro vātapatiś caiva vasumedhas tathaiva ca  BrP kumāryaś cāpi tisro vai dikṣu khyātā dvijottamāḥ satyabhāmottamā tāsāṃ vratinī ca dṛḍhavratā  BrP tathā prasvāpinī caiva bhāryāṃ kṛṣṇāya tāṃ dadau sabhākṣo bhaṅgakāris tu nāveyaś ca narottamau  BrP jajñāte guṇasaṃpannau viśrutau rūpasaṃpadā mādryāḥ putro tha jajñe tha vṛṣṇiputro yudhājitaḥ  BrP jajñāte tanayau vṛṣṇeḥ śvaphalkaś citrakas tathā śvaphalkaḥ kāśirājasya sutāṃ bhāryām avindata  BrP gāndinīṃ nāma tasyāś ca gāḥ sadā pradadau pitā tasyāṃ jajñe mahābāhuḥ śrutavān atithipriyaḥ  BrP akrūro tha mahābhāgo jajñe vipuladakṣiṇaḥ upamadgus tathā madgur mudaraś cārimardanaḥ  BrP ārikṣepas tathopekṣaḥ śatruhā cārimejayaḥ dharmabhṛc cāpi dharmā ca gṛdhrabhojāndhakas tathā  BrP āvāhaprativāhau ca sundarī ca varāṅganā viśrutāśvasya mahiṣī kanyā cāsya vasuṃdharā  BrP rūpayauvanasaṃpannā sarvasattvamanoharā akrūreṇograsenāyāṃ sutau vai kulanandanau  BrP vasudevaś copadevaś ca jajñāte devavarcasau citrakasyābhavan putrāḥ pṛthur vipṛthur eva ca  BrP aśvagrīvo śvabāhuś ca supārśvakagaveṣaṇau ariṣṭanemiś ca sutā dharmo dharmabhṛd eva ca  BrP subāhur bahubāhuś ca śraviṣṭhāśravaṇe striyau imāṃ mithyābhiśastiṃ yaḥ kṛṣṇasya samudāhṛtām  BrP veda mithyābhiśāpās taṃ na spṛśanti kadācana  BrP lomaharṣaṇa uvāca yat tu satrājite kṛṣṇo maṇiratnaṃ syamantakam dadāv ahārayad babhrur bhojena śatadhanvanā  BrP sadā hi prārthayām āsa satyabhāmām aninditām akrūro ntaram anviṣyan maṇiṃ caiva syamantakam  BrP satrājitaṃ tato hatvā śatadhanvā mahābalaḥ rātrau taṃ maṇim ādāya tato krūrāya dattavān  BrP akrūras tu tadā viprā ratnam ādāya cottamam samayaṃ kārayāṃ cakre nāvedyo haṃ tvayety uta  BrP vayam abhyutprapatsyāmaḥ kṛṣṇena tvāṃ pradharṣitam mamādya dvārakā sarvā vaśe tiṣṭhaty asaṃśayam  BrP hate pitari duḥkhārtā satyabhāmā manasvinī prayayau ratham āruhya nagaraṃ vāraṇāvatam  BrP satyabhāmā tu tad vṛttaṃ bhojasya śatadhanvanaḥ bhartur nivedya duḥkhārtā pārśvasthāśrūṇy avartayat  BrP pāṇḍavānāṃ ca dagdhānāṃ hariḥ kṛtvodakakriyām kulyārthe cāpi pāṇḍūnāṃ nyayojayata sātyakim  BrP tatas tvaritam āgamya dvārakāṃ madhusūdanaḥ pūrvajaṃ halinaṃ śrīmān idaṃ vacanam abravīt  BrP śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca hataḥ prasenaḥ siṃhena satrājic chatadhanvanā syamantakas tu madnāmī tasya prabhur ahaṃ vibho  BrP tad āroha rathaṃ śīghraṃ bhojaṃ hatvā mahāratham syamantako mahābāho asmākaṃ sa bhaviṣyati  BrP lomaharṣaṇa uvāca tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ tumulaṃ bhojakṛṣṇayoḥ śatadhanvā tato krūraṃ sarvatodiśam aikṣata  BrP saṃrabdhau tāv ubhau tatra dṛṣṭvā bhojajanārdanau śakto pi śāpād dhārdikyam akrūro nānvapadyata  BrP apayāne tato buddhiṃ bhojaś cakre bhayārditaḥ yojanānāṃ śataṃ sāgraṃ hṛdayā pratyapadyata  BrP vikhyātā hṛdayā nāma śatayojanagāminī bhojasya vaḍavā viprā yayā kṛṣṇam ayodhayat  BrP kṣīṇāṃ javena hṛdayām adhvanaḥ śatayojane dṛṣṭvā rathasya svāṃ vṛddhiṃ śatadhanvānam ardayat  BrP tatas tasyā hatāyās tu śramāt khedāc ca bho dvijāḥ kham utpetur atha prāṇāḥ kṛṣṇo rāmam athābravīt  BrP śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca tiṣṭheha tvaṃ mahābāho dṛṣṭadoṣā hayā mayā padbhyāṃ gatvā hariṣyāmi maṇiratnaṃ syamantakam  BrP padbhyām eva tato gatvā śatadhanvānam acyutaḥ mithilām abhito viprā jaghāna paramāstravit  BrP syamantakaṃ ca nāpaśyad dhatvā bhojaṃ mahābalam nivṛttaṃ cābravīt kṛṣṇaṃ maṇiṃ dehīti lāṅgalī  BrP nāstīti kṛṣṇaś covāca tato rāmo ruṣānvitaḥ dhikśabdapūrvam asakṛt pratyuvāca janārdanam  BrP balarāma uvāca bhrātṛtvān marṣayāmy eṣa svasti te stu vrajāmy aham kṛtyaṃ na me dvārakayā na tvayā na ca vṛṣṇibhiḥ  BrP praviveśa tato rāmo mithilām arimardanaḥ sarvakāmair upahṛtair mithilenābhipūjitaḥ  BrP etasminn eva kāle tu babhrur matimatāṃ varaḥ nānārūpān kratūn sarvān ājahāra nirargalān  BrP dīkṣāmayaṃ sa kavacaṃ rakṣārthaṃ praviveśa ha syamantakakṛte prājño gāndīputro mahāyaśāḥ  BrP atha ratnāni cānyāni dhanāni vividhāni ca ṣaṣṭiṃ varṣāṇi dharmātmā yajñeṣv eva nyayojayat  BrP akrūrayajñā iti te khyātās tasya mahātmanaḥ bahvannadakṣiṇāḥ sarve sarvakāmapradāyinaḥ  BrP atha duryodhano rājā gatvā sa mithilāṃ prabhuḥ gadāśikṣāṃ tato divyāṃ baladevād avāptavān  BrP saṃprasādya tato rāmo vṛṣṇyandhakamahārathaiḥ ānīto dvārakām eva kṛṣṇena ca mahātmanā  BrP akrūraś cāndhakaiḥ sārdham āyātaḥ puruṣarṣabhaḥ hatvā satrājitaṃ suptaṃ sahabandhuṃ mahābalaḥ  BrP jñātibhedabhayāt kṛṣṇas tam upekṣitavāṃs tadā apayāte tadākrūre nāvarṣat pākaśāsanaḥ  BrP anāvṛṣṭyā tadā rāṣṭram abhavad bahudhā kṛśam tataḥ prasādayām āsur akrūraṃ kukurāndhakāḥ  BrP punar dvāravatīṃ prāpte tasmin dānapatau tataḥ pravavarṣa sahasrākṣaḥ kakṣe jalanidhes tadā  BrP kanyāṃ ca vāsudevāya svasāraṃ śīlasaṃmatām akrūraḥ pradadau dhīmān prītyarthaṃ munisattamāḥ  BrP atha vijñāya yogena kṛṣṇo babhrugataṃ maṇim sabhāmadhyagataḥ prāha tam akrūraṃ janārdanaḥ  BrP śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca yat tad ratnaṃ maṇivaraṃ tava hastagataṃ vibho tat prayaccha ca mānārha mayi mānāryakaṃ kṛthāḥ  BrP ṣaṣṭivarṣagate kāle yo roṣo bhūn mamānagha sa saṃrūḍho sakṛt prāptas tataḥ kālātyayo mahān  BrP sa tataḥ kṛṣṇavacanāt sarvasātvatasaṃsadi pradadau taṃ maṇiṃ babhrur akleśena mahāmatiḥ  BrP tatas tam ārjavāt prāptaṃ babhror hastād ariṃdamaḥ dadau hṛṣṭamanāḥ kṛṣṇas taṃ maṇiṃ babhrave punaḥ  BrP sa kṛṣṇahastāt saṃprāptaṃ maṇiratnaṃ syamantakam ābadhya gāndinīputro virarājāṃśumān iva  BrP munaya ūcuḥ aho sumahad ākhyānaṃ bhavatā parikīrtitam bhāratānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ pārthivānāṃ tathaiva ca  BrP devānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca gandharvoragarakṣasām daityānām atha siddhānāṃ guhyakānāṃ tathaiva ca  BrP atyadbhutāni karmāṇi vikramā dharmaniścayāḥ vividhāś ca kathā divyā janma cāgryam anuttamam  BrP sṛṣṭiḥ prajāpateḥ samyak tvayā proktā mahāmate prajāpatīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ guhyakāpsarasāṃ tathā  BrP sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ sarvam utpannaṃ vividhaṃ jagat tvayā proktaṃ mahābhāga śrutaṃ caitan manoharam  BrP kathitaṃ puṇyaphaladaṃ purāṇaṃ ślakṣṇayā girā manaḥkarṇasukhaṃ samyak prīṇāty amṛtasaṃmitam  BrP idānīṃ śrotum icchāmaḥ sakalaṃ maṇḍalaṃ bhuvaḥ vaktum arhasi sarvajña paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi naḥ  BrP yāvantaḥ sāgarā dvīpās tathā varṣāṇi parvatāḥ vanāni saritaḥ puṇya devādīnāṃ mahāmate  BrP yatpramāṇam idaṃ sarvaṃ yadādhāraṃ yadātmakam saṃsthānam asya jagato yathāvad vaktum arhasi  BrP lomaharṣaṇa uvāca munayaḥ śrūyatām etat saṃkṣepād vadato mama nāsya varṣaśatenāpi vaktuṃ śakyo tivistaraḥ  BrP jambūplakṣāhvayau dvīpau śālmalaś cāparo dvijāḥ kuśaḥ krauñcas tathā śākaḥ puṣkaraś caiva saptamaḥ  BrP ete dvīpāḥ samudrais tu sapta saptabhir āvṛtāḥ lavaṇekṣusurāsarpir dadhidugdhajalaiḥ samam  BrP jambūdvīpaḥ samastānām eteṣāṃ madhyasaṃsthitaḥ tasyāpi madhye viprendrā meruḥ kanakaparvataḥ  BrP caturaśītisāhasrair yojanais tasya cocchrayaḥ praviṣṭaḥ ṣoḍaśādhastād dvātriṃśan mūrdhni vistṛtaḥ  BrP mūle ṣoḍaśasāhasrair vistāras tasya sarvataḥ bhūpadmasyāsya śailo sau karṇikākārasaṃsthitaḥ  BrP himavān hemakūṭaś ca niṣadhas tasya dakṣiṇe nīlaḥ śvetaś ca śṛṅgī ca uttare varṣaparvatāḥ  BrP lakṣapramāṇau dvau madhye daśahīnās tathāpare sahasradvitayocchrāyās tāvadvistāriṇaś ca te  BrP bhārataṃ prathamaṃ varṣaṃ tataḥ kiṃpuruṣaṃ smṛtam harivarṣaṃ tathaivānyan meror dakṣiṇato dvijāḥ  BrP ramyakaṃ cottaraṃ varṣaṃ tasyaiva tu hiraṇmayam uttarāḥ kuravaś caiva yathā vai bhārataṃ tathā  BrP navasāhasram ekaikam eteṣāṃ dvijasattamāḥ ilāvṛtaṃ ca tanmadhye sauvarṇo merur ucchritaḥ  BrP meroś caturdiśaṃ tatra navasāhasravistṛtam ilāvṛtaṃ mahābhāgāś catvāraś cātra parvatāḥ  BrP viṣkambhā vitatā meror yojanāyutavistṛtāḥ pūrveṇa mandaro nāma dakṣiṇe gandhamādanaḥ  BrP vipulaḥ paścime pārśve supārśvaś cottare sthitaḥ kadambas teṣu jambūś ca pippalo vaṭa eva ca  BrP ekādaśaśatāyāmāḥ pādapā giriketavaḥ jambūdvīpasya sā jambūr nāmahetur dvijottamāḥ  BrP mahāgajapramāṇāni jambvās tasyāḥ phalāni vai patanti bhūbhṛtaḥ pṛṣṭhe śīryamāṇāni sarvataḥ  BrP rasena teṣāṃ vikhyātā tatra jambūnadīti vai sarit pravartate sā ca pīyate tannivāsibhiḥ  BrP na khedo na ca daurgandhyaṃ na jarā nendriyakṣayaḥ tatpānasvasthamanasāṃ janānāṃ tatra jāyate  BrP tīramṛt tadrasaṃ prāpya sukhavāyuviśoṣitā jāmbūnadākhyaṃ bhavati suvarṇaṃ siddhabhūṣaṇam  BrP bhadrāśvaṃ pūrvato meroḥ ketumālaṃ ca paścime varṣe dve tu muniśreṣṭhās tayor madhye tv ilāvṛtam  BrP vanaṃ caitrarathaṃ pūrve dakṣiṇe gandhamādanam vaibhrājaṃ paścime tadvad uttare nandanaṃ smṛtam  BrP aruṇodaṃ mahābhadram asitodaṃ samānasam sarāṃsy etāni catvāri devabhogyāni sarvadā  BrP śāntavāṃś cakrakuñjaś ca kurarī mālyavāṃs tathā vaikaṅkapramukhā meroḥ pūrvataḥ kesarācalāḥ  BrP trikūṭaḥ śiśiraś caiva pataṃgo rucakas tathā niṣadhādayo dakṣiṇatas tasya kesaraparvatāḥ  BrP śikhivāsaḥ savaidūryaḥ kapilo gandhamādanaḥ jānudhipramukhās tadvat paścime kesarācalāḥ  BrP meror anantarās te ca jaṭharādiṣv BrP brahmovāca śṛṇudhvaṃ munayaḥ sarve yad vo vakṣyāmi sāṃpratam purāṇaṃ vedasaṃbaddhaṃ bhuktimuktipradaṃ śubham  BrP pṛthivyāṃ bhārataṃ varṣaṃ karmabhūmir udāhṛtā karmaṇaḥ phalabhūmiś ca svargaṃ ca yāvan na dīyate cārghyaṃ bhāskarāya yathoditam tāvan na pūjayed viṣṇuṃ śaṃkaraṃ vā sureśvaram  BrP tasmāt prayatnam āsthāya dadyād arghyaṃ dine dine ādityāya śucir bhūtvā puṣpair gandhair manoramaiḥ  BrP evaṃ dadāti yaś cārghyaṃ saptamyāṃ susamāhitaḥ ādityāya śuciḥ snātaḥ sa labhed īpsitaṃ phalam  BrP rogād vimucyate rogī vittārthī labhate dhanam vidyāṃ prāpnoti vidyārthī sutārthī putravān bhavet  BrP yaṃ yaṃ kāmam abhidhyāyan sūryāyārghyaṃ prayacchati tasya tasya phalaṃ samyak prāpnoti puruṣaḥ sudhīḥ  BrP snātvā vai sāgare dattvā sūryāyārghyaṃ praṇamya ca naro vā yadi vā nārī sarvakāmaphalaṃ labhet  BrP tataḥ sūryālayaṃ gacchet puṣpam ādāya vāgyataḥ praviśya pūjayed bhānuṃ kṛtvā tu triḥ pradakṣiṇam  BrP pūjayet parayā bhaktyā koṇārkaṃ munisattamāḥ gandhaiḥ puṣpais tathā dīpair dhūpair naivedyakair api  BrP daṇḍavat praṇipātaiś ca jayaśabdais tathā stavaiḥ evaṃ saṃpūjya taṃ devaṃ sahasrāṃśuṃ jagatpatim  BrP daśānām aśvamedhānāṃ phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ sarvapāpavinirmukto yuvā divyavapur naraḥ  BrP saptāvarān sapta parān vaṃśān uddhṛtya bho dvijāḥ vimānenārkavarṇena kāmagena suvarcasā  BrP upagīyamāno gandharvaiḥ sūryalokaṃ sa gacchati bhuktvā tatra varān bhogān yāvad ābhūtasaṃplavam  BrP puṇyakṣayād ihāyātaḥ pravare yogināṃ kule caturvedo bhaved vipraḥ svadharmanirataḥ śuciḥ  BrP yogaṃ vivasvataḥ prāpya tato mokṣam avāpnuyāt caitre māsi site pakṣe yātrāṃ damanabhañjikām  BrP yaḥ karoti naras tatra pūrvoktaṃ sa phalaṃ labhet śayanotthāpane bhānoḥ saṃkrāntyāṃ viṣuvāyane  BrP vāre raves tithau caiva parvakāle thavā dvijāḥ ye tatra yātrāṃ kurvanti śraddhayā saṃyatendriyāḥ  BrP vimānenārkavarṇena sūryalokaṃ vrajanti te āste tatra mahādevas tīre nadanadīpateḥ  BrP rāmeśvara iti khyātaḥ sarvakāmaphalapradaḥ ye taṃ paśyanti kāmāriṃ snātvā samyaṅ mahodadhau  BrP gandhaiḥ puṣpais tathā dhūpair dīpair naivedyakair varaiḥ praṇipātais tathā stotrair gītair vādyair manoharaiḥ  BrP rājasūyaphalaṃ samyag vājimedhaphalaṃ tathā prāpnuvanti mahātmānaḥ saṃsiddhiṃ paramāṃ tathā  BrP kāmagena vimānena kiṅkiṇījālamālinā upagīyamānā gandharvaiḥ śivalokaṃ vrajanti te  BrP āhūtasaṃplavaṃ yāvad bhuktvā bhogān manoramān puṇyakṣayād ihāgatya cāturvedā suraśreṣṭha bhavatā yad udāhṛtam bhāskarasya paraṃ kṣetraṃ bhuktimuktiphalapradam  BrP na tṛptim adhigacchāmaḥ śṛṇvantaḥ sukhadāṃ kathām tava vaktrodbhavāṃ puṇyām ādityasyāghanāśinīm  BrP ataḥ paraṃ suraśreṣṭha brūhi no vadatāṃ vara devapūjāphalaṃ yac ca yac ca dānaphalaṃ prabho  BrP praṇipāte namaskāre tathā caiva pradakṣiṇe dīpadhūpapradāne ca saṃmārjanavidhau ca yat  BrP upavāse ca yat puṇyaṃ tatkathāṃ śrāvayed yas tu tadbhaktān pūjayīta vā agniśuśrūṣakaś caiva sa vai bhaktaḥ sanātanaḥ  BrP taccittas tanmanāś caiva devapūjārataḥ sadā tatkarmakṛd bhaved yas tu sa vai bhaktaḥ sanātanaḥ  BrP devārthe kriyamāṇāni yaḥ karmāṇy anumanyate kīrtanād vā paro viprāḥ sa vai bhaktataro naraḥ  BrP nābhyasūyeta tadbhaktān na nindyāc cānyadevatām ādityavratacārī ca sa vai bhaktataro naraḥ  BrP gacchaṃs tiṣṭhan svapañ jighrann unmiṣan nimiṣann api yaḥ smared bhāskaraṃ nityaṃ sa vai bhaktataro naraḥ  BrP evaṃvidhā tv iyaṃ bhaktiḥ sadā kāryā vijānatā bhaktyā samādhinā caiva stavena manasā tathā  BrP kriyate niyamo yas tu dānaṃ viprāya dīyate pratigṛhṇanti taṃ devā manuṣyāḥ pitaras tathā  BrP pattraṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ toyaṃ yad bhaktyā samupāhṛtam pratigṛhṇanti tad devā nāstikān varjayanti ca  BrP bhāvaśuddhiḥ prayoktavyā niyamācārasaṃyutā bhāvaśuddhyā kriyate yat tat sarvaṃ saphalaṃ bhavet  BrP stutijapyopahāreṇa pūjayāpi vivasvataḥ upavāsena bhaktyā vai sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate  BrP praṇidhāya śiro bhūmyāṃ namaskāraṃ karoti yaḥ tatkṣaṇāt sarvapāpebhyo mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ  BrP bhaktiyukto naro yo sau raveḥ kuryāt pradakṣiṇām pradakṣiṇīkṛtā tena saptadvīpā vasuṃdharā  BrP sūryaṃ manasi yaḥ kṛtvā kuryād vyomapradakṣiṇām pradakṣiṇīkṛtās tena sarve devā bhavanti hi  BrP ekāhāro naro bhūtvā ṣaṣṭhyāṃ yo rcayate ravim niyamavratacārī ca bhaved bhaktisamanvitaḥ  BrP saptamyāṃ vā mahābhāgāḥ so śvamedhaphalaṃ labhet ahorātropavāsena pūjayed yas tu bhāskaram  BrP saptamyām athavā ṣaṣṭhyāṃ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim kṛṣṇapakṣasya saptamyāṃ sopavāso jitendriyaḥ  BrP sarvaratnopahāreṇa pūjayed yas tu bhāskaram padmaprabheṇa yānena sūryalokaṃ sa gacchati  BrP śuklapakṣasya saptamyām upavāsaparo naraḥ sarvaśuklopahāreṇa pūjayed yas tu bhāskaram  BrP sarvapāpavinirmuktaḥ sūryalokaṃ sa vaivasvate prāpte punar ete maharṣayaḥ utpatsyanti dvitīye vai tava yajñe hy ayonijāḥ  BrP hute vai brahmaṇaḥ sattre cākṣuṣasyāntare manoḥ abhivyāhṛtya saptarṣīn dakṣaṃ so bhyaśapat punaḥ  BrP bhavitā mānuṣo rājā cākṣuṣasyāntare manoḥ prācīnabarhiṣaḥ pautraḥ putraś cāpi pracetasaḥ  BrP dakṣa ity eva nāmnā tvaṃ māriṣāyāṃ janiṣyasi kanyāyāṃ śākhināṃ caiva prāpte vai cākṣuṣāntare  BrP ahaṃ tatrāpi te vighnam ācariṣyāmi durmate dharmakāmārthayukteṣu karmasv iha punaḥ punaḥ  BrP tato vai vyāhṛto dakṣo rudraṃ so bhyaśapat punaḥ  BrP dakṣa uvāca yasmāt tvaṃ matkṛte krūra ṛṣīn vyāhṛtavān asi tasmāt sārdhaṃ surair yajñe na tvāṃ yakṣyanti vai dvijāḥ  BrP kṛtvāhutiṃ tava krūra apaḥ spṛśanti karmasu ihaiva vatsyase loke divaṃ hitvāyugakṣayāt tato devais tu te sārdhaṃ na tu pūjā bhaviṣyati  BrP rudra uvāca cāturvarṇyaṃ tu devānāṃ te cāpy ekatra bhuñjate na bhokṣye sahitas tais tu tato bhokṣyāmy ahaṃ pṛthak  BrP sarveṣāṃ caiva lokānām ādir bhūrloka ucyate tam ahaṃ dhārayāmy ekaḥ svecchayā na tavājñayā  BrP tasmin dhṛte sarvalokāḥ sarve tiṣṭhanti śāśvatāḥ tasmād ahaṃ vasāmīha satataṃ na tavājñayā  BrP brahmovāca tato bhivyāhṛto dakṣo rudreṇāmitatejasā svāyaṃbhuvīṃ tanuṃ tyaktvā utpanno mānuṣeṣv iha  BrP yadā gṛhapatir dakṣo yajñānām īśvaraḥ prabhuḥ samasteneha yajñena so yajad daivataiḥ saha  BrP atha devī satī yat te prāpte vaivasvate ntare menāyāṃ tām umāṃ devīṃ janayām āsa śailarāṭ  BrP sā tu devī satī pūrvam āsīt paścād umābhavat sahavratā bhavasyaiṣā naitayā mucyate bhavaḥ  BrP yāvad icchati saṃsthānaṃ prabhur manvantareṣv iha mārīcaṃ kaśyapaṃ devī yathāditir anuvratā  BrP sārdhaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ śrīs tu maghavantaṃ śacī yathā viṣṇuṃ kīrtir uṣā sūryaṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ cāpy arundhatī  BrP naitāṃs tu vijahaty etā bhartṝn devyaḥ kathaṃcana evaṃ prācetaso dakṣo jajñe vai cākṣuṣe  BrP ādye tretāyuge pūrvaṃ manor vaivasvatasya ha devasya mahato yajñe vāruṇīṃ bibhratas tanum  BrP ity eṣo nuśayo hy āsīt tayor jātyantare gataḥ prajāpateś ca dakṣasya tryambakasya ca dhīmataḥ  BrP tasmān nānuśayaḥ kāryo vareṣv iha kadācana jātyantaragatasyāpi bhāvitasya śubhāśubhaiḥ jantor na bhūtaye khyātis tan na kāryaṃ vijānatā  BrP munaya ūcuḥ kathaṃ roṣeṇa sā pūrvaṃ dakṣasya duhitā satī vivāhaś ca jagannātha sarvāścaryasamanvitaḥ  BrP tat sarvaṃ vistarād brahman vaktum arhasi sāṃpratam śrotum icchāmahe puṇyāṃ kathāṃ cātimanoharām  BrP brahmovāca śṛṇudhvaṃ muniśārdūlāḥ kathāṃ mahābhāga gartarūpeṇa saṃsthitaḥ tvaṃ cāpi vīraṇastambas tvayi lambāmahe vayam  BrP yāvat tvaṃ jīvase vipra tāvad eva vayaṃ sthitāḥ mṛte tvayi gamiṣyāmo narakaṃ pāpacetasaḥ  BrP yadi tvaṃ dārasaṃyogaṃ kṛtvāpatyaṃ guṇottaram utpādayasi tenāsmān mucyema vayam enasaḥ  BrP nānyena tapasā putra tīrthānāṃ ca phalena ca etat kuru mahābuddhe tārayasva pitṝn bhayāt  BrP kaśyapa uvāca sa tatheti pratijñāya ārādhya vṛṣabhadhvajam pitṝn gartāt samuddhṛtya gaṇapān pracakāra ha  BrP svayaṃ rudrasya dayitaḥ suveśo nāma nāmataḥ saṃmato balavāṃś caiva rudrasya gaṇapo bhavat  BrP tasmāt kṛtvā tapo ghoram apatyaṃ guṇavad bhṛśam utpādayasva śailendra sutāṃ tvaṃ varavarṇinīm  BrP brahmovāca sa evam uktvā ṛṣiṇā śailendro niyamasthitaḥ tapaś cakārāpy atulaṃ yena tuṣṭir abhūn mama  BrP tadā tam utpapātāhaṃ varado smīti cābravam brūhi tuṣṭo smi śailendra tapasānena suvrata  BrP himavān uvāca bhagavan putram icchāmi guṇaiḥ sarvair alaṃkṛtam evaṃ varaṃ prayacchasva yadi tuṣṭo si me prabho  BrP brahmovāca tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā girirājasya bho dvijāḥ tadā tasmai varaṃ cāhaṃ dattavān manasepsitam  BrP kanyā bhavitrī śailendra tapasānena suvrata yasyāḥ prabhāvāt sarvatra kīrtim āpsyasi śobhanām  BrP arcitaḥ sarvadevānāṃ tīrthakoṭisamāvṛtaḥ pāvanaś caiva puṇyena devānām api sarvataḥ  BrP jyeṣṭhā ca sā bhavitrī te anye cātra tataḥ śubhe  BrP so pi kālena śailendro menāyām udapādayat aparṇām BrP sā tathoktā tayā mātrā devī duścaracāriṇī tenaiva nāmnā lokeṣu vikhyātā surapūjitā  BrP etat tu trikumārīkaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam etāsāṃ tapasāṃ vṛttaṃ yāvad bhūmir dhariṣyati  BrP tapaḥśarīrās tāḥ sarvās tisro yogaṃ samāśritāḥ sarvāś caiva mahābhāgās tathā ca sthirayauvanāḥ  BrP tā lokamātaraś caiva brahmacāriṇya eva ca anugṛhṇanti lokāṃś ca tapasā svena sarvadā  BrP umā tāsāṃ variṣṭhā ca saṃpūjyaivaṃ vidhānena śivalokaṃ vrajen naraḥ  BrP nārī vā dvijaśārdūlāḥ saṃpūjya śraddhayānvitā pūrvoktaṃ phalam āpnoti nātra kāryā vicāraṇā  BrP kaḥ śaknoti guṇān vaktuṃ samagrān munisattamāḥ tasya kṣetravarasyātha ṛte devān maheśvarāt  BrP tasmin kṣetrottame gatvā śraddhayāśraddhayāpi vā mādhavādiṣu māseṣu naro vā yadi vāṅganā  BrP yasmin yasmiṃs tithau viprāḥ snātvā bindusarombhasi paśyed devaṃ virūpākṣaṃ devīṃ ca varadāṃ śivām  BrP gaṇaṃ caṇḍaṃ kārttikeyaṃ gaṇeśaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ tathā kalpadrumaṃ ca sāvitrīṃ śivalokaṃ sa gacchati  BrP snātvā ca kāpile tīrthe vidhivat pāpanāśane prāpnoty abhimatān kāmāñ śivalokaṃ sa gacchati  BrP yaḥ stambhyaṃ tatra vidhivat karoti niyatendriyaḥ kulaikaviṃśam uddhṛtya śivalokaṃ sa gacchati  BrP ekāmrake śivakṣetre vārāṇasīsame śubhe snānaṃ karoti yas tatra mokṣaṃ sa labhate dhruvam  BrP brahmovāca viraje virajā mātā brahmāṇī saṃpratiṣṭhitā yasyāḥ saṃdarśanān martyaḥ punāty āsaptamaṃ kulam  BrP sakṛd dṛṣṭvā tu tāṃ devīṃ bhaktyāpūjya praṇamya ca naraḥ svavaṃśam uddhṛtya mama lokaṃ sa gacchati  BrP anyāś ca tatra tiṣṭhanti viraje lokamātaraḥ sarvapāpaharā devyo varadā bhaktivatsalāḥ  BrP āste vaitaraṇī tatra sarvapāpaharā nadī yasyāṃ snātvā naraśreṣṭhaḥ sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate  BrP āste svayaṃbhūs tatraiva kroḍarūpī hariḥ svayam dṛṣṭvā praṇamya taṃ bhaktyā paraṃ viṣṇuṃ vrajanti te  BrP kāpile gograhe some tīrthe cālābusaṃjñite mṛtyuṃjaye kroḍatīrthe vāsuke siddhakeśvare  BrP tīrtheṣv eteṣu matimān viraje saṃyatendriyaḥ gatvāṣṭatīrthaṃ vidhivat snātvā devān praṇamya ca  BrP sarvapāpavinirmukto vimānavaram āsthitaḥ upagīyamāno gandharvair mama loke mahīyate  BrP viraje yo mama kṣetre piṇḍadānaṃ karoti vai sa karoty akṣayāṃ tṛptiṃ pitṝṇāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ  BrP mama kṣetre muniśreṣṭhā viraje ye kalevaram parityajanti puruṣās te mokṣaṃ prāpnuvanti vai  BrP snātvā yaḥ sāgare martyo dṛṣṭvā ca kapilaṃ harim paśyed devīṃ ca vārāhīṃ sa yāti tridaśālayam  BrP santi cānyāni tīrthāni puṇyāny āyatanāni ca tatkāle tu muniśreṣṭhā veditavyāni tāni vai  BrP samudrasyottare tīre tasmin deśe dvijottamāḥ āste guhyaṃ paraṃ kṣetraṃ muktidaṃ pāpanāśanam  BrP sarvatra vālukākīrṇaṃ pavitraṃ sarvakāmadam daśayojanavistīrṇaṃ kṣetraṃ śubhrair nānāvihaganāditaiḥ  BrP śrotraramyaiḥ sumadhurair balanirmadaneritaiḥ manasaḥ prītijanakaiḥ śabdaiḥ khagamukheritaiḥ  BrP cakoraiḥ śatapattraiś ca bhṛṅgarājais tathā śukaiḥ kokilaiḥ kalaviṅkaiś ca hārītair jīvajīvakaiḥ  BrP priyaputraiś cātakaiś ca tathānyair madhurasvaraiḥ śrotraramyaiḥ priyakaraiḥ kūjadbhiś cārvadhiṣṭhitaiḥ  BrP ketakīvanakhaṇḍaiś ca atimuktaiḥ sakubjakaiḥ sthalajalodbhavaiḥ brahmacārigṛhasthaiś ca vānaprasthaiś ca bhikṣubhiḥ  BrP svadharmaniratair varṇais tathānyaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanākīrṇaṃ naranārīsamākulam  BrP aśeṣavidyānilayaṃ sāṅgāś ca caturo vedāḥ śāstrāṇi vividhāni ca  BrP itihāsapurāṇāni yajñāś ca varadakṣiṇāḥ nadyaś ca vividhāḥ puṇyās tīrthāny āyatanāni ca  BrP sāgarāś ca tathā śailās tasmin deśe vyavasthitāḥ evaṃ divyālaṃkārabhūṣitaḥ bhuṅkte tatra varān bhogān yāvad ābhūtasaṃplavam  BrP śivaloke muniśreṣṭhā jarāmaraṇavarjitaḥ puṇyakṣayād ihāyātaḥ pravare brāhmaṇe kule  BrP caturvedī bhaved vipraḥ sarvaśāstraviśāradaḥ yogaṃ pāśupataṃ prāpya tato mokṣam avāpnuyāt  BrP āste tatra nadī puṇyā śiprā nāmeti viśrutā tasyāṃ snātas tu vidhivat saṃtarpya pitṛdevatāḥ  BrP sarvapāpavinirmukto vimānavaram āsthitaḥ bhuṅkte bahuvidhān bhogān svargaloke narottamaḥ  BrP āste tatraiva bhagavān devadevo janārdanaḥ govindasvāmināmāsau bhuktimuktiprado hariḥ  BrP taṃ dṛṣṭvā muktim āpnoti trisaptakulasaṃyutaḥ vimānenārkavarṇena kiṅkiṇījālamālinā  BrP sarvakāmasamṛddhena kāmagenāsthireṇa ca upagīyamāno gandharvair viṣṇuloke mahīyate  BrP bhuṅkte ca vividhān kāmān nirātaṅko gatajvaraḥ ābhūtasaṃplavaṃ yāvat surūpaḥ subhagaḥ sukhī  BrP kālenāgatya matimān brāhmaṇaḥ syān mahītale pravare yogināṃ gehe vedaśāstrārthatattvavit  BrP vaiṣṇavaṃ yogam āsthāya tato mokṣam avāpnuyāt vikramasvāmināmānaṃ viṣṇuṃ tatraiva bho dvijāḥ  BrP dṛṣṭvā naro vā nārī vā phalaṃ pūrvoditaṃ labhet anye pi tatra tiṣṭhanti devāḥ śakrapurogamāḥ  BrP mātaraś ca muniśreṣṭhāḥ sarvakāmaphalapradāḥ dṛṣṭvā tān vidhivad bhaktyā saṃpūjya praṇipatya ca  BrP sarvapāpavinirmukto naro yāti triviṣṭapam evaṃ sā nagarī ramyā rājasiṃhena pālitā  BrP nityotsavapramuditā yathendrasyāmarāvatī purāṣṭādaśasaṃyuktā suvistīrṇacatuṣpathā  BrP dhanurjyāghoṣaninadā siddhasaṃgamabhūṣitā vidyāvadgaṇabhūyiṣṭhā vedanirghoṣanāditā  BrP itihāsapurāṇāni śāstrāṇi vividhāni ca kāvyālāpakathāś caiva śrūyante harniśaṃ dvijāḥ  BrP evaṃ mayā guṇāḍhyā sā taduyinī samudāhṛtā yasyāṃ rājābhavat pūrvam indradyumno mahāmatiḥ  BrP brahmovāca tasyāṃ sa nṛpatiḥ pūrvaṃ kurvan rājyam anuttamam pālayām āsa matimān prajāḥ putrān ivaurasān  BrP satyavādī mahāprājñaḥ śūraḥ sarvaguṇākaraḥ matimān dharmasaṃpannaḥ sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ  BrP satyavāñ śīlavān dāntaḥ śrīmān parapuraṃjayaḥ āditya iva tejobhī rūpair āśvinayor iva  BrP vardhamānasurāścaryaḥ śakratulyaparākramaḥ śāradendur ivābhāti lakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥ  BrP āhartā sarvayajñānāṃ hayamedhādikṛt tathā dānair yajñais tapobhiś ca tattulyo nāsti bhūpatiḥ  BrP suvarṇamaṇimuktānāṃ gajāśvānāṃ ca bhūpatiḥ pradadau vipramukhyebhyo yāge yāge mahādhanam  BrP hastyaśvarathamukhyānāṃ kambalājinavāsasām ratnānāṃ dhanadhānyānām antas tasya na vidyate  BrP evaṃ sarvadhanair yukto guṇaiḥ sarvair alaṃkṛtaḥ sarvakāmasamṛddhātmā kurvan rājyam akaṇṭakam  BrP tasyeyaṃ matir utpannā sarvayogeśvaraṃ harim katham ārādhayiṣyāmi bhuktimuktipradaṃ prabhum  BrP vicārya sarvaśāstrāṇi tantrāṇy āgamavistaram itihāsapurāṇāni vedāṅgāni ca sarvaśaḥ  BrP dharmaśāstrāṇi sarvāṇi niyamān ṛṣibhāṣitān vedāṅgāni ca śāstrāṇi vidyāsthānāni yāni ca  BrP guruṃ saṃsevya yatnena brāhmaṇān vedapāragān ādhāya sabhṛtyaḥ sapurohitaḥ  BrP anujagmus tu taṃ sarve rathinaḥ śastrapāṇayaḥ rathair vimānasaṃkāśaiḥ patākādhvajasevitaiḥ  BrP sādinaś ca tathā sarve prāsatomarapāṇayaḥ aśvaiḥ pavanasaṃkāśair anujagmus tu śaraccandranibhānanāḥ  BrP sumadhyamāś cāruveṣāś cārukarṇālakāñcitāḥ tāmbūlarañjitamukhā rakṣibhiś ca surakṣitāḥ  BrP yānair uccāvacaiḥ śubhrair maṇikāñcanabhūṣitaiḥ upagīyamānās tāḥ sarvā gāyanaiḥ saparicchadāḥ  BrP astravikrayakāś caiva tāmbūlapaṇyajīvinaḥ tṛṇavikrayakāś caiva kāṣṭhavikrayakārakāḥ  BrP raṅgopajīvinaḥ sarve māṃsavikrayiṇas tathā tailavikrayakāś caiva vastravikrayakās tathā  BrP phalavikrayiṇaś caiva pattravikrayiṇas tathā tathā javasahārāś ca rajakāś ca sahasraśaḥ  BrP gopālā nāpitāś caiva tathānye vastrasūcakāḥ meṣapālāś cājapālā mṛgapālāś ca haṃsakāḥ  BrP dhānyavikrayiṇaś caiva saktuvikrayiṇaś ca ye guḍavikrayikāś caiva tathā lavaṇajīvinaḥ  BrP gāyanā nartakāś caiva tathā maṅgalapāṭhakāḥ śailūṣāḥ kathakāś caiva purāṇārthaviśāradāḥ  BrP kavayaḥ kāvyakartāro nānākāvyaviśāradāḥ viṣaghnā gāruḍāś caiva nānāratnaparīkṣakāḥ  BrP vyokārās tāmrakārāś ca kāṃsyakārāś ca rūṭhakāḥ kauṣakārāś citrakārāḥ kundakārāś ca pāvakāḥ  BrP daṇḍakārāś cāsikārāḥ surādhūtopajīvinaḥ mallā dūtāś ca kāyasthā ye cānye karmakāriṇaḥ  BrP tantuvāyā rūpakārā vārtikās tailapāṭhakāḥ lāvajīvās taittirikā mṛgapakṣyupajīvinaḥ  BrP gajavaidyāś ca vaidyāś ca naravaidyāś ca BrP sumeroḥ kāñcane śṛṅge sarvāścaryasamanvite siddhavidyādharair yakṣaiḥ kiṃnarair upaśobhite  BrP devadānavagandharvair nāgair apsarasāṃ gaṇaiḥ munibhir guhyakaiḥ siddhaiḥ sauparṇaiḥ samarudgaṇaiḥ sahasrapāt  BrP sahasraśīrṣā puruṣaḥ puṇḍarīkanibhekṣaṇaḥ saliladhvāntameghābhaḥ śrīmāñ śrīvatsalakṣaṇaḥ  BrP apaśyat sahasā taṃ tu brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ āsanair arghyapādyaiś ca akṣatair abhinandya ca  BrP tuṣṭāva paramaiḥ stotrair viriñciḥ susamāhitaḥ tato ham uktavān devaṃ brahmāṇaṃ kamalodbhavam kāraṇaṃ vada māṃ tāta mama dhyānasya sāṃpratam  BrP brahmovāca jagaddhitāya deveśa martyalokaiś ca taraṅgaiḥ samabhiplutam  BrP kūlānte hi mahāvṛkṣaḥ sthitaḥ sthalajaleṣu ca velābhir hanyamānaś ca na cāsau kampate drumaḥ  BrP paraśum ādāya hastena ūrmer antas tato vraja ekākī viharan rājan sa tvaṃ paśyasi pādapam  BrP īdṛk cihnaṃ samālokya chedaya tvam aśaṅkitaḥ chedyamānaṃ tu taṃ vṛkṣaṃ prātar adbhutadarśanam  BrP dṛṣṭvā tenaiva saṃcintya tato bhūpāla darśanāt kuru tāṃ pratimāṃ divyāṃ jahi cintāṃ vimohinīm  BrP brahmovāca evam uktvā mahābhāgo jagāmādarśanaṃ hariḥ sa cāpi svapnam ālokya paraṃ vismayam āgataḥ  BrP tāṃ niśāṃ sa samudvīkṣya sthitas tadgatamānasaḥ vyāharan vaiṣṇavān mantrān sūktaṃ caiva tadātmakam  BrP pragatāyāṃ rajanyāṃ tu utthito nānyamānasaḥ sa snātvā sāgare samyag yathāvad vidhinā tataḥ  BrP dattvā dānaṃ ca viprebhyo grāmāṃś ca nagarāṇi ca kṛtvā paurvāhṇikaṃ karma jagāma sa nṛpottamaḥ  BrP na cāśvo na padātiś ca na gajo na ca sārathiḥ ekākī sa mahāvelāṃ praviveśa mahīpatiḥ  BrP taṃ dadarśa mahāvṛkṣaṃ tejasvantaṃ mahādrumam mahātigamahārohaṃ puṇyaṃ vipulam eva ca  BrP mahotsedhaṃ mahākāyaṃ prasuptaṃ ca jalāntike sāndramāñjiṣṭhavarṇābhaṃ nāmajātivivarjitam  BrP naranāthas tadā viprā drumaṃ dṛṣṭvā mudānvitaḥ paraśunā śātayām āsa niśitena dṛḍhena ca  BrP dvaidhīkartumanās tatra babhūvendrasakhaḥ sa ca nirīkṣyamāṇe kāṣṭhe tu babhūvādbhutadarśanam  BrP viśvakarmā ca viṣṇuś ca viprarūpadharāv ubhau ājagmatur mahābhāgau tadā tulyāgrajanmanau  BrP jvalamānau svatejobhir divyasraganulepanau atha tau taṃ samāgamya nṛpam indrasakhaṃ tadā  BrP tāv ūcatur mahārāja kim atra tvaṃ kariṣyasi kimarthaṃ ca mahābāho śātitaś ca vanaspatiḥ  BrP asahāyo mahādurge nirjane gahane vane mahāsindhutaṭe caiva kathaṃ vai śātito drumaḥ  BrP brahmovāca tayoḥ śrutvā vaco viprāḥ sa tu rājā mudānvitaḥ babhāṣe vacanaṃ tābhyāṃ mṛdulaṃ madhuraṃ tathā  BrP dṛṣṭvā tau brāhmaṇau tatra candrasūryāv ivāgatau namaskṛtya jagannāthāv avāṅmukham avasthitaḥ  BrP rājovāca devadevam anādyantam anantaṃ jagatāṃ patim ārādhayituṃ pratimāṃ karomīti matir mama  BrP ahaṃ sa devadevena parameṇa mahātmanā svapnānte ca samuddiṣṭo bhavadbhyāṃ śrāvitaṃ mayā  BrP brahmovāca rājñas tu vacanaṃ śrutvā devendrapratimasya ca prahasya tasmai viśveśas tuṣṭo vacanam abravīt  BrP viṣṇur uvāca sādhu sādhu mahīpāla yad etan matam uttamam saṃsārasāgare ghore kadalīdalasaṃnibhe  BrP niḥsāre duḥkhabahule kāmakrodhasamākule indriyāvartakalile dustare romaharṣaṇe  BrP nānāvyādhiśatāvarte jalabudbudasaṃnibhe yatas te matir utpannā viṣṇor ārādhanāya vai  BrP dhanyas tvaṃ nṛpaśārdūla guṇaiḥ sarvair alaṃkṛtaḥ saprajā pṛthivī dhanyā saśailavanakānanā  BrP sapuragrāmanagarā caturvarṇair alaṃkṛtā yatra tvaṃ nṛpaśārdūla prajāḥ pālayitā prabhuḥ  BrP ehy ehi sumahābhāga drume smin sukhaśītale āvābhyāṃ saha tiṣṭha tvaṃ kathābhir dharmasaṃśritaḥ  BrP ayaṃ mama sahāyas tu āgataḥ śilpināṃ varaḥ viśvakarmasamaḥ sākṣān nipuṇaḥ sarvakarmasu mayoddiṣṭāṃ tu pratimāṃ karoty eṣa taṭaṃ tyaja  BrP brahmovāca śrutvaivaṃ vacanaṃ tasya tadā rājā dvijanmanaḥ sāgarasya taṭaṃ tyaktvā gatvā tasya samīpataḥ  BrP tasthau sa nṛpatiśreṣṭho vṛkṣacchāye suśītale tatas tasmai sa viśvātmā dadāv ājñāṃ dvijākṛtiḥ  BrP śilpimukhyāya viprendrāḥ kuruṣva pratimā iti kṛṣṇarūpaṃ paraṃ śāntaṃ padmapattrāyatekṣaṇam  BrP śrīvatsakaustubhadharaṃ śaṅkhacakragadādharam gaurāṅgaṃ kṣīravarṇābhaṃ dvitīyaṃ svastikāṅkitam  BrP lāṅgalāstradharaṃ devam anantākhyaṃ mahābalam devadānavagandharva yakṣavidyādharoragaiḥ  BrP na vijñāto hi tasyāntas tenānanta iti smṛtaḥ bhaginīṃ vāsudevasya rukmavarṇāṃ suśobhanām  BrP tṛtīyāṃ vai subhadrāṃ ca sarvalakṣaṇalakṣitām  BrP brahmovāca śrutvaitad vacanaṃ tasya viśvakarmā sukarmakṛt tatkṣaṇāt kārayām āsa pratimāḥ śubhalakṣaṇāḥ  BrP prathamaṃ śuklavarṇābhaṃ śāradendusamaprabham āraktākṣaṃ mahākāyaṃ sphaṭāvikaṭamastakam  BrP nīlāmbaradharaṃ cograṃ balaṃ balamadoddhatam kuṇḍalaikadharaṃ divyaṃ gadāmuśaladhāriṇam  BrP dvitīyaṃ puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ nīlajīmūtasaṃnibham atasīpuṣpasaṃkāśaṃ padmapattrāyatekṣaṇam  BrP pītavāsasam atyugraṃ śubhaṃ śrīvatsalakṣaṇam cakrapūrṇakaraṃ divyaṃ sarvapāpaharaṃ harim  BrP tṛtīyāṃ svarṇavarṇābhāṃ padmapattrāyatekṣaṇām vicitravastrasaṃchannāṃ hārakeyūrabhūṣitām  BrP vicitrābharaṇopetāṃ ratnahārāvalambitām pīnonnatakucāṃ ramyāṃ viśvakarmā vinirmame  BrP sa tu rājādbhutaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣaṇenaikena nirmitāḥ divyavastrayugacchannā nānāratnair alaṃkṛtāḥ  BrP sarvalakṣaṇasaṃpannāḥ pratimāḥ sumanoharāḥ vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatvā idaṃ vacanam abravīt  BrP indradyumna uvāca kiṃ devau samanuprāptau dvijarūpadharāv ubhau ubhau cādbhutakarmāṇau devavṛttāv amānuṣau  BrP devau vā mānuṣau vāpi yakṣavidyādharau yuvām kiṃ nu brahmahṛṣīkeśau kiṃ vasū kim utāśvinau  BrP na vedmi satyasadbhāvau māyārūpeṇa saṃsthitau yuvāṃ gato smi śaraṇam ātmā tu me prakāśyatām  BrP śrībhagavān uvāca nāhaṃ devo na yakṣo vā na daityo na ca devarāṭ na brahmā na ca rudro haṃ viddhi māṃ puruṣottamam  BrP artihā sarvalokānām anantabalapauruṣaḥ ārādhanīyo bhūtānām anto yasya na vidyate  BrP paṭhyate sarvaśāstreṣu hutabhuṅ nṛpa varuṇo pāṃ patiś cāhaṃ dharitrī ca mahīdharaḥ  BrP yat kiṃcid vāṅmayaṃ loke jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam carācaraṃ ca yad viśvaṃ madanyan nāsti kiṃcana  BrP prīto haṃ te nṛpaśreṣṭha varaṃ vāsudevasya vacanaṃ tasya bho dvijāḥ romāñcitatanur bhūtvā idaṃ stotraṃ jagau nṛpaḥ  BrP rājovāca śriyaḥ kānta namas te stu śrīpate pītavāsase śrīda śrīśa śrīnivāsa namas te śrīniketana  BrP ādyaṃ puruṣam īśānaṃ sarveśaṃ sarvatomukham niṣkalaṃ paramaṃ devaṃ praṇato smi sanātanam  BrP śabdātītaṃ guṇātītaṃ bhāvābhāvavivarjitam nirlepaṃ nirguṇaṃ sūkṣmaṃ sarvajñaṃ sarvabhāvanam  BrP prāvṛṇmeghapratīkāśaṃ gobrāhmaṇahite ratam sarveṣām eva goptāraṃ vyāpinaṃ sarvabhāvinam  BrP śaṅkhacakradharaṃ devaṃ gadāmuśaladhāriṇam namasye varadaṃ devaṃ nīlotpaladalacchavim  BrP nāgaparyaṅkaśayanaṃ kṣīrodārṇavaśāyinam namasye haṃ hṛṣīkeśaṃ sarvapāpaharaṃ harim  BrP punas tvāṃ devadeveśaṃ namasye varadaṃ vibhum sarvalokeśvaraṃ viṣṇuṃ mokṣakāraṇam avyayam  BrP brahmovāca evaṃ stutvā tu taṃ devaṃ praṇipatya kṛtāñjaliḥ uvāca praṇato bhūtvā nipatya dharaṇītale  BrP rājovāca prīto si yadi me nātha vṛṇomi varam uttamam devāsurāḥ sagandharvā yakṣarakṣomahoragāḥ  BrP siddhavidyādharāḥ sādhyāḥ kiṃnarā guhyakās tathā ṛṣayo ye mahābhāgā nānāśāstraviśāradāḥ  BrP parivrāḍyogayuktāś ca vedatattvārthacintakāḥ mokṣamārgavido ye nye dhyāyanti paramaṃ padam  BrP nirguṇaṃ  BrP parāt parataraṃ sūkṣmaṃ nirlepaṃ niṣkalaṃ dhruvam cintāśokavinirmuktaṃ kriyākāraṇavarjitam  BrP tad ahaṃ darśayiṣyāmi jñeyākhyaṃ paramaṃ padam yaṃ prāpya paramānandaṃ prāpsyasi paramāṃ gatim  BrP kīrtiś ca tava rājendra bhavaty atra mahītale yāvad ghanā nabho yāvad yāvac candrārkatārakam  BrP yāvat samudrāḥ saptaiva yāvan mervādiparvatāḥ tiṣṭhanti divi devāś ca tāvat sarvatra cāvyayā  BrP indradyumnasaro nāma tīrthaṃ yajñāṅgasaṃbhavam yatra snātvā sakṛl lokaḥ śakralokam avāpnuyāt  BrP dāpayiṣyati yaḥ piṇḍāṃs taṭe smin sarasaḥ śubhe kulaikaviṃśam uddhṛtya śakralokaṃ gamiṣyati  BrP pūjyamāno psarobhiś ca gandharvair gītanisvanaiḥ vimānena vaset tatra yāvad indrāś caturdaśa  BrP saraso dakṣiṇe bhāge nairṛtyāṃ tu samāśrite nyagrodhas tiṣṭhate tatra tatsamīpe tu maṇḍapaḥ  BrP ketakīvanasaṃchanno nānāpādapasaṃkulaḥ nārikelair asaṃkhyeyaiś campakair bakulāvṛtaiḥ  BrP aśokaiḥ karṇikāraiś ca puṃnāgair nāgakesaraiḥ pāṭalāmrātasaralaiś candanair devadārubhiḥ  BrP nyagrodhāśvatthakhadiraiḥ pārijātaiḥ sahārjunaiḥ hintālaiś caiva tālaiś ca śiṃśapair badarais tathā  BrP karañjair lakucaiḥ plakṣaiḥ panasair bilvadhātukaiḥ anyair bahuvidhair vṛkṣaiḥ śobhitaḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥ  BrP āṣāḍhasya site pakṣe pañcamyāṃ pitṛdaivate ṛkṣe neṣyanti nas tatra nītvā sapta dināni vai  BrP maṇḍape sthāpayiṣyanti suveśyābhiḥ suśobhanaiḥ krīḍāviśeṣabahulair nṛtyagītamanoharaiḥ  BrP cāmaraiḥ svarṇadaṇḍaiś ca vyajanai ratnabhūṣaṇaiḥ vījayantas tathāsmabhyaṃ sthāpayiṣyanti maṅgalāḥ  BrP brahmacārī yatiś caiva snātakāś ca dvijottamāḥ vānaprasthā gṛhasthāś ca siddhāś cānye ca tapaḥkṣayādihāgatya manuṣyo brāhmaṇo bhavet koṭīdhanapatiḥ śrīmāṃś caturvedī bhaved dhruvam  BrP brahmovāca evaṃ tasmai varaṃ dattvā kṛtvā ca samayaṃ hariḥ jagāmādarśanaṃ viprāḥ sahito viśvakarmaṇā  BrP sa tu rājā tadā hṛṣṭo romāñcitatanūruhaḥ kṛtakṛtyam ivātmānaṃ mene saṃdarśanād dhareḥ  BrP tataḥ kṛṣṇaṃ ca rāmaṃ ca subhadrāṃ ca varapradām rathair vimānasaṃkāśair maṇikāñcanacitritaiḥ  BrP saṃvāhya tās tadā rājā mahāmaṅgalaniḥsvanaiḥ ānayām āsa matimān sāmātyaḥ sapurohitaḥ  BrP nānāvāditranirghoṣair nānāvedasvanaiḥ śubhaiḥ saṃsthāpya ca śubhe deśe pavitre sumanohare  BrP tataḥ śubhatithau kāle nakṣatre śubhalakṣaṇe pratiṣṭhāṃ kārayām āsa sumuhūrte dvijaiḥ saha  BrP yathoktena vidhānena vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā ācāryānumatenaiva sarvaṃ kṛtvā mahīpatiḥ  BrP ācāryāya tadā dattvā dakṣiṇāṃ vidhivat prabhuḥ ṛtvigbhyaś ca vidhānena tathānyebhyo dhanaṃ dadau  BrP kṛtvā pratiṣṭhāṃ vidhivat prāsāde bhavanottame sthāpayām āsa tān sarvān vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā  BrP tataḥ saṃpūjya vidhinā nānāpuṣpaiḥ sugandhibhiḥ suvarṇamaṇimuktādyair nānāvastraiḥ suśobhanaiḥ  BrP ratnaiś ca vividhair divyair āsanair grāmapattanaiḥ dadau cānyān sa viṣayān purāṇi nagarāṇi ca  BrP evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ dattvā rājyaṃ kṛtvā yathocitam iṣṭvā ca vividhair yajñair dattvā dānāny anekaśaḥ  BrP kṛtakṛtyas tato rājā tyaktasarvaparigrahaḥ jagāma paramaṃ sthānaṃ tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam  BrP evaṃ mayā muniśreṣṭhāḥ kathito vo nṛpottamaḥ kṣetrasya caiva māhātmyaṃ kim anyac chrotum icchatha  BrP viṣṇur uvāca śrutvaivaṃ vacanaṃ tasya brahmaṇo vyaktajanmanaḥ āścaryaṃ menire viprāḥ papracchuś ca punar mudā  BrP munaya ūcuḥ kasmin kāle suraśreṣṭha gantavyaṃ puruṣottamam vidhinā kena kartavyaṃ pañcatīrtham iti prabho  BrP ekaikasya ca tīrthasya snānadānasya yat phalam devatāprekṣaṇe caiva brūhi sarvapāpavinirmukto viṣṇulokaṃ vrajen naraḥ  BrP cakraṃ dṛṣṭvā harer dūrāt prāsādopari saṃsthitam sahasā mucyate pāpān naro bhaktyā praṇamya tat  BrP brahmovāca āsīt kalpe muniśreṣṭhāḥ saṃpravṛtte sarvatoyeṣu saraḥsu ca saritsu ca  BrP tataḥ saṃvartako vahnir vāyunā saha bho dvijāḥ lokaṃ tu prāviśat sarvam ādityair upaśobhitam  BrP paścāt sa pṛthivīṃ bhittvā praviśya ca rasātalam devadānavayakṣāṇāṃ bhayaṃ janayate mahat  BrP nirdahan nāgalokaṃ ca yac ca kiṃcit kṣitāv iha adhastān muniśārdūlāḥ sarvaṃ nāśayate kṣaṇāt  BrP tato yojanaviṃśānāṃ sahasrāṇi śatāni ca nirdahaty āśugo BrP ekaḥ saṃtiṣṭhate viprā mārkaṇḍeyeti viśrutaḥ mohapāśair nibaddho sau kṣuttṛṣṇākulitendriyāḥ  BrP sa dṛṣṭvā taṃ mahāvahniṃ śuṣkakaṇṭhauṣṭhatālukaḥ tṛṣṇārtaḥ praskhalan viprās tadāsau bhayavihvalaḥ  BrP babhrāma pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ kāṃdiśīko vicetanaḥ trātāraṃ nādhigacchan vai itaś cetaś ca dhāvati  BrP na lebhe ca tadā śarma yatra viśrāmyatā dvijāḥ karomi kiṃ na jānāmi yasyāhaṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje  BrP romakūpāṇi viddhi tvaṃ dvijasattama ratnākarāḥ samudrāś ca sarva eva caturdiśaḥ  BrP vasanaṃ śayanaṃ caiva nilayaṃ caiva viddhi me kāmaḥ krodhaś ca harṣaś ca bhayaṃ mohas tathaiva ca  BrP mamaiva viddhi rūpāṇi sarvāṇy etāni sattama prāpnuvanti narā vipra yat kṛtvā karma śobhanam  BrP satyaṃ dānaṃ tapaś cogram ahiṃsāṃ sarvajantuṣu madvidhānena vihitā mama dehavicāriṇaḥ  BrP mayābhibhūtavijñānāś ceṣṭayanti na kāmataḥ samyag vedam adhīyānā yajanto vividhair makhaiḥ  BrP śāntātmāno jitakrodhāḥ prāpnuvanti dvijātayaḥ prāptuṃ śakyo na caivāhaṃ narair duṣkṛtakarmabhiḥ  BrP lobhābhibhūtaiḥ kṛpaṇair anāryair akṛtātmabhiḥ tan māṃ mahāphalaṃ viddhi narāṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām  BrP suduṣprāpaṃ vimūḍhānāṃ māṃ kuyoganiṣeviṇām yadā yadā hi dharmasya glānir bhavati sattama  BrP abhyutthānam adharmasya tadātmānaṃ sṛjāmy aham daityā hiṃsānuraktāś ca avadhyāḥ surasattamaiḥ  BrP rākṣasāś cāpi loke smin yadotpatsyanti dāruṇāḥ tadāhaṃ saṃprasūyāmi gṛheṣu puṇyakarmaṇām  BrP praviṣṭo mānuṣaṃ dehaṃ sarvaṃ praśamayāmy aham sṛṣṭvā devamanuṣyāṃś ca gandharvoragarākṣasān  BrP sthāvarāṇi ca bhūtāni saṃharāmy ātmamāyayā karmakāle punar deham anucintya sṛjāmy aham  BrP āviśya mānuṣaṃ dehaṃ maryādābandhakāraṇāt śvetaḥ kṛtayuge dharmaḥ śyāmas tretāyuge mama  BrP rakto dvāparam āsādya kṛṣṇaḥ kaliyuge tathā trayo bhāgā hy adharmasya tasmin kāle bhavanti ca  BrP antakāle ca saṃprāpte kālo bhūtvātidāruṇaḥ trailokyaṃ nāśayāmy ekaḥ sarvaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam  BrP ahaṃ tridharmā viśvātmā sarvalokasukhāvahaḥ abhinnaḥ sarvago nanto hṛṣīkeśa urukramaḥ  BrP kālacakraṃ nayāmy eko brahmarūpaṃ mamaiva tat śamanaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ sarvabhūtakṛtodyamam  BrP evaṃ praṇihitaḥ samyaṅ mamātmā munisattama sarvabhūteṣu viprendra na ca māṃ vetti kaścana  BrP sarvaloke ca māṃ bhaktāḥ pūjayanti ca sarvaśaḥ yac ca kiṃcit tvayā prāptaṃ mayi kleśātmakaṃ dvija  BrP sukhodayāya tat sarvaṃ śreyase ca tavānagha yac ca kiṃcit tvayā loke dṛṣṭaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam  BrP vihitaḥ sarva evāsau mayātmā bhūtabhāvanaḥ ahaṃ nārāyaṇo nāma śaṅkhacakragadādharaḥ  BrP yāvad yugānāṃ viprarṣe sahasraṃ parivartate tāvat svapimi viśvātmā sarvaviśvāni mohayan  BrP evaṃ sarvam ahaṃ kālam ihāse munisattama aśiśuḥ śiśurūpeṇa yāvad brahmā na budhyate  BrP mayā ca datto viprendra varas te brahmarūpiṇā asakṛt parituṣṭena viprarṣigaṇapūjita  BrP sarvam ekārṇavaṃ kṛtvā naṣṭe sthāvarajaṅgame nirgato si mayājñātas tatas te darśitaṃ jagat  BrP abhyantaraṃ śarīrasya praviṣṭo si yadā mama dṛṣṭvā lokaṃ samastaṃ hi vismito nāvabudhyase  BrP tato si vaktrād viprarṣe drutaṃ niḥsārito mayā ākhyātas te mayā cātmā durjñeyo hi surāsuraiḥ  BrP yāvat sa bhagavān brahmā na budhyeta mahātapāḥ tāvat tvam iha viprarṣe viśrabdhaś cara vai sukham  BrP tato vibuddhe tasmiṃs tu sarvalokapitāmahe eko bhūtāni srakṣyāmi śarīrāṇi dvijottama  BrP ākāśaṃ pṛthivīṃ jyotir vāyuḥ salilam eva ca loke yac ca bhavet kiṃcid iha sthāvarajaṅgamam  BrP brahmovāca evam uktvā tadā viprāḥ punas taṃ prāha mādhavaḥ pūrṇe yugasahasre tu meghagambhīranisvanaḥ  BrP śrībhagavān uvāca mune brūhi yadarthaṃ māṃ stutavān paramārthataḥ varaṃ vṛṇīṣva yac chreṣṭhaṃ dadāmi nacirād aham  BrP āyuṣmān asi devānāṃ madbhakto si dṛḍhavrataḥ tena tvam asi viprendra punar dīrghāyur āpnuhi  BrP brahmovāca śrutvā vāṇīṃ śubhāṃ tasya vilokya sa tadā punaḥ mūrdhnā nipatya sahasā praṇamya punar abravīt  BrP mārkaṇḍeya uvāca dṛṣṭaṃ paraṃ hi deveśa tava rūpaṃ dvijottama moho yaṃ vigataḥ satyaṃ tvayi dṛṣṭe tu me hare  BrP evam evam ahaṃ nātha iccheyaṃ tvatprasādataḥ lokānāṃ ca hitārthāya nānābhāvapraśāntaye  BrP śaivabhāgavatānāṃ ca vādārthapratiṣedhakam asmin kṣetravare puṇye nirmale puruṣottame  BrP śivasyāyatanaṃ deva karomi paramaṃ mahat pratiṣṭheya tathā tatra tava sthāne ca śaṃkaram  BrP tato jñāsyanti loke sminn ekamūrtī harīśvarau pratyuvāca jagannāthaḥ sa punas taṃ mahāmunim  BrP śrībhagavān uvāca yad etat paramaṃ devaṃ kāraṇaṃ bhuvaneśvaram liṅgam ārādhanārthāya nānābhāvapraśāntaye  BrP mamādiṣṭena viprendra kuru śīghraṃ śivālayam tatprabhāvāc chivaloke tiṣṭha tvaṃ ca tathākṣayam  BrP śive saṃsthāpite vipra mama saṃsthāpanaṃ bhavet nāvayor antaraṃ kiṃcid ekabhāvau dvidhā kṛtau  BrP yo rudraḥ sa svayaṃ viṣṇur yo viṣṇuḥ sa maheśvaraḥ ubhayor antaraṃ nāsti pavanākāśayor iva  BrP mohito nābhijānāti ya eva garuḍadhvajaḥ vṛṣadhvajaḥ sa eveti tripuraghnaṃ trilocanam  BrP tava nāmāṅkitaṃ tasmāt kuru vipra śivālayam uttare devadevasya kuru tīrthaṃ suśobhanam  BrP mārkaṇḍeyahrado nāma naralokeṣu viśrutaḥ bhaviṣyati dvijaśreṣṭha sarvapāpapraṇāśanaḥ  BrP brahmovāca ity uktvā sa tadā devas tatraivāntaradhīyata mārkaṇḍeyaṃ muniśreṣṭhāḥ sarvavyāpī janārdanaḥ  BrP brahmovāca ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi pañcatīrthavidhiṃ dvijāḥ yat phalaṃ snānadānena devatāprekṣaṇena ca  BrP mārkaṇḍeyahradaṃ gatvā naraś codaṅmukhaḥ śuciḥ nimajjet tatra vārāṃs trīn imaṃ mantram udīrayet  BrP saṃsārasāgare magnaṃ pāpagrastam acetanam trāhi māṃ bhaganetraghna tripurāre namo stu te  BrP namaḥ śivāya śāntāya sarvapāpaharāya ca snānaṃ karomi deveśa mama naśyatu pātakam  BrP nābhimātre jale snātvā vidhivad devatā ṛṣīn tilodakena matimān pitṝṃś cānyāṃś ca tarpayet  BrP snātvā tathaiva cācamya tato gacchec chivālayam praviśya devatāgāraṃ kṛtvā taṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇam  BrP mūlamantreṇa saṃpūjya mārkaṇḍeyasya ceśvaram aghoreṇa ca bho viprāḥ praṇipatya prasādayet  BrP trilocana namas te stu namas te śaśibhūṣaṇa trāhi māṃ tvaṃ virūpākṣa mahādeva namo stu te  BrP mārkaṇḍeyahrade tv evaṃ snātvā dṛṣṭvā ca śaṃkaram daśānām aśvamedhānāṃ phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ  BrP pāpaiḥ sarvair vinirmuktaḥ śivalokaṃ sa gacchati tatra bhuktvā varān bhogān yāvad ābhūtasaṃplavam  BrP ihalokaṃ samāsādya bhaved vipro bahuśrutaḥ śāṃkaraṃ yogam āsādya tato mokṣam avāpnuyāt  BrP kalpavṛkṣaṃ tato gatvā kṛtvā taṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇam pūjayet parayā bhaktyā mantreṇānena taṃ vaṭam  BrP oṃ namo vyaktarūpāya mahāpralayakāriṇe mahadrasopaviṣṭāya nyagrodhāya namo stu te  BrP amaras tvaṃ sadā kalpe hareś cāyatanaṃ vaṭa nyagrodha hara me pāpaṃ kalpavṛkṣa namo stu te  BrP bhaktyā pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā natvā kalpavaṭaṃ naraḥ sahasā mucyate pāpāj jīrṇatvaca ivoragaḥ  BrP chāyāṃ tasya samākramya kalpavṛkṣasya bho dvijāḥ brahmahatyāṃ naro jahyāt pāpeṣv anyeṣu kā kathā  BrP dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇāṅgasaṃbhūtaṃ brahmatejomayaṃ param nyagrodhākṛtikaṃ viṣṇuṃ praṇipatya ca bho dvijāḥ  BrP rājasūyāśvamedhābhyāṃ phalaṃ prāpnoti cādhikam tathā svavaṃśam uddhṛtya viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati  BrP vainateyaṃ namaskṛtya kṛṣṇasya purataḥ sthitam sarvapāpavinirmuktas tato viṣṇupuraṃ vrajet  BrP dṛṣṭvā vaṭaṃ vainateyaṃ yaḥ paśyet puruṣottamam saṃkarṣaṇaṃ subhadrāṃ ca sa yāti paramāṃ gatim  BrP praviśyāyatanaṃ viṣṇoḥ kṛtvā taṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇam saṃkarṣaṇaṃ svamantreṇa bhaktyāpūjya prasādayet  BrP namas te haladhṛg rāma namas te muśalāyudha namas te revatīkānta namas te bhaktavatsala  BrP namas te balināṃ śreṣṭha namas te dharaṇīdhara pralambāre namas te stu trāhi māṃ kṛṣṇapūrvaja  BrP evaṃ prasādya cānantam ajeyaṃ tridaśārcitam kailāsaśikharākāraṃ candrāt kāntatarānanam  BrP nīlavastradharaṃ devaṃ phaṇāvikaṭamastakam mahābalaṃ haladharaṃ kuṇḍalaikavibhūṣitam  BrP rauhiṇeyaṃ naro bhaktyā labhed abhimataṃ phalam sarvapāpair vinirmukto viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati  BrP ābhūtasaṃplavaṃ yāvad bhuktvā tatra sukhaṃ naraḥ puṇyakṣayād ihāgatya pravare yogināṃ kule  BrP brāhmaṇapravaro bhūtvā sarvaśāstrārthapāragaḥ jñānaṃ tatra samāsādya muktiṃ prāpnoti durlabhām  BrP evam abhyarcya halinaṃ tataḥ kṛṣṇaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ dvādaśākṣaramantreṇa pūjayet susamāhitaḥ  BrP dviṣaṭkavarṇamantreṇa bhaktyā ye puruṣottamam pūjayanti sadā dhīrās te mokṣaṃ prāpnuvanti vai  BrP na tāṃ gatiṃ surā yānti yogino naiva somapāḥ yāṃ gatiṃ yānti bho viprā dvādaśākṣaratatparāḥ  BrP tasmāt tenaiva mantreṇa bhaktyā kṛṣṇaṃ jagadgurum saṃpūjya gandhapuṣpādyaiḥ praṇipatya prasādayet  BrP jaya kṛṣṇa jagannātha jaya sarvāghanāśana jaya cāṇūrakeśighna jaya kaṃsaniṣūdana  BrP jaya padmapalāśākṣa jaya cakragadādhara jaya nīlāmbudaśyāma jaya sarvasukhaprada  BrP jaya deva jagatpūjya jaya saṃsāranāśana jaya lokapate nātha jaya vāñchāphalaprada  BrP saṃsārasāgare ghore niḥsāre duḥkhaphenile krodhagrāhākule raudre viṣayodakasaṃplave  BrP nānārogormikalile mohāvartasudustare nimagno haṃ suraśreṣṭha trāhi māṃ puruṣottama  BrP evaṃ prasādya deveśaṃ varadaṃ bhaktavatsalam sarvapāpaharaṃ devaṃ sarvakāmaphalapradam  BrP pīnāṃsaṃ dvibhujaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ padmapattrāyatekṣaṇam mahoraskaṃ mahābāhuṃ pītavastraṃ śubhānanam  BrP śaṅkhacakragadāpāṇiṃ mukuṭāṅgadabhūṣaṇam sarvalakṣaṇasaṃyuktaṃ vanamālāvibhūṣitam  BrP dṛṣṭvā naro ñjaliṃ kṛtvā daṇḍavat praṇipatya ca aśvamedhasahasrāṇāṃ phalaṃ prāpnoti vai dvijāḥ  BrP yat phalaṃ sarvatīrtheṣu snāne dāne prakīrtitam naras tat phalam āpnoti dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ praṇamya ca  BrP yat phalaṃ sarvaratnādyair iṣṭe bahusuvarṇake naras tat phalam āpnoti dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ praṇamya ca  BrP yat phalaṃ sarvavedeṣu sarvayajñeṣu yat phalam tat phalaṃ samavāpnoti naraḥ kṛṣṇaṃ praṇamya ca  BrP yat phalaṃ sarvadānena vratena niyamena ca naras tat phalam āpnoti dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ praṇamya ca  BrP tapobhir vividhair ugrair yat phalaṃ samudāhṛtam naras tat phalam āpnoti dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ praṇamya ca  BrP yat phalaṃ brahmacaryeṇa samyak cīrṇena tatkṛtam naras tat phalam āpnoti dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ praṇamya ca  BrP yat phalaṃ ca gṛhasthasya yathoktācāravartinaḥ naras tat phalam āpnoti dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ praṇamya ca  BrP yat phalaṃ vanavāsena vānaprasthasya kīrtitam naras tat phalam āpnoti dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ praṇamya ca  BrP saṃnyāsena yathoktena yat phalaṃ samudāhṛtam naras tat phalam āpnoti dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ praṇamya ca  BrP kiṃ cātra bahunoktena māhātmye tasya bho dvijāḥ dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ naro bhaktyā mokṣaṃ prāpnoti durlabham  BrP pāpair vimuktaḥ śuddhātmā kalpakoṭisamudbhavaiḥ śriyā paramayā yuktaḥ sarvaiḥ samudito guṇaiḥ  BrP sarvakāmasamṛddhena vimānena suvarcasā trisaptakulam uddhṛtya naro viṣṇupuraṃ vrajet  BrP tatra kalpaśataṃ yāvad bhuktvā bhogān manoramān gandharvāpsarasaiḥ sārdhaṃ yathā viṣṇuś caturbhujaḥ  BrP cyutas tasmād ihāyāto viprāṇāṃ pravare kule sarvajñaḥ sarvavedī ca jāyate gatamatsaraḥ  BrP svadharmanirataḥ śānto dātā bhūtahite rataḥ āsādya vaiṣṇavaṃ jñānaṃ tato muktim avāpnuyāt  BrP tataḥ saṃpūjya mantreṇa subhadrāṃ bhaktavatsalām prasādayet tato viprāḥ praṇipatya kṛtāñjaliḥ  BrP namas te sarvage devi namas te śubhasaukhyade trāhi māṃ padmapattrākṣi kātyāyani namo stu te  BrP evaṃ prasādya tāṃ devīṃ jagaddhātrīṃ jagaddhitām baladevasya bhaginīṃ subhadrāṃ varadāṃ śivām  BrP kāmagena vimānena naro viṣṇupuraṃ vrajet ābhūtasaṃplavaṃ yāvat krīḍitvā tatra devavat  BrP iha mānuṣatāṃ prāpto brāhmaṇo vedavid bhavet prāpya yogaṃ hares tatra mokṣaṃ ca labhate dhruvam  BrP brahmovāca evaṃ dṛṣṭvā balaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ subhadrāṃ praṇipatya ca dharmaṃ cārthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca mokṣaṃ ca labhate dhruvam  BrP niṣkramya devatāgārāt kṛtakṛtyo bhaven naraḥ praṇamyāyatanaṃ paścād vrajet tatra samāhitaḥ  BrP indranīlamayo viṣṇur yatrāste vālukāvṛtaḥ antardhānagataṃ natvā tato viṣṇupuraṃ vrajet  BrP sarvadevamayo yo sau hatavān asurottamam sa āste tatra bho viprāḥ siṃhārdhakṛtavigrahaḥ  BrP bhaktyā dṛṣṭvā tu taṃ devaṃ praṇamya narakesarīm mucyate pātakair martyaḥ samastair nātra saṃśayaḥ  BrP narasiṃhasya ye bhaktā bhavanti bhuvi mānavāḥ na teṣāṃ duṣkṛtaṃ kiṃcit phalaṃ syād yad yad īpsitam  BrP tasmāt sarvaprayatnena narasiṃhaṃ samāśrayet dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ phalaṃ yasmāt prayacchati  BrP munaya ūcuḥ māhātmyaṃ narasiṃhasya sukhadaṃ bhuvi durlabham yathā kathayase deva tena no vismayo mahān  BrP prabhāvaṃ tasya devasya vistareṇa jagatpate śrotum icchāmahe brūhi paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi naḥ  BrP yathā prasīded devo sau narasiṃho mahābalaḥ bhaktānām upakārāya brūhi deva namo stu te  BrP prasādān narasiṃhasya yā bhavanty atra siddhayaḥ brūhi tāḥ kuru cāsmākaṃ prasādaṃ prapitāmaha  BrP brahmovāca śṛṇudhvaṃ tasya bho viprāḥ prabhāvaṃ gadato mama ajitasyāprameyasya bhuktimuktipradasya ca  BrP kaḥ śaknoti guṇān vaktuṃ samastāṃs tasya bho dvijāḥ siṃhārdhakṛtadehasya pravakṣyāmi samāsataḥ  BrP yāḥ kāścit siddhayaś cātra śrūyante daivamānuṣāḥ prasādāt tasya tāḥ sarvāḥ sidhyanti nātra saṃśayaḥ  BrP svarge martye ca pātāle dikṣu toye pure nage prasādāt tasya devasya bhavaty avyāhatā gatiḥ  BrP asādhyaṃ tasya devasya nāsty atra sacarācare narasiṃhasya bho viprāḥ sadā bhaktānukampinaḥ  BrP vidhānaṃ tasya vakṣyāmi bhaktānām upakārakam yena prasīdec caivāsau siṃhārdhakṛtavigrahaḥ  BrP śṛṇudhvaṃ muniśārdūlāḥ kalparājaṃ sanātanam narasiṃhasya tattvaṃ ca yan na jñātaṃ surāsuraiḥ  BrP śākayāvakamūlais tu phalapiṇyākasaktukaiḥ payobhakṣeṇa viprendrā vartayet sādhakottamaḥ  BrP kośakaupīnavāsāś ca dhyānayukto jitendriyaḥ araṇye vijane deśe parvate sindhusaṃgame  BrP ūṣare siddhakṣetre ca narasiṃhāśrame tathā pratiṣṭhāpya svayaṃ vāpi pūjāṃ kṛtvā vidhānataḥ  BrP dvādaśyāṃ śuklapakṣasya upoṣya munipuṃgavāḥ japel lakṣāṇi vai viṃśan manasā saṃyatendriyaḥ  BrP upapātakayuktaś ca mahāpātakasaṃyutaḥ mukto bhavet tato viprāḥ sādhako nātra saṃśayaḥ  BrP kṛtvā pradakṣiṇaṃ tatra narasiṃhaṃ prapūjayet puṇyagandhādibhir dhūpaiḥ praṇamya śirasā prabhum  BrP karpūracandanāktāni jātīpuṣpāṇi mastake pradadyān narasiṃhasya tataḥ siddhiḥ prajāyate  BrP bhagavān sarvakāryeṣu na kvacit pratihanyate tejaḥ soḍhuṃ na śaktāḥ syur brahmarudrādayaḥ surāḥ  BrP kiṃ punar dānavā loke siddhagandharvamānuṣāḥ vidyādharā yakṣagaṇāḥ sakiṃnaramahoragāḥ  BrP mantraṃ yān āsurān hantuṃ japanty eke nyasādhakāḥ te sarve pralayaṃ yānti dṛṣṭvādityāgnivarcasaḥ  BrP sakṛjjaptaṃ tu kavacaṃ rakṣet sarvam upadravam dvirjaptaṃ kavacaṃ divyaṃ rakṣate devadānavāt  BrP gandharvāḥ prakurvīta mūlamantreṇa mantravit  BrP aṣṭāviṃśatim aṣṭau vā śatam aṣṭottaraṃ tathā kāmeṣu ca yathāproktaṃ yathāśakti samāhitaḥ  BrP padmaṃ śaṅkhaś ca śrīvatso gadā garuḍa eva ca cakraṃ khaḍgaś ca śārṅgaṃ ca aṣṭau mudrāḥ prakīrtitāḥ  BrP visarjanamantraḥ gaccha gaccha paraṃ sthānaṃ purāṇapuruṣottama yatra brahmādayo devā vindanti paramaṃ padam  BrP arcanaṃ ye na jānanti harer mantrair yathoditam te tatra mūlamantreṇa pūjayantv acyutaṃ sadā  BrP brahmovāca evaṃ saṃpūjya vidhivad bhaktyā taṃ puruṣottamam praṇamya śirasā paścāt sāgaraṃ ca prasādayet  BrP prāṇas tvaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ yoniś ca saritāṃ pate tīrtharāja namas te stu trāhi mām acyutapriya  BrP snātvaivaṃ sāgare samyak tasmin kṣetravare dvijāḥ tīre cābhyarcya vidhivan nārāyaṇam anāmayam  BrP rāmaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ subhadrāṃ ca praṇipatya ca sāgaram śatānām aśvamedhānāṃ phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ  BrP sarvapāpavinirmuktaḥ sarvaduḥkhavivarjitaḥ vṛndāraka iva śrīmān rūpayauvanagarvitaḥ  BrP vimānenārkavarṇena divyagandharvanādinā kulaikaviṃśam uddhṛtya viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati  BrP bhuktvā tatra varān bhogān krīḍitvā cāpsaraiḥ saha manvantaraśataṃ sāgraṃ jarāmṛtyuvivarjitaḥ  BrP puṇyakṣayād ihāyātaḥ kule sarvaguṇānvite rūpavān subhagaḥ śrīmān satyavādī jitendriyaḥ  BrP vedaśāstrārthavid vipro bhaved yajvā tu vaiṣṇavaḥ yogaṃ ca vaiṣṇavaṃ prāpya tato mokṣam avāpnuyāt  BrP grahoparāge saṃkrāntyām ayane viṣuve tathā yugādiṣu ṣaḍaśītyāṃ vyatīpāte dinakṣaye  BrP āṣāḍhyāṃ caiva kārttikyāṃ māghyāṃ vānye śubhe tithau ye tatra dānaṃ viprebhyaḥ prayacchanti sumedhasaḥ  BrP phalaṃ sahasraguṇitam anyatīrthāl labhanti te pitṝṇāṃ ye prayacchanti piṇḍaṃ tatra vidhānataḥ  BrP akṣayāṃ pitaras teṣāṃ tṛptiṃ saṃprāpnuvanti vai evaṃ snānaphalaṃ samyak sāgarasya mayoditam  BrP dānasya ca phalaṃ viprāḥ piṇḍadānasya caiva hi dharmārthamokṣaphaladam āyuṣkīrtiyaśaskaram  BrP bhuktimuktiphalaṃ nṝṇāṃ dhanyaṃ duḥsvapnanāśanam sarvapāpaharaṃ puṇyaṃ sarvakāmaphalapradam  BrP nāstikāya na vaktavyaṃ purāṇaṃ ca dvijottamāḥ tāvad garjanti tīrthāni māhātmyaiḥ svaiḥ pṛthak pṛthak  BrP yāvan na tīrtharājasya māhātmyaṃ varṇyate dvijāḥ puṣkarādīni tīrthāni prayacchanti svakaṃ phalam  BrP tīrtharājas tu sa punaḥ sarvatīrthaphalapradaḥ bhūtale yāni tīrthāni saritaś ca sarāṃsi ca  BrP viśanti sāgare tāni tenāsau śreṣṭhatāṃ gataḥ rājā samastatīrthānāṃ sāgaraḥ saritāṃ patiḥ  BrP tasmāt samastatīrthebhyaḥ śreṣṭho sau sarvakāmadaḥ tamo nāśaṃ yathābhyeti bhāskare bhyudite dvijāḥ  BrP snānena tīrtharājasya tathā pāpasya saṃkṣayaḥ tīrtharājasamaṃ tīrthaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati  BrP adhiṣṭhānaṃ yadā yatra prabhor nārāyaṇasya vai kaḥ śaknoti guṇān vaktuṃ tīrtharājasya bho dvijāḥ  BrP koṭyo navanavatyas tu yatra tīrthāni santi vai tasmāt snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca homaṃ japyaṃ surārcanam yat kiṃcit kriyate tatra cākṣayaṃ kriyate dvijāḥ  BrP brahmovāca tato gacched dvijaśreṣṭhās tīrthaṃ yajñāṅgasaṃbhavam indradyumnasaro nāma yatrāste pāvanaṃ śubham  BrP gatvā tatra śucir dhīmān ācamya manasā harim dhyātvopasthāya ca jalam imaṃ mantram udīrayet  BrP aśvamedhāṅgasaṃbhūta tīrtha sarvāghanāśana snānaṃ tvayi karomy adya pāpaṃ hara namo stu te  BrP evam uccārya vidhivat snātvā devān ṛṣīn pitṝn tilodakena cānyāṃś ca saṃtarpyācamya vāgyataḥ  BrP dattvā pitṝṇāṃ piṇḍāṃś ca saṃpūjya puruṣottamam daśāśvamedhikaṃ samyak phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ  BrP saptāvarān sapta parān vaṃśān uddhṛtya devavat kāmagena vimānena viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati  BrP bhuktvā tatra sukhān bhogān yāvac candrārkatārakam cyutas tasmād ihāyāto mokṣaṃ ca labhate dhruvam  BrP evaṃ kṛtvā pañcatīrthīm ekādaśyām upoṣitaḥ jyeṣṭhaśuklapañcadaśyāṃ yaḥ paśyet puruṣottamam  BrP sa pūrvoktaṃ phalaṃ prāpya krīḍitvā vācyutālaye prayāti paramaṃ sthānaṃ yasmān nāvartate punaḥ  BrP munaya ūcuḥ māsān anyān parityajya māghādīn prapitāmaha praśaṃsasi kathaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ brūhi tatkāraṇaṃ prabho  BrP brahmovāca śṛṇudhvaṃ muniśārdūlāḥ pravakṣyāmi samāsataḥ jyeṣṭhaṃ māsaṃ yathā tebhyaḥ praśaṃsāmi punaḥ punaḥ  BrP pṛthivyāṃ yāni tīrthāni saritaś ca sarāṃsi ca puṣkariṇyas taḍāgāni vāpyaḥ kūpās tathā hradāḥ  BrP nānānadyaḥ samudrāś ca saptāhaṃ puruṣottame jyeṣṭhaśukladaśamyādi pratyakṣaṃ yānti sarvadā  BrP snānadānādikaṃ tasmād devatāprekṣaṇaṃ dvijāḥ yat kiṃcit kriyate tatra tasmin kāle kṣayaṃ bhavet  BrP śuklapakṣasya daśamī jyeṣṭhe māsi dvijottamāḥ harate daśa pāpāni tasmād daśaharā smṛtā  BrP yas tasyāṃ halinaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ paśyed bhadrāṃ susaṃyataḥ sarvapāpavinirmukto viṣṇulokaṃ vrajen naraḥ  BrP uttare dakṣiṇe viprās tv ayane puruṣottamam dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ subhadrāṃ ca viṣṇulokaṃ vrajen naraḥ  BrP naro dolāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā govindaṃ puruṣottamam phālgunyāṃ prayato bhūtvā govindasya puraṃ vrajet  BrP viṣuvaddivase prāpte pañcatīrthīṃ vidhānataḥ kṛtvā saṃkarṣaṇaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhadrāṃ ca bho dvijāḥ  BrP naraḥ samastayajñānāṃ phalaṃ prāpnoti durlabham vimuktaḥ sarvapāpebhyo viṣṇulokaṃ ca gacchati  BrP yaḥ paśyati tṛtīyāyāṃ kṛṣṇaṃ candanarūṣitam vaiśākhasyāsite pakṣe sa yāty acyutamandiram  BrP jyaiṣṭhyāṃ jyeṣṭharkṣayuktāyāṃ yaḥ paśyet puruṣottamam kulaikaviṃśam uddhṛtya viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati  BrP brahmovāca yadā bhaven mahājyaiṣṭhī rāśinakṣatrayogataḥ prayatnena tadā martyair gantavyaṃ puruṣottamam  BrP kṛṣṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahājyaiṣṭhyāṃ rāmaṃ bhadrāṃ ca bho dvijāḥ naro dvādaśayātrāyāḥ phalaṃ prāpnoti cādhikam  BrP prayāge ca kurukṣetre naimiṣe puṣkare gaye gaṅgādvāre kuśāvarte gaṅgāsāgarasaṃgame  BrP kokāmukhe śūkare ca mathurāyāṃ marusthale śālagrāme vāyutīrthe mandare sindhusāgare  BrP piṇḍārake citrakūṭe prabhāse kanakhale dvijāḥ śaṅkhoddhāre dvārakāyāṃ tathā badarikāśrame  BrP lohakuṇḍe cāśvatīrthe sarvapāpapramocane kāmālaye koṭitīrthe tathā cāmarakaṇṭake  BrP lohārgale jambumārge somatīrthe pṛthūdake utpalāvartake caiva pṛthutuṅge sukubjake  BrP ekāmrake ca kedāre kāśyāṃ ca viraje dvijāḥ kālañjare ca gokarṇe śrīśaile gandhamādane  BrP mahendre malaye vindhye pāriyātre himālaye sahye ca śuktimante ca gomante cārbude tathā  BrP gaṅgāyāṃ sarvatīrtheṣu yāmuneṣu ca bho dvijāḥ sārasvateṣu gomatyāṃ brahmaputreṣu saptasu  BrP godāvarī bhīmarathī tuṅgabhadrā ca narmadā tāpī payouṣṇī kāverī śiprā carmaṇvatī dvijāḥ  BrP vitastā candrabhāgā ca śatadrur bāhudā tathā ṛṣikulyā kumārī ca vipāśā ca dṛṣadvatī  BrP śarayūr nākagaṅgā ca gaṇḍakī ca mahānadī kauśikī karatoyā ca trisrotā madhuvāhinī  BrP mahānadī vaitaraṇī yāś cānyā nānukīrtitāḥ athavā kiṃ bahūktena bhāṣitena dvijottamāḥ  BrP pṛthivyāṃ sarvatīrtheṣu sarveṣv āyataneṣu ca sāgareṣu ca śaileṣu nadīṣu ca saraḥsu ca  BrP yat phalaṃ snānadānena rāhugraste divākare tat phalaṃ kṛṣṇam ālokya mahājyaiṣṭhyāṃ labhen naraḥ  BrP tasmāt sarvaprayatnena gantavyaṃ puruṣottame mahājyaiṣṭhyāṃ muniśreṣṭhā sarvakāmaphalepsubhiḥ  BrP dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ mahājyeṣṭhaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ subhadrayā saha viṣṇulokaṃ naro yāti samuddhṛtya samaṃ kulam  BrP bhuktvā tatra varān bhogān yāvad ābhūtasaṃplavam puṇyakṣayād ihāgatya caturvedī dvijo bhavet  BrP svadharmanirataḥ śāntaḥ kṛṣṇabhakto jitendriyaḥ vaiṣṇavaṃ yogam āsthāya tato mokṣam avāpnuyāt  BrP munaya ūcuḥ kasmin kāle bhavet snānaṃ kṛṣṇasya kamalodbhava vidhinā kena tad brūhi tato vidhividāṃ vara  BrP brahmovāca śṛṇudhvaṃ munayaḥ snānaṃ kṛṣṇasya vadato mama rāmasya ca subhadrāyāḥ puṇyaṃ sarvāghanāśanam  BrP māsi jyeṣṭhe ca saṃprāpte nakṣatre candradaivate paurṇamāsyāṃ tadā snānaṃ sarvakālaṃ harer dvijāḥ  BrP sarvatīrthamayaḥ kūpas tatrāste nirmalaḥ śuciḥ tadā bhogavatī tatra pratyakṣā bhavati dvijāḥ  BrP tasmāj jyaiṣṭhyāṃ samuddhṛtya haimāḍhyaiḥ kalaśair jalam kṛṣṇarāmābhiṣekārthaṃ subhadrāyāś ca bho dvijāḥ  BrP kṛtvā suśobhanaṃ mañcaṃ patākābhir alaṃkṛtam sudṛḍhaṃ sukhasaṃcāraṃ vastraiḥ puṣpair alaṃkṛtam  BrP vistīrṇaṃ dhūpitaṃ dhūpaiḥ snānārthaṃ rāmakṛṣṇayoḥ sitavastraparicchannaṃ muktāhārāvalambitam  BrP tatra nānāvidhair vādyaiḥ kṛṣṇaṃ nīlāmbaraṃ dvijāḥ madhye subhadrāṃ cāsthāpya jayamaṅgalanisvanaiḥ  BrP brāhmaṇaiḥ kṣatriyair vaiśyaiḥ śūdraiś cānyaiś ca jātibhiḥ anekaśatasāhasrair vṛtaṃ strīpuruṣair dvijāḥ  BrP gṛhasthāḥ snātakāś caiva yatayo brahmacāriṇaḥ snāpayanti tadā kṛṣṇaṃ mañcasthaṃ sahalāyudham  BrP tathā samastatīrthāni pūrvoktāni dvijottamāḥ svodakaiḥ puṣpamiśraiś ca snāpayanti pṛthak pṛthak  BrP paścāt paṭahaśaṅkhādyair bherīmurajanisvanaiḥ kāhalais tālaśabdaiś ca mṛdaṅgair jharjharais tathā  BrP anyaiś ca vividhair vādyair ghaṇṭāsvanavibhūṣitaiḥ strīṇāṃ maṅgalaśabdaiś ca stutiśabdair manoharaiḥ  BrP jayaśabdais tathā stotrair vīṇāveṇunināditaiḥ śrūyate sumahāñ śabdaḥ sāgarasyeva garjataḥ  BrP munīnāṃ vedaśabdena mantraśabdais tathāparaiḥ nānāstotraravaiḥ puṇyaiḥ sāmaśabdopabṛṃhitaiḥ  BrP yatibhiḥ snātakaiś caiva gṛhasthair brahmacāribhiḥ snānakāle suraśreṣṭha stuvanti parayā mudā  BrP śyāmair veśyājanaiś caiva kucabhārāvanāmibhiḥ pītaraktāmbarābhiś ca mālyadāmāvanāmibhiḥ  BrP saratnakuṇḍalair divyaiḥ suvarṇastabakānvitaiḥ cāmarai ratnadaṇḍaiś ca vījyete rāmakeśavau  BrP yakṣavidyādharaiḥ siddhaiḥ kiṃnaraiś cāpsarogaṇaiḥ parivāryāmbaragatair devagandharvacāraṇaiḥ  BrP ādityā vasavo rudrāḥ sādhyā viśve marudgaṇāḥ lokapālās tathā cānye stuvanti puruṣottamam  BrP namas te devadeveśa purāṇa puruṣottama sargasthityantakṛd deva lokanātha jagatpate  BrP trailokyadhāriṇaṃ devaṃ brahmaṇyaṃ mokṣakāraṇam taṃ namasyāmahe bhaktyā sarvakāmaphalapradam  BrP stutvaivaṃ vibudhāḥ kṛṣṇaṃ rāmaṃ caiva mahābalam subhadrāṃ ca muniśreṣṭhās tadākāśe vyavasthitāḥ  BrP gāyanti devagandharvā nṛtyanty apsarasas tathā devatūryāṇy avādyanta vātā vānti suśītalāḥ  BrP puṣpamiśraṃ tadā meghā varṣanty ākāśagocarāḥ jayaśabdaṃ ca kurvanti munayaḥ siddhacāraṇāḥ  BrP śakrādyā vibudhāḥ sarva ṛṣayaḥ pitaras tathā prajānāṃ patayo nāgā ye cānye svargavāsinaḥ  BrP tato maṅgalasaṃbhārair vidhimantrapuraskṛtam ābhiṣecanikaṃ dravyaṃ gṛhītvā devatāgaṇāḥ  BrP indro viṣṇur mahāvīryaḥ sūryācandramasau tathā dhātā caiva vidhātā ca tathā caivānilānalau  BrP pūṣā bhago ryamā tvaṣṭā aṃśunaiva vivasvatā patnībhyāṃ sahito dhīmān mitreṇa varuṇena ca  BrP rudrair vasubhir ādityair aśvibhyāṃ ca vṛtaḥ prabhuḥ viśvair devair marudbhiś ca sādhyaiś ca pitṛbhiḥ saha  BrP gandharvair apsarobhiś ca yakṣarākṣasapannagaiḥ devarṣibhir asaṃkhyeyais tathā brahmarṣibhir varaiḥ  BrP vaikhānasair vālakhilyair vāyvāhārair marīcipaiḥ bhṛgubhiś cāṅgirobhiś ca sarvavidyāsuniṣṭhitaiḥ  BrP sarvavidyādharaiḥ puṇyair yogasiddhibhir āvṛtaḥ pitāmahaḥ pulastyaś ca pulahaś ca mahātapāḥ  BrP aṅgirāḥ kaśyapo triś ca marīcir bhṛgur eva ca kratur haraḥ pracetāś ca manur dakṣas tathaiva ca  BrP ṛtavaś ca grahāś caiva jyotīṃṣi ca dvijottamāḥ mūrtimatyaś ca sarito devāś caiva sanātanāḥ  BrP samudrāś ca hradāś caiva tīrthāni vividhāni ca pṛthivī dyaur diśaś caiva pādapāś ca dvijottamāḥ  BrP aditir devamātā ca hrīḥ śrīḥ svāhā sarasvatī umā śacī sinīvālī tathā cānumatiḥ kuhūḥ  BrP rākā ca dhiṣaṇā caiva patnyaś cānyā divaukasām himavāṃś caiva vindhyaś ca meruś cānekaśṛṅgavān  BrP airāvataḥ sānucaraḥ kalākāṣṭhās tathaiva ca māsārdhaṃ māsaṛtavas tathā rātryahanī samāḥ  BrP uccaiḥśravā hayaśreṣṭho nāgarājaś ca vāmanaḥ aruṇo garuḍaś caiva vṛkṣāś cauṣadhibhiḥ saha  BrP dharmaś ca bhagavān devaḥ samājagmur hi saṃgatāḥ kālo yamaś ca mṛtyuś ca yamasyānucarāś ca ye  BrP bahulatvāc ca noktā ye vividhā devatāgaṇāḥ te devasyābhiṣekārthaṃ samāyānti tatas tataḥ  BrP gṛhītvā te tadā viprāḥ sarve devā divaukasaḥ ābhiṣecanikaṃ dravyaṃ maṅgalāni ca sarvaśaḥ  BrP divyasaṃbhārasaṃyuktaiḥ kalaśaiḥ kāñcanair dvijāḥ sārasvatībhiḥ puṇyābhir divyatoyābhir eva ca  BrP toyenākāśagaṅgāyāḥ kṛṣṇaṃ rāmeṇa saṃgatam sapuṣpaiḥ kāñcanaiḥ kumbhaiḥ snāpayanty avanisthitāḥ  BrP saṃcaranti vimānāni devānām ambare tathā uccāvacāni divyāni kāmagāni sthirāṇi ca  BrP divyaratnavicitrāṇi sevitāny apsarogaṇaiḥ gītair vādyaiḥ patākābhiḥ śobhitāni samantataḥ  BrP evaṃ tadā muniśreṣṭhāḥ kṛṣṇaṃ rāmeṇa saṃgatam snāpayitvā subhadrāṃ ca saṃstuvanti mudānvitāḥ  BrP jaya jaya lokapāla bhaktarakṣaka jaya jaya praṇatavatsala jaya jaya bhūtacaraṇa jayajayādideva bahukāraṇa jaya jaya vāsudeva jaya jayāsurasaṃharaṇa jaya jaya jaya jaya śāntikarajaya jaya mokṣakara jaya jaya kaluṣahara  BrP  jaya kṛṣṇa jagannātha jaya saṃkarṣaṇānuja jaya padmapalāśākṣa jaya vāñchāphalaprada  BrP jaya mālāvṛtoraska jaya cakragadādhara jaya padmālayākānta jaya viṣṇo namo stu te  BrP brahmovāca evaṃ stutvā tadā devāḥ śakrādyā hṛṣṭamānasāḥ siddhacāraṇasaṃghāś ca ye cānye svargavāsinaḥ  BrP munayo vālakhilyāś ca kṛṣṇaṃ rāmeṇa saṃgatam subhadrāṃ ca muniśreṣṭhāḥ praṇipatyāmbare sthitāḥ  BrP dṛṣṭvā stutvā namaskṛtvā tadā te tridivaukasaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ rāmaṃ subhadrāṃ ca yānti svaṃ svaṃ niveśanam  BrP saṃcaranti vimānāni devānām ambare tadā uccāvacāni divyāni kāmagāni sthirāṇi ca  BrP divyaratnavicitrāṇi sevitāny apsarogaṇaiḥ gītair vādyaiḥ patākābhiḥ śobhitāni samantataḥ  BrP tasmin kāle tu ye martyāḥ paśyanti puruṣottamam balabhadraṃ subhadrāṃ ca te yānti padam avyayam  BrP subhadrārāmasahitaṃ mañcasthaṃ puruṣottamam dṛṣṭvā nirāmayaṃ sthānaṃ yānti nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ  BrP kapilāśatadānena yat phalaṃ puṣkare smṛtam tat phalaṃ
