ūcuḥ na bhavadbhir hutaṃ kāle na dattaṃ brāhmaṇeṣu ca prasabhaṃ dīyamānaṃ ca vāritaṃ ca dvijātiṣu  BrP tasya pāpasya ca phalaṃ bhavatāṃ samupāgatam nāgnau dagdhaṃ jale naṣṭaṃ na hṛtaṃ nṛpataskaraiḥ  BrP kuto vā sāṃprataṃ vipre yan na dattaṃ purādhamāḥ yair dattāni tu dānāni sādhubhiḥ sāttvikāni tu  BrP teṣām ete pradṛśyante kalpitā hy annaparvatāḥ bhakṣyabhojyāś ca peyāś ca lehyāś coṣyāś ca saṃvṛtāḥ  BrP na yūyam abhilapsyadhve na dattaṃ ca kathaṃcana yais tu dattaṃ hutaṃ ceṣṭaṃ brāhmaṇāś caiva pūjitāḥ  BrP teṣām annaṃ samānīya iha nikṣipyate sadā parasvaṃ katham asmābhir dātuṃ śakyeta nārakāḥ  BrP vyāsa uvāca kiṃkarāṇāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā niḥspṛhāḥ kṣuttṛṣārditāḥ tatas te dāruṇaiś cāstraiḥ pīḍyante yamakiṃkaraiḥ  BrP mudgarair lohadaṇḍaiś ca śaktitomarapaṭṭiśaiḥ parighair bhindipālaiś ca gadāparaśubhiḥ śaraiḥ  BrP pṛṣṭhato hanyamānyāś ca yamadūtaiḥ sunirdayaiḥ agrataḥ siṃhavyāghrādyair bhakṣyante pāpakāriṇaḥ  BrP na praveṣṭuṃ na nirgantuṃ labhante duḥkhitā bhṛśam svakarmopahatāḥ pāpāḥ krandamānāḥ sudāruṇāḥ  BrP tatra saṃpīḍya subhṛśaṃ praveśaṃ yamakiṃkaraiḥ nīyante pāpinas tatra yatra tiṣṭhet svayaṃ yamaḥ  BrP dharmātmā dharmakṛd devaḥ sarvasaṃyamano yamaḥ evaṃ pathātikaṣṭena prāptāḥ pretapuraṃ narāḥ  BrP prajñāpitās tadā dūtair niveśyante yamāgrataḥ tatas te pāpakarmāṇas taṃ paśyanti bhayānakam  BrP pāpāpaviddhanayanā viparītātmabuddhayaḥ daṃṣṭrākarālavadanaṃ bhrukūṭīkuṭilekṣaṇam  BrP ūrdhvakeśaṃ mahāśmaśruṃ prasphuradadharottaram aṣṭādaśabhujaṃ kruddhaṃ nīlāñjanacayopamam  BrP sarvāyudhodyatakaraṃ tīvradaṇḍena saṃyutam mahāmahiṣam ārūḍhaṃ dīptāgnisamalocanam  BrP raktamālyāmbaradharaṃ mahāmegham ivocchritam pralayāmbudanirghoṣaṃ pibann iva mahodadhim  BrP grasantam iva trailokyam udgirantam ivānalam mṛtyuṃ ca tatsamīpasthaṃ kālānalasamaprabham  BrP pralayānalasaṃkāśaṃ kṛtāntaṃ ca bhayānakam mārīcogrā mahāmārī kālarātrī ca dāruṇā  BrP vividhā vyādhayaḥ kaṣṭā nānārūpā bhayāvahāḥ śaktiśūlāṅkuśadharāḥ pāśacakrāsidhāriṇaḥ  BrP vajradaṇḍadharā raudrāḥ kṣuratūṇadhanurdharāḥ asaṃkhyātā mahāvīryāḥ krūrāś cāñjanasaprabhāḥ  BrP sarvāyudhodyatakarā yamadūtā bhayānakāḥ anena parivāreṇa mahāghoreṇa saṃvṛtam  BrP yamaṃ paśyanti pāpiṣṭhāś citraguptaṃ vibhīṣaṇam nirbhartsayati cātyarthaṃ yamas tān pāpakāriṇaḥ  BrP citraguptas tu bhagavān dharmavākyaiḥ prabodhayan  BrP citragupta uvāca bho bho duṣkṛtakarmāṇaḥ paradravyāpahāriṇaḥ garvitā rūpavīryeṇa paradāravimardakāḥ  BrP yat svayaṃ kriyate karma tat svayaṃ bhujyate punaḥ tat kim ātmopaghātārthaṃ bhavadbhir duṣkṛtaṃ kṛtam  BrP idānīṃ kiṃ nu śocadhvaṃ pīḍyamānāḥ svakarmabhiḥ bhuñjadhvaṃ svāni duḥkhāni nahi doṣo sti kasyacit  BrP ya ete pṛthivīpālāḥ saṃprāptā matsamīpataḥ svakīyaiḥ karmabhir ghorair duṣprajñā balagarvitāḥ  BrP bho bho nṛpā durācārāḥ prajāvidhvaṃsakāriṇaḥ alpakālasya rājyasya kṛte kiṃ duṣkṛtaṃ kṛtam  BrP rājyalobhena mohena balād anyāyataḥ prajāḥ yad daṇḍitāḥ phalaṃ tasya bhuñjadhvam adhunā nṛpāḥ  BrP kuto rājyaṃ kalatraṃ ca yadartham aśubhaṃ kṛtam tat sarvaṃ saṃparityajya yūyam ekākinaḥ sthitāḥ  BrP paśyāmo na balaṃ sarvaṃ yena vidhvaṃsitāḥ prajāḥ yamadūtaiḥ pāṭyamānā adhunā kīdṛśaṃ phalam  BrP vyāsa uvāca evaṃ bahuvidhair vākyair upālabdhā yamena te śocantaḥ svāni karmāṇi tūṣṇīṃ tiṣṭhanti pārthivāḥ  BrP iti karma samādiśya nṛpāṇāṃ dharmarāṭ svayam tatpātakaviśuddhyartham idaṃ vacanam abravīt  BrP yama uvāca bho bhoś caṇḍa mahācaṇḍa gṛhītvā nṛpatīn imān viśodhayadhvaṃ pāpebhyaḥ krameṇa narakāgniṣu  BrP vyāsa uvāca tataḥ śīghraṃ samutthāya nṛpān saṃgṛhya pādayoḥ bhrāmayitvā tu vegena kṣiptvā cordhvaṃ pragṛhya ca  BrP tattatpāpapramāṇena yamadūtāḥ śilātale āsphoṭayanti tarasā vajreṇeva mahādrumam  BrP tatas tu raktaṃ srotobhiḥ sravate jarjarīkṛtaḥ niḥsaṃjñaḥ sa tadā dehī niśceṣṭaś ca prajāyate  BrP tataḥ sa vāyunā spṛṣṭaḥ śanair ujjīvate punaḥ tataḥ pāpaviśuddhyarthaṃ kṣipanti narakārṇave  BrP anyāṃś ca te tadā dūtāḥ pāpakarmaratān narān nivedayanti viprendrā yamāya bhṛśaduḥkhitān  BrP yamadūtā ūcuḥ eṣa deva tavādeśād asmābhir mohito bhṛśam ānīto dharmavimukhaḥ sadā pāparataḥ paraḥ  BrP eṣa lubdho durācāro mahāpātakasaṃyutaḥ upapātakakartā ca sadā hiṃsārato śuciḥ  BrP agamyāgāmī duṣṭātmā paradravyāpahārakaḥ kanyākrayī kūṭasākṣī kṛtaghno mitravañcakaḥ  BrP anena madamattena sadā dharmo vininditaḥ pāpam ācaritaṃ karma martyaloke durātmanā  BrP idānīm asya deveśa nigrahānugrahau vada prabhur asya kriyāyoge vayaṃ vā paripanthinaḥ  BrP vyāsa uvāca iti vijñāpya deveśaṃ nyasyāgre pāpakāriṇam narakāṇāṃ sahasreṣu lakṣakoṭiśateṣu ca  BrP kiṃkarās te tato yānti grahītum aparān narān pratipanne kṛte doṣe yamo vai pāpakāriṇām  BrP samādiśati tān ghorān nigrahāya svakiṃkarān yathā yasya vinirdiṣṭo vasiṣṭhādyair vinigrahaḥ  BrP pāpasya tad bhṛśaṃ kruddhāḥ kurvanti yamakiṃkarāḥ aṅkuśair mudgarair daṇḍaiḥ krakacaiḥ śaktitomaraiḥ  BrP khaḍgaśūlanipātaiś ca bhidyante pāpakāriṇaḥ narakāṇāṃ sahasreṣu lakṣakoṭiśateṣu ca  BrP svakarmopārjitair doṣaiḥ pīḍyante yamakiṃkaraiḥ śṛṇudhvaṃ narakāṇāṃ ca svarūpaṃ ca bhayaṃkaram  BrP nāmāni ca pramāṇaṃ ca yena yānti narāś ca tān mahāvācīti vikhyātaṃ narakaṃ śoṇitaplutam  BrP vajrakaṇṭakasaṃmiśraṃ yojanāyutavistṛtam tatra saṃpīḍyate magno bhidyate vajrakaṇṭake  BrP varṣalakṣaṃ mahāghoraṃ goghātī narake naraḥ yojanānāṃ śataṃ lakṣaṃ kumbhīpākaṃ sudāruṇam  BrP tāmrakumbhavatī dīptā vālukāṅgārasaṃvṛtā brahmahā bhūmihartā ca nikṣepasyāpahārakaḥ  BrP dahyante tatra saṃkṣiptā yāvad ābhūtasaṃplavam rauravo vajranārācaiḥ prajvaladbhiḥ samāvṛtaḥ  BrP yojanānāṃ sahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭir āyāmavistaraiḥ bhidyante tatra nārācaiḥ sajvālair narake narāḥ  BrP ikṣuvat tatra pīḍyante ye narāḥ kūṭasākṣiṇaḥ ayomayaṃ prajvalitaṃ mañjūṣaṃ narakaṃ smṛtam  BrP nikṣiptās tatra dahyante bandigrāhakṛtāś ca ye apratiṣṭheti narakaṃ pūyamūtrapurīṣakam  BrP adhomukhaḥ patet tatra brāhmaṇasyopapīḍakaḥ lākṣāprajvalitaṃ ghoraṃ narakaṃ tu vilepakam  BrP nimagnās tatra dahyante madyapāne dvijottamāḥ mahāprabheti narakaṃ dīptaśūlamahocchrayam  BrP tatra śūlena bhidyante patibhāryopabhedinaḥ narakaṃ ca mahāghoraṃ jayantī cāyasī śilā  BrP tayā cākramyate pāpaḥ paradāropasevakaḥ narakaṃ śālmalākhyaṃ tu pradīptadṛḍhakaṇṭakam  BrP tayā liṅgati duḥkhārtā nārī bahunaraṃgamā ye vadanti sadāsatyaṃ paramarmāvakartanam  BrP jihvā cocchriyate teṣāṃ sadasyair yamakiṃkaraiḥ ye tu rāgaiḥ kaṭākṣaiś ca vīkṣante parayoṣitam  BrP teṣāṃ cakṣūṃṣi nārācair vidhyante yamakiṃkaraiḥ  BrP mātaraṃ ye pi gacchanti bhaginīṃ duhitaraṃ snuṣām strībālavṛddhahantāro yāvad indrāś caturdaśa jvālāmālākulaṃ raudraṃ mahārauravasaṃjñitam  BrP narakaṃ yojanānāṃ ca sahasrāṇi caturdaśa puraṃ kṣetraṃ gṛhaṃ grāmaṃ yo dīpayati vahninā  BrP sa tatra dahyate mūḍho yāvat kalpasthitir naraḥ tāmisram iti vikhyātaṃ lakṣayojanavistṛtam  BrP nipatadbhiḥ sadā raudraḥ khaḍgapaṭṭiśamudgaraiḥ tatra caurā narāḥ kṣiptās tāḍyante yamakiṃkaraiḥ  BrP śūlaśaktigadākhaḍgair yāvat kalpaśatatrayam tāmisrād dviguṇaṃ proktaṃ mahātāmisrasaṃjñitam  BrP jalaukāsarpasaṃpūrṇāṃ nirālokaṃ suduḥkhadam mātṛhā pitṛhā caiva mitravisrambhaghātakaḥ  BrP tiṣṭhanti takṣyamāṇāś ca yāvat tiṣṭhati medinī asipattravanaṃ nāma narakaṃ bhūriduḥkhadam  BrP yojanāyutavistāraṃ jvalatkhaḍgaiḥ samākulam pātitas tatra taiḥ khaḍgaiḥ śatadhā tu samāhataḥ  BrP mitraghnaḥ kṛtyate tāvad yāvad ābhūtasaṃplavam karambhavālukā nāma narakaṃ yojanāyutam  BrP kūpākāraṃ vṛtaṃ dīptair vālukāṅgārakaṇṭakaiḥ dahyate bhidyate varṣa lakṣāyutaśatatrayam  BrP yena dagdho jano nityaṃ mithyopāyaiḥ sudāruṇaiḥ kākolaṃ nāma narakaṃ kṛmipūyapariplutam  BrP kṣipyate tatra duṣṭātmā ekākī miṣṭabhuṅ naraḥ kuḍmalaṃ nāma narakaṃ pūrṇaṃ viṇmūtraśoṇitaiḥ  BrP pañcayajñakriyāhīnāḥ kṣipyante tatra vai narāḥ sudurgandhaṃ mahābhīmaṃ māṃsaśoṇitasaṃkulam  BrP abhakṣyānne ratās te tra nipatanti narādhamāḥ krimikīṭasamākīrṇaṃ śavapūrṇaṃ mahāvaṭam  BrP adhomukhaḥ patet tatra kanyāvikrayakṛn naraḥ nāmnā vai tilapāketi narakaṃ dāruṇaṃ smṛtam  BrP tilavat tatra pīḍyante parapīḍāratāś ca ye narakaṃ tailapāketi jvalattailamahīplavam  BrP pacyate tatra mitraghno hantā ca śaraṇāgatam nāmnā vajrakapāṭeti vajraśṛṅkhalayānvitam  BrP pīḍyante nirdayaṃ tatra yaiḥ kṛtaḥ kṣīravikrayaḥ nirucchvāsa iti proktaṃ tamondhaṃ vātavarjitam  BrP niśceṣṭaṃ kṣipyate tatra vipradānanirodhakṛt aṅgāropacayaṃ nāma dīptāṅgārasamujjvalam  BrP dahyate tatra yenoktaṃ dānaṃ viprāya nārpitam mahāpāyīti narakaṃ lakṣayojanam āyatam  BrP pātyante dhomukhās tatra ye jalpanti sadānṛtam mahājvāleti narakaṃ jvālābhāsvarabhīṣaṇam  BrP dahyate tatra suciraṃ yaḥ pāpe buddhikṛn naraḥ narakaṃ krakacākhyātaṃ pīḍyante tatra vai narāḥ  BrP krakacair vajradhārograir agamyāgamane ratāḥ narakaṃ guḍapāketi jvaladguḍahradair vṛtam  BrP nikṣipto dahyate tasmin varṇasaṃkarakṛn naraḥ kṣuradhāreti narakaṃ tīkṣṇakṣurasamāvṛtam  BrP chidyante tatra kalpāntaṃ viprabhūmiharā narāḥ narakaṃ cāmbarīṣākhyaṃ pralayānaladīpitam  BrP kalpakoṭiśataṃ tatra dahyate svarṇahārakaḥ nāmnā vajrakuṭhāreti narakaṃ vajrasaṃkulam  BrP chidyante tatra chettāro drumāṇāṃ pāpakāriṇaḥ narakaṃ paritāpākhyaṃ pralayānaladīpitam  BrP garado madhuhartā ca pacyate tatra pāpakṛt narakaṃ kālasūtraṃ ca vajrasūtravinirmitam  BrP bhramantas tatra cchidyante parasasyopaluṇṭhakāḥ narakaṃ kaśmalaṃ nāma śleṣmaśiṅghāṇakāvṛtam  BrP tatra saṃkṣipyate kalpaṃ sadā māṃsarucir naraḥ narakaṃ cogragandheti lālāmūtrapurīṣavat  BrP kṣipyante tatra narake pitṛpiṇḍāprayacchakāḥ narakaṃ durdharaṃ nāma jalaukāvṛścikākulam  BrP utkocabhakṣakas tatra tiṣṭhate varṣakāyutam yac ca vajramahāpīḍā narakaṃ vajranirmitam  BrP tatra prakṣipya dahyante pīḍyante yamakiṃkaraiḥ dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ hiraṇyaṃ vā parakīyaṃ haranti ye  BrP yamadūtaiś ca caurās te chidyante lavaśaḥ kṣuraiḥ ye hatvā prāṇinaṃ mūḍhāḥ khādante kākagṛdhravat  BrP bhojyante ca svamāṃsaṃ te kalpāntaṃ yamakiṃkaraiḥ āsanaṃ śayanaṃ vastraṃ parakīyaṃ haranti ye  BrP yamadūtaiś ca te mūḍhā bhidyante śaktitomaraiḥ phalaṃ pattraṃ nṛṇāṃ vāpi hṛtaṃ yais tu kubuddhibhiḥ  BrP yamadūtaiś ca te kruddhair dahyante tṛṇavahnibhiḥ paradravye kalatre ca yaḥ sadā duṣṭadhīr naraḥ  BrP yamadūtair jvalat tasya hṛdi śūlaṃ nikhanyate karmaṇā manasā vācā ye dharmavimukhā narāḥ  BrP yamaloke tu te ghorā labhante pariyātanāḥ evaṃ śatasahasrāṇi lakṣakoṭiśatāni ca  BrP narakāṇi narais tatra bhujyante pāpakāribhiḥ iha kṛtvā svalpam api naraḥ karmāśubhātmakam  BrP prāpnoti narake ghore yamalokeṣu yātanām na śṛṇvanti narā mūḍhā dharmoktaṃ sādhu bhāṣitam  BrP dṛṣṭaṃ keneti pratyakṣaṃ pratyuktyaivaṃ vadanti te divā rātrau prayatnena pāpaṃ kurvanti ye narāḥ  BrP nācaranti hi te dharmaṃ pramādenāpi mohitāḥ ihaiva phalabhoktāraḥ paratra vimukhāś ca ye  BrP te patanti sughoreṣu narakeṣu narādhamāḥ dāruṇo narake vāsaḥ svargavāsaḥ sukhapradaḥ naraiḥ saṃprāpyate tatra karma kṛtvā śubhāśubham  BrP munaya ūcuḥ aho tiduḥkhaṃ ghoraṃ ca yamamārge tvayoditam narakāṇi ca ghorāṇi dvāraṃ yāmyaṃ ca sattama  BrP asty upāyo na vā brahman yamamārge tibhīṣaṇe brūhi yena narā yānti sukhena yamasādanam  BrP vyāsa uvāca iha ye dharmasaṃyuktās tv ahiṃsāniratā narāḥ guruśuśrūṣaṇe yuktā devabrāhmaṇapūjakāḥ  BrP yasmin manuṣyalokās te sabhāryāḥ sasutās tathā tam adhvānaṃ ca gacchanti yathā tat kathayāmi vaḥ  BrP vimānair vividhair divyaiḥ kāñcanadhvajaśobhitaiḥ dharmarājapuraṃ yānti sevamānāpsarogaṇaiḥ  BrP brāhmaṇebhyas tu dānāni nānārūpāṇi bhaktitaḥ ye prayacchanti te yānti sukhenaiva mahāpathe  BrP annaṃ ye tu prayacchanti brāhmaṇebhyaḥ susaṃkṛtam śrotriyebhyo viśeṣeṇa bhaktyā paramayā yutāḥ  BrP taruṇībhir varastrībhiḥ sevyamānāḥ prayatnataḥ dharmarājapuraṃ yānti vimānair abhyalaṃkṛtaiḥ  BrP ye ca satyaṃ prabhāṣante bahir antaś ca nirmalāḥ te pi yānty amaraprakhyā vimānair yamamandiram  BrP godānāni pavitrāṇi viṣṇum uddiśya sādhuṣu ye prayacchanti dharmajñāḥ kṛśeṣu kṛśavṛttiṣu  BrP te yānti divyavarṇābhair vimānair maṇicitritaiḥ dharmarājapuraṃ śrīmān sevyamānāpsarogaṇaiḥ  BrP upānadyugalaṃ chattraṃ śayyāsanam athāpi vā ye prayacchanti vastrāṇi tathaivābharaṇāni ca  BrP te yānty aśvai rathaiś caiva kuñjaraiś cāpy alaṃkṛtāḥ dharmarājapuraṃ divyaṃ chattraiḥ sauvarṇarājataiḥ  BrP ye ca bhaktyā prayacchanti guḍapānakam arcitam odanaṃ ca dvijāgryebhyo viśuddhenāntarātmanā  BrP te yānti kāñcanair yānair vividhais tu yamālayam varastrībhir yathākāmaṃ sevyamānāḥ punaḥ punaḥ  BrP ye ca kṣīraṃ prayacchanti ghṛtaṃ dadhi guḍaṃ madhu brāhmaṇebhyaḥ prayatnena śuddhyopetaṃ susaṃskṛtam  BrP cakravākaprayuktaiś ca vimānais tu hiraṇmayaiḥ yānti gandharvavāditraiḥ sevyamānā yamālayam  BrP ye phalāni prayacchanti puṣpāṇi surabhīṇi ca haṃsayuktair vimānais tu yānti dharmapuraṃ narāḥ  BrP ye tilāṃs tiladhenuṃ ca ghṛtadhenum athāpi vā śrotriyebhyaḥ prayacchanti viprebhyaḥ śraddhayānvitāḥ  BrP somamaṇḍalasaṃkāśair yānais te yānti nirmalaiḥ gandharvair upagīyante pure vaivasvatasya te  BrP yeṣāṃ vāpyaś ca kūpāś ca taḍāgāni sarāṃsi ca dīrghikāḥ puṣkariṇyaś ca śītalāś ca jalāśayāḥ  BrP yānais te hemacandrābhair divyaghaṇṭānināditaiḥ vyajanais tālavṛntaiś ca vījyamānā mahāprabhāḥ  BrP yeṣāṃ devakulāny atra citrāṇy āyatanāni ca ratnaiḥ prasphuramāṇāni manojñāni śubhāni ca  BrP te yānti lokapālais tu vimānair vātaraṃhasaiḥ dharmarājapuraṃ divyaṃ nānājanasamākulam  BrP pānīyaṃ ye prayacchanti sarvaprāṇyupajīvitam te vitṛṣṇāḥ sukhaṃ yānti vimānais taṃ mahāpatham  BrP kāṣṭhapādukayānāni pīṭhakāny āsanāni ca yair dattāni dvijātibhyas te dhvānaṃ yānti vai sukham  BrP sauvarṇamaṇipīṭheṣu pādau kṛtvottameṣu ca te prayānti vimānais tu apsarogaṇamaṇḍitaiḥ  BrP ārāmāṇi vicitrāṇi puṣpāḍhyānīha mānavāḥ ropayanti phalāḍhyāni narāṇām upakāriṇaḥ  BrP vṛkṣacchāyāsu ramyāsu śītalāsu svalaṃkṛtāḥ varastrīgītavādyaiś ca sevyamānā vrajanti te  BrP suvarṇaṃ rajataṃ vāpi vidrumaṃ mauktikaṃ tathā ye prayacchanti te yānti vimānaiḥ kanakojjvalaiḥ  BrP bhūmidā dīpyamānāś ca sarvakāmais tu tarpitāḥ uditādityasaṃkāśair vimānair bhṛśanāditaiḥ  BrP kanyāṃ tu ye prayacchanti brahmadeyām alaṃkṛtām divyakanyāvṛtā yānti vimānais te yamālayam  BrP sugandhāgurukarpūrān puṣpadhūpān dvijottamāḥ prayacchanti dvijātibhyo bhaktyā paramayānvitāḥ  BrP te sugandhāḥ suveśāś ca suprabhāḥ suvibhūṣitāḥ yānti dharmapuraṃ yānair vicitrair abhyalaṃkṛtāḥ  BrP dīpadā yānti yānaiś ca dīpayanto diśo daśa ādityasadṛśair yānair dīpyamānā yathāgnayaḥ  BrP gṛhāvasathadātāro gṛhaiḥ kāñcanamaṇḍitaiḥ vrajanti bālārkanibhair dharmarājagṛhaṃ narāḥ  BrP jalabhājanadātāraḥ kuṇḍikākarakapradāḥ pūjamānāpsarobhiś ca yānti dṛptā mahāgajaiḥ  BrP pādābhyaṅgaṃ śirobhyaṅgaṃ snānapānodakaṃ tathā ye prayacchanti viprebhyas te yānty aśvair yamālayam  BrP viśrāmayanti ye viprāñ śrāntān adhvani karśitān cakravākaprayuktena yānti yānena te sukham  BrP svāgatena ca yo vipraṃ pūjayed āsanena ca sa gacchati tam adhvānaṃ sukhaṃ paramanirvṛtaḥ  BrP namo brahmaṇyadeveti yo hariṃ cābhivādayet gāṃ ca pāpaharety uktvā sukhaṃ yānti ca tat patham  BrP anantarāśino ye ca dambhānṛtavivarjitāḥ te pi sārasayuktais tu yānti yānaiś ca tat patham  BrP vartante hy ekabhaktena śāṭhyadambhavivarjitāḥ haṃsayuktair vimānais tu sukhaṃ yānti yamālayam  BrP caturthenaikabhaktena vartante ye jitendriyāḥ te yānti dharmanagaraṃ yānair barhiṇayojitaiḥ  BrP tṛtīye divase ye tu bhuñjate niyatavratāḥ te pi hastirathair divyair yānti yānaiś ca tat padam  BrP ṣaṣṭhe nnabhakṣako yas tu śaucanityo jitendriyaḥ sa yāti kuñjarasthas tu śacīpatir iva svayam  BrP dharmarājapuraṃ divyaṃ nānāmaṇivibhūṣitam nānāsvarasamāyuktaṃ jayaśabdaravair yutam  BrP pakṣopavāsino yānti yānaiḥ śārdūlayojitaiḥ puraṃ tad dharmarājasya sevyamānāḥ surāsuraiḥ  BrP ye ca māsopavāsaṃ tu kurvate saṃyatendriyāḥ te pi sūryapradīptais tu yānti yānair yamālayam  BrP mahāprasthānam ekāgro yaḥ prayāti dṛḍhavrataḥ sevyamānas tu gandharvair yāti yānair yamālayam  BrP śarīraṃ sādhayed yas tu vaiṣṇavenāntarātmanā sa rathenāgnivarṇena yātīha tridaśālayam  BrP agnipraveśaṃ yaḥ kuryān nārāyaṇaparāyaṇaḥ sa yāty agniprakāśena vimānena yamālayam  BrP prāṇāṃs tyajati yo martyaḥ smaran viṣṇuṃ sanātanam yānenārkaprakāśena yāti dharmapuraṃ naraḥ  BrP praviṣṭo ntar jalaṃ yas tu prāṇāṃs tyajati mānavaḥ somamaṇḍalakalpena yāti yānena vai sukham  BrP svaśarīraṃ hi gṛdhrebhyo vaiṣṇavo yaḥ prayacchati sa yāti rathamukhyena kāñcanena yamālayam  BrP strīgrahe gograhe vāpi yuddhe mṛtyum upaiti yaḥ sa yāty amarakanyābhiḥ sevyamāno raviprabhaḥ  BrP vaiṣṇavā ye ca kurvanti tīrthayātrāṃ jitendriyāḥ tat pathaṃ yānti te ghoraṃ sukhayānair alaṃkṛtāḥ  BrP ye yajanti dvijaśreṣṭhāḥ kratubhir bhūridakṣiṇaiḥ taptahāṭakasaṃkāśair vimānair yānti te sukham  BrP parapīḍām akurvanto bhṛtyānāṃ bharaṇādikam kurvanti te sukhaṃ yānti vimānaiḥ kanakojjvalaiḥ  BrP ye kṣāntāḥ sarvabhūteṣu prāṇinām abhayapradāḥ krodhamohavinirmuktā nirmadāḥ saṃyatendriyāḥ  BrP pūrṇacandraprakāśena vimānena mahāprabhāḥ yānti vaivasvatapuraṃ devagandharvasevitāḥ  BrP ekabhāvena ye viṣṇuṃ brahmāṇaṃ tryambakaṃ ravim pūjayanti hi te yānti vimānair bhāskaraprabhaiḥ  BrP ye ca māṃsaṃ na khādanti satyaśaucasamanvitāḥ te pi yānti sukhenaiva dharmarājapuraṃ narāḥ  BrP māṃsān miṣṭataraṃ nāsti bhakṣyabhojyādikeṣu ca tasmān māṃsaṃ na bhuñjīta nāsti miṣṭaiḥ sukhodayaḥ  BrP gosahasraṃ tu yo dadyād yas tu māṃsaṃ na bhakṣayet samāv etau purā prāha brahmā vedavidāṃ varaḥ  BrP sarvatīrtheṣu yat puṇyaṃ sarvayajñeṣu yat phalam amāṃsabhakṣaṇe viprās tac ca tac ca ca tatsamam  BrP evaṃ sukhena te yānti yamalokaṃ ca dhārmikāḥ dānavrataparā yānair yatra devo raveḥ sutaḥ  BrP dṛṣṭvā tān dhārmikān devaḥ svayaṃ saṃmānayed yamaḥ svāgatāsanadānena pādyārghyeṇa priyeṇa tu  BrP dhanyā yūyaṃ mahātmāna ātmano hitakāriṇaḥ yena divyasukhārthāya bhavadbhiḥ sukṛtaṃ kṛtam  BrP idaṃ vimānam āruhya divyastrībhogabhūṣitāḥ svargaṃ gacchadhvam atulaṃ sarvakāmasamanvitam  BrP tatra bhuktvā mahābhogān ante puṇyaparikṣayāt yat kiṃcid alpam aśubhaṃ phalaṃ tad iha bhokṣyatha  BrP ye tu taṃ dharmarājānaṃ narāḥ puṇyānubhāvataḥ paśyanti saumyamanasaṃ pitṛbhūtam ivātmanaḥ  BrP tasmād dharmaḥ sevitavyaḥ sadā muktiphalapradaḥ dharmād arthas tathā kāmo mokṣaś ca parikīrtyate  BrP dharmo mātā pitā bhrātā dharmo nāthaḥ suhṛt tathā dharmaḥ svāmī sakhā goptā tathā dhātā ca poṣakaḥ  BrP dharmād artho rthataḥ kāmaḥ kāmād bhogaḥ sukhāni ca dharmād aiśvaryam ekāgryaṃ dharmāt svargagatiḥ parā  BrP dharmas tu sevito viprās trāyate mahato bhayāt devatvaṃ ca dvijatvaṃ ca dharmāt prāpnoty asaṃśayam  BrP yadā ca kṣīyate pāpaṃ narāṇāṃ pūrvasaṃcitam tadaiṣāṃ bhajate buddhir dharmaṃ cātra dvijottamāḥ  BrP janmāntarasahasreṣu mānuṣyaṃ prāpya durlabham yo hi nācarate dharmaṃ bhavet sa khalu vañcitaḥ  BrP kutsitā ye daridrāś ca virūpā vyādhitās tathā parapreṣyāś ca mūrkhāś ca jñeyā dharmavivarjitāḥ  BrP ye hi dīrghāyuṣaḥ śūrāḥ paṇḍitā bhogino rthinaḥ arogā rūpavantaś ca tais tu dharmaḥ purā kṛtaḥ  BrP evaṃ dharmaratā viprā gacchanti gatim uttamām adharmaṃ sevamānās tu tiryagyoniṃ vrajanti te  BrP ye narā narakadhvaṃsi vāsudevam anuvratāḥ te svapne pi na paśyanti yamaṃ vā narakāṇi vā  BrP anādinidhanaṃ devaṃ daityadānavadāraṇam ye namanti narā nityaṃ nahi paśyanti te yamam  BrP karmaṇā manasā vācā ye cyutaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ na samartho yamas teṣāṃ te muktiphalabhāginaḥ  BrP ye janā jagatāṃ nāthaṃ nityaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ dvijāḥ namanti nahi te viṣṇoḥ sthānād anyatra gāminaḥ  BrP na te dūtān na tan mārgaṃ na yamaṃ na ca tāṃ purīm praṇamya viṣṇuṃ paśyanti narakāṇi kathaṃcana  BrP kṛtvāpi bahuśaḥ pāpaṃ narā mohasamanvitāḥ na yānti narakaṃ natvā sarvapāpaharaṃ harim  BrP śāṭhyenāpi narā nityaṃ ye smaranti janārdanam te pi yānti tanuṃ tyaktvā viṣṇulokam anāmayam  BrP atyantakrodhasakto pi kadācit kīrtayed dharim so pi doṣakṣayān muktiṃ labhec cedipatir yathā  BrP lomaharṣaṇa uvāca śrutvaivaṃ yamamārgaṃ te narakeṣu ca yātanām papracchuś ca punar vyāsaṃ saṃśayaṃ munisattamāḥ  BrP munaya ūcuḥ bhagavan sarvadharmajña sarvaśāstraviśārada martyasya kaḥ sahāyo vai pitā mātā suto guruḥ  BrP jñātisaṃbandhivargaś ca mitravargas tathaiva ca gṛhaṃ śarīram utsṛjya kāṣṭhaloṣṭasamaṃ janāḥ gacchanty amutra loke vai kaś ca tān anugacchati  BrP vyāsa uvāca ekaḥ prasūyate viprā eka eva hi naśyati ekas tarati durgāṇi gacchaty ekas tu durgatim  BrP asahāyaḥ pitā mātā tathā bhrātā suto guruḥ jñātisaṃbandhivargaś ca mitravargas tathaiva ca  BrP mṛtaṃ śarīram utsṛjya kāṣṭhaloṣṭasamaṃ janāḥ muhūrtam iva roditvā tato yānti parāṅmukhāḥ  BrP tais tac charīram utsṛṣṭaṃ dharma eko nugacchati tasmād dharmaḥ sahāyaś ca sevitavyaḥ sadā nṛbhiḥ  BrP prāṇī dharmasamāyukto gacchet svargagatiṃ parām tathaivādharmasaṃyukto narakaṃ copapadyate  BrP tasmāt pāpāgatair arthair nānurajyeta paṇḍitaḥ dharma eko manuṣyāṇāṃ sahāyaḥ parikīrtitaḥ  BrP lobhān mohād anukrośād bhayād vātha bahuśrutaḥ naraḥ karoty akāryāṇi parārthe lobhamohitaḥ  BrP dharmaś cārthaś ca kāmaś ca tritayaṃ jīvataḥ phalam etat trayam avāptavyam adharmaparivarjitam  BrP munaya ūcuḥ śrutaṃ bhagavato vākyaṃ dharmayuktaṃ paraṃ hitam śarīranicayaṃ jñātuṃ buddhir no tra prajāyate  BrP mṛtaṃ śarīraṃ hi nṛṇāṃ sūkṣmam avyaktatāṃ gatam acakṣurviṣayaṃ prāptaṃ kathaṃ dharmo nugacchati  BrP vyāsa uvāca pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotir manontaram buddhir ātmā ca sahitā dharmaṃ paśyanti nityadā  BrP prāṇinām iha sarveṣāṃ sākṣibhūtā divāniśam etaiś ca saha dharmo hi taṃ jīvam anugacchati  BrP tvag asthi māṃsaṃ śukraṃ ca śoṇitaṃ ca dvijottamāḥ śarīraṃ varjayanty ete jīvitena vivarjitam  BrP tato dharmasamāyuktaḥ sa jīvaḥ sukham edhate ihaloke pare caiva kiṃ bhūyaḥ kathayāmi vaḥ  BrP munaya ūcuḥ tad darśitaṃ bhagavatā yathā dharmo nugacchati etat tu jñātum icchāmaḥ kathaṃ retaḥ pravartate  BrP vyāsa uvāca annam aśnanti ye devāḥ śarīrasthā dvijottamāḥ pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotir manas tathā  BrP tatas tṛpteṣu bho viprās teṣu bhūteṣu pañcasu manaḥṣaṣṭheṣu śuddhātmā retaḥ saṃpadyate mahat  BrP tato garbhaḥ saṃbhavati śleṣmā strīpuṃsayor dvijāḥ etad vaḥ sarvam ākhyātaṃ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchatha  BrP munaya ūcuḥ ākhyātaṃ no bhagavatā garbhaḥ saṃjāyate yathā yathā jātas tu puruṣaḥ prapadyate tad ucyatām  BrP vyāsa uvāca āsannamātrapuruṣas tair bhūtair abhibhūyate viprayuktas tu tair bhūtaiḥ punar yāty aparāṃ gatim  BrP sa ca bhūtasamāyuktaḥ prāpnoti jīvam eva hi tato sya karma paśyanti śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham devatāḥ pañcabhūtasthāḥ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchatha  BrP munaya ūcuḥ tvag asthi māṃsam utsṛjya tais tu bhūtair vivarjitaḥ jīvaḥ sa bhagavan kvasthaḥ sukhaduḥkhe samaśnute  BrP vyāsa uvāca jīvaḥ karmasamāyuktaḥ śīghraṃ retaḥsamāgataḥ strīṇāṃ puṣpaṃ samāsādya tataḥ kālena bho dvijāḥ  BrP yamasya puruṣaiḥ kleśo yamasya puruṣair vadhaḥ duḥkhaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ ca naraḥ kleśaṃ ca vindati  BrP iha loke sa tu prāṇī janmaprabhṛti bho dvijāḥ sukṛtaṃ karma vai bhuṅkte dharmasya phalam āśritaḥ  BrP yadi dharmaṃ samāyujya janmaprabhṛti sevate tataḥ sa puruṣo bhūtvā sevate nityadā sukham  BrP athāntarāntaraṃ dharmam adharmam upasevate sukhasyānantaraṃ duḥkhaṃ sa jīvo py adhigacchati  BrP adharmeṇa samāyukto yamasya viṣayaṃ gataḥ mahāduḥkhaṃ samāsādya tiryagyonau prajāyate  BrP karmaṇā yena yeneha yasyāṃ yonau prajāyate jīvo mohasamāyuktas tan me śṛṇuta sāṃpratam  BrP yad etad ucyate śāstraiḥ setihāsaiś ca chandasi yamasya viṣayaṃ ghoraṃ martyalokaṃ pravartate  BrP iha sthānāni puṇyāni devatulyāni bho dvijāḥ tiryagyonyatiriktāni gatimanti ca sarvaśaḥ  BrP yamasya bhavane divye brahmalokasame guṇaiḥ karmabhir niyatair baddho jantur duḥkhāny upāśnute  BrP yena yena hi bhāvena yena vai karmaṇā gatim prayāti puruṣo ghorāṃ tathā vakṣyāmy ataḥ param  BrP adhītya caturo vedān dvijo mohasamanvitaḥ patitāt pratigṛhyātha kharayonau prajāyate  BrP kharo jīvati varṣāṇi daśa pañca ca bho dvijāḥ kharo mṛto balīvardaḥ sapta varṣāṇi jīvati  BrP balīvardo mṛtaś cāpi jāyate brahmarākṣasaḥ brahmarakṣas tu māsāṃs trīṃs tato jāyeta brāhmaṇaḥ  BrP patitaṃ yājayitvā tu kṛmiyonau prajāyate tatra jīvati varṣāṇi daśa pañca ca bho dvijāḥ  BrP krimibhāvād vinirmuktas tato jāyeta gardabhaḥ gardabhaḥ pañca varṣāṇi pañca varṣāṇi śūkaraḥ  BrP kukkuṭaḥ pañca varṣāṇi pañca varṣāṇi jambukaḥ śvā varṣam ekaṃ bhavati tato jāyeta mānavaḥ  BrP upādhyāyasya yaḥ pāpaṃ śiṣyaḥ kuryād abuddhimān sa janmānīha saṃsāre trīn āpnoti na saṃśayaḥ  BrP prāk śvā bhavati bho viprās tataḥ kravyāt tataḥ kharaḥ pretya ca parikliṣṭeṣu paścāj jāyeta brāhmaṇaḥ  BrP manasāpi guror bhāryāṃ yaḥ śiṣyo yāti pāpakṛt udagrān praiti saṃsārān adharmeṇeha cetasā  BrP śvayonau tu sa saṃbhūtas trīṇi varṣāṇi jīvati tatrāpi nidhanaṃ prāptaḥ krimiyonau prajāyate  BrP kṛmibhāvam anuprāpto varṣam ekaṃ tu jīvati tatas tu nidhanaṃ prāpya brahmayonau prajāyate  BrP yadi putrasamaṃ śiṣyaṃ gurur hanyād akāraṇam ātmanaḥ kāmakāreṇa so pi hiṃsraḥ prajāyate  BrP pitaraṃ mātaraṃ caiva yas tu putro vamanyate so pi viprā mṛto jantuḥ pūrvaṃ jāyeta gardabhaḥ  BrP gardabhatvaṃ tu saṃprāpya daśa varṣāṇi jīvati saṃvatsaraṃ tu kumbhīras tato jāyeta mānavaḥ  BrP putrasya mātāpitarau yasya ruṣṭāv ubhāv api gurvapadhyānataḥ so pi mṛto jāyeta gardabhaḥ  BrP kharo jīvati māsāṃś ca daśa cāpi caturdaśa biḍālaḥ sapta māsāṃs tu tato jāyeta mānavaḥ  BrP mātāpitarāv ākruśya sārīkaḥ saṃprajāyate tāḍayitvā tu tāv eva jāyate kacchapo dvijāḥ  BrP kacchapo daśa varṣāṇi trīṇi varṣāṇi śalyakaḥ vyālo bhūtvā tu ṣaṇ māsāṃs tato jāyeta mānuṣaḥ  BrP bhartṛpiṇḍam upāśnīno rājadviṣṭāni sevate so pi mohasamāpanno mṛto jāyeta vānaraḥ  BrP vānaro daśa varṣāṇi sapta varṣāṇi mūṣakaḥ śvā ca bhūtvā tu ṣaṇ māsāṃs tato jāyeta mānavaḥ  BrP nyāsāpahartā tu naro yamasya viṣayaṃ gataḥ saṃsārāṇāṃ śataṃ gatvā kṛmiyonau prajāyate  BrP tatra jīvati varṣāṇi daśa pañca ca bho dvijāḥ duṣkṛtasya kṣayaṃ kṛtvā tato jāyeta mānuṣaḥ  BrP asūyako naraś cāpi mṛto jāyeta śārṅgakaḥ viśvāsahartā ca naro mīno jāyeta durmatiḥ  BrP bhūtvā mīno ṣṭa varṣāṇi mṛgo jāyeta bho dvijāḥ mṛgas tu caturo māsāṃs tataś chāgaḥ prajāyate  BrP chāgas tu nidhanaṃ prāpya pūrṇe saṃvatsare tataḥ kīṭaḥ saṃjāyate jantus tato jāyeta mānuṣaḥ  BrP dhānyān yavāṃs tilān māṣān kulitthān sarṣapāṃś caṇān kalāyān atha mudgāṃś ca godhūmān atasīs tathā  BrP sasyāny anyāni hartā ca martyo mohād acetanaḥ saṃjāyate muniśreṣṭhā mūṣiko nirapatrapaḥ  BrP tataḥ pretya muniśreṣṭhā mṛto jāyeta śūkaraḥ śūkaro jātamātras tu rogeṇa mriyate punaḥ  BrP śvā tato jāyate mūkaḥ karmaṇā tena mānavaḥ bhūtvā śvā pañca varṣāṇi tato jāyeta mānavaḥ  BrP paradārābhimarśaṃ tu kṛtvā jāyeta vai vṛkaḥ śvā śṛgālas tato gṛdhro vyālaḥ kaṅko bakas tathā  BrP bhrātur bhāryāṃ tu pāpātmā yo dharṣayati mohitaḥ puṃskokilatvam āpnoti so pi saṃvatsaraṃ dvijāḥ  BrP sakhibhāryāṃ guror bhāryāṃ rājabhāryāṃ tathaiva ca pradharṣayitvā kāmātmā mṛto jāyeta śūkaraḥ  BrP śūkaraḥ pañca varṣāṇi daśa varṣāṇi vai bakaḥ pipīlikas tu māsāṃs trīn kīṭaḥ syān māsam eva ca  BrP etān āsādya saṃsārān kṛmiyonau prajāyate tatra jīvati māsāṃs tu kṛmiyonau caturdaśa  BrP naro dharmakṣayaṃ kṛtvā tato jāyeta mānuṣaḥ pūrvaṃ dattvā tu yaḥ kanyāṃ dvitīye dātum icchati  BrP so pi viprā mṛto jantuḥ krimiyonau prajāyate tatra jīvati varṣāṇi trayodaśa dvijottamāḥ  BrP adharmasaṃkṣaye muktas tato jāyeta mānuṣaḥ devakāryam akṛtvā tu pitṛkāryam athāpi vā  BrP anirvāpya pitṝn devān mṛto jāyeta vāyasaḥ vāyasaḥ śatavarṣāṇi tato jāyeta kukkuṭaḥ  BrP jāyate vyālakaś cāpi māsaṃ tasmāt tu mānuṣaḥ jyeṣṭhaṃ pitṛsamaṃ cāpi bhrātaraṃ yo vamanyate  BrP so pi mṛtyum upāgamya krauñcayonau prajāyate krauñco jīvati varṣāṇi daśa jāyeta jīvakaḥ  BrP tato nidhanam āpnoti mānuṣatvam avāpnuyāt vṛṣalo brāhmaṇīṃ gatvā kṛmiyonau prajāyate  BrP tataḥ saṃprāpya nidhanaṃ jāyate śūkaraḥ punaḥ śūkaro jātamātras tu rogeṇa mriyate dvijāḥ  BrP śvā ca vai jāyate mūḍhaḥ karmaṇā tena bho dvijāḥ śvā bhūtvā kṛtakarmāsau jāyate mānuṣas tataḥ  BrP tatrāpatyaṃ samutpādya mṛto jāyeta mūṣikaḥ kṛtaghnas tu mṛto viprā yamasya viṣayaṃ gataḥ  BrP yamasya viṣaye krūrair baddhaḥ prāpnoti vedanām daṇḍakaṃ mudgaraṃ śūlam agnidaṇḍaṃ ca dāruṇam  BrP asipattravanaṃ ghoraṃ vālukāṃ kūṭaśālmalīm etāś cānyāś ca bahavo yamasya viṣayaṃ gatāḥ  BrP yātanāḥ prāpya ghorās tu tato yāti ca bho dvijāḥ saṃsāracakram āsādya krimiyonau prajāyate  BrP krimir bhavati varṣāṇi daśa pañca ca bho dvijāḥ tato garbhaṃ samāsādya tatraiva mriyate naraḥ  BrP tato garbhaśatair jantur bahuśaḥ saṃprapadyate saṃsārān subahūn gatvā tatas tiryak prajāyate  BrP tato duḥkham anuprāpya bahuvarṣagaṇāni vai sa punarbhavasaṃyuktas tataḥ kūrmaḥ prajāyate  BrP dadhi hṛtvā bakaś cāpi plavo matsyān asaṃskṛtān corayitvā tu durbuddhir madhudaṃśaḥ prajāyate  BrP phalaṃ vā mūlakaṃ hṛtvā pūpaṃ vāpi pipīlikaḥ corayitvā tu niṣpāvaṃ jāyate phalamūṣakaḥ  BrP pāyasaṃ corayitvā tu tittiratvam avāpnuyāt hṛtvā piṣṭamayaṃ pūpaṃ kumbholūkaḥ prajāyate  BrP apo hṛtvā tu durbuddhir vāyaso jāyate naraḥ kāṃsyaṃ hṛtvā tu durbuddhir hārīto jāyate naraḥ  BrP rājataṃ bhājanaṃ hṛtvā kapotaḥ saṃprajāyate hṛtvā tu kāñcanaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ kṛmiyonau prajāyate  BrP pattrorṇaṃ corayitvā tu kuraratvaṃ niyacchati kośakāraṃ tato hṛtvā naro jāyeta nartakaḥ  BrP aṃśukaṃ corayitvā tu śuko jāyeta mānavaḥ corayitvā dukūlaṃ tu mṛto haṃsaḥ prajāyate  BrP krauñcaḥ kārpāsikaṃ hṛtvā mṛto jāyeta mānavaḥ corayitvā naraḥ paṭṭaṃ tv āvikaṃ caiva bho dvijāḥ  BrP kṣaumaṃ ca vastram āhṛtya śaśo jantuḥ prajāyate cūrṇaṃ tu hṛtvā puruṣo mṛto jāyeta barhiṇaḥ  BrP hṛtvā raktāni vastrāṇi jāyate jīvajīvakaḥ varṇakādīṃs tathā gandhāṃś corayitveha mānavaḥ  BrP cucchundaritvam āpnoti vipro lobhaparāyaṇaḥ tatra jīvati varṣāṇi tato daśa ca pañca ca  BrP adharmasya kṣayaṃ kṛtvā tato jāyeta mānavaḥ corayitvā payaś cāpi balākā saṃprajāyate  BrP yas tu corayate tailaṃ naro mohasamanvitaḥ so pi viprā mṛto jantus tailapāyī prajāyate  BrP aśastraṃ puruṣaṃ hatvā saśastraḥ puruṣādhamaḥ arthārthaṃ yadi vā vairī mṛto jāyeta vai kharaḥ  BrP kharo jīvati varṣe dve tataḥ śastreṇa vadhyate sa mṛto mṛgayonau tu nityodvigno bhijāyate  BrP mṛgo vidhyeta śastreṇa gate saṃvatsare tataḥ hato mṛgas tato mīnaḥ so pi jālena badhyate  BrP māse caturthe saṃprāpte śvāpadaḥ saṃprajāyate śvāpado daśa varṣāṇi dvīpī varṣāṇi pañca ca  BrP tatas tu nidhanaṃ prāptaḥ kālaparyāyacoditaḥ adharmasya kṣayaṃ kṛtvā mānuṣatvam avāpnuyāt  BrP vādyaṃ hṛtvā tu puruṣo lomaśaḥ saṃprajāyate tathā piṇyākasaṃmiśram annaṃ yaś corayen naraḥ  BrP sa jāyate babhrusaṭo dāruṇo mūṣiko naraḥ daśan vai mānuṣān nityaṃ pāpātmā sa dvijottamāḥ  BrP ghṛtaṃ hṛtvā tu durbuddhiḥ kāko madguḥ prajāyate matsyamāṃsam atho hṛtvā kāko jāyeta mānavaḥ  BrP lavaṇaṃ corayitvā tu cirikākaḥ prajāyate viśvāsena tu nikṣiptaṃ yo panihnoti mānavaḥ  BrP sa gatāyur naras tena matsyayonau prajāyate matsyayonim anuprāpya mṛto jāyeta mānuṣaḥ  BrP mānuṣatvam anuprāpya kṣīṇāyur upajāyate pāpāni tu naraḥ kṛtvā tiryag jāyeta bho dvijāḥ  BrP na cātmanaḥ pramāṇaṃ tu dharmaṃ jānāti kiṃcana ye pāpāni narāḥ kṛtvā nirasyanti vrataiḥ sadā  BrP sukhaduḥkhasamāyuktā vyādhimanto bhavanty uta asaṃvītāḥ prajāyante mlecchāś cāpi na saṃśayaḥ  BrP narāḥ pāpasamācārā lobhamohasamanvitāḥ varjayanti hi pāpāni janmaprabhṛti ye narāḥ  BrP arogā rūpavantaś ca dhaninas te bhavanty uta striyo py etena kalpena kṛtvā pāpam avāpnuyuḥ  BrP eteṣām eva pāpānāṃ bhāryātvam upayānti tāḥ prāyeṇa haraṇe doṣāḥ sarva eva prakīrtitāḥ  BrP etad vai leśamātreṇa kathitaṃ vo dvijarṣabhāḥ aparasmin kathāyoge bhūyaḥ śroṣyatha bho dvijāḥ  BrP etan mayā mahābhāgā brahmaṇo vadataḥ purā surarṣīṇāṃ śrutaṃ madhye pṛṣṭaṃ cāpi yathā tathā  BrP mayāpi tubhyaṃ kārtsnyena yathāvad anuvarṇitam etac chrutvā muniśreṣṭhā dharme kuruta mānasam  BrP munaya ūcuḥ adharmasya gatir brahman kathitā nas tvayānagha dharmasya ca gatiṃ śrotum icchāmo vadatāṃ vara  BrP kṛtvā pāpāni karmāṇi kathaṃ yānty aśubhāṃ gatim karmaṇā ca kṛteneha kena yānti śubhāṃ gatim  BrP vyāsa uvāca kṛtvā pāpāni karmāṇi tv adharmavaśam āgataḥ manasā viparītena nirayaṃ pratipadyate  BrP mohād adharmaṃ yaḥ kṛtvā punaḥ samanutapyate manaḥsamādhisaṃyukto na sa seveta duṣkṛtam  BrP yadi viprāḥ kathayate viprāṇāṃ dharmavādinām tato dharmakṛtāt kṣipram aparādhāt pramucyate  BrP yathā yathā naraḥ samyag adharmam anubhāṣate samāhitena manasā vimuñcati tathā tathā  BrP yathā yathā manas tasya duṣkṛtaṃ karma garhate tathā tathā śarīraṃ tu tenādharmeṇa mucyate  BrP bhujaṃga iva nirmokān pūrvabhuktāñ jahāti tān dattvā viprasya dānāni vividhāni samāhitaḥ  BrP manaḥsamādhisaṃyuktaḥ svargatiṃ pratipadyate dānāni tu pravakṣyāmi yāni dattvā dvijottamāḥ  BrP naraḥ kṛtvāpy akāryāṇi tato dharmeṇa yujyate sarveṣām eva dānānām annaṃ śreṣṭham udāhṛtam  BrP sarvam annaṃ pradātavyam ṛjunā dharmam icchatā prāṇā hy annaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ tasmāj jantuḥ prajāyate  BrP anne pratiṣṭhitā lokās tasmād annaṃ praśasyate annam eva praśaṃsanti devarṣipitṛmānavāḥ  BrP annasya hi pradānena svargam āpnoti mānavaḥ nyāyalabdhaṃ pradātavyaṃ dvijātibhyo nnam uttamam  BrP svādhyāyasamupetebhyaḥ prahṛṣṭenāntarātmanā yasya tv annam upāśnanti brāhmaṇāś ca sakṛd daśa  BrP hṛṣṭena manasā dattaṃ na sa tiryaggatir bhavet brāhmaṇānāṃ sahasrāṇi daśābhojya dvijottamāḥ  BrP naro dharmāt pramucyeta pāpeṣv abhirataḥ sadā bhaikṣeṇānnaṃ samāhṛtya vipro vedapuraskṛtaḥ  BrP svādhyāyanirate vipre dattveha sukham edhate ahiṃsan brāhmaṇasvāni nyāyena paripālya ca  BrP kṣatriyas tarasā prāptam annaṃ yo vai prayacchati dvijebhyo vedamukhyebhyaḥ prayataḥ susamāhitaḥ  BrP tenāpohati dharmātmā duṣkṛtaṃ karma bho dvijāḥ ṣaḍbhāgapariśuddhaṃ ca kṛṣer bhāgam upārjitam  BrP vaiśyo dadad dvijātibhyaḥ pāpebhyaḥ parimucyate avāpya prāṇasaṃdehaṃ kārkaśyena samārjitam  BrP annaṃ dattvā dvijātibhyaḥ śūdraḥ pāpāt pramucyate aurasena balenānnam arjayitvā vihiṃsakaḥ  BrP yaḥ prayacchati viprebhyo na sa durgāṇi sevate nyāyenāvāptam annaṃ tu naro harṣasamanvitaḥ  BrP dvijebhyo vedavṛddhebhyo dattvā pāpāt pramucyate annam ūrjaskaraṃ loke dattvorjasvī bhaven naraḥ  BrP satāṃ panthānam āvṛtya sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate dānavidbhiḥ kṛtaḥ panthā yena yānti manīṣiṇaḥ  BrP teṣv apy annasya dātāras tebhyo dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ sarvāvasthaṃ manuṣyeṇa nyāyenānnam upārjitam  BrP kāryān nyāyāgataṃ nityam annaṃ hi paramā gatiḥ annasya hi pradānena naro yāti parāṃ gatim  BrP sarvakāmasamāyuktaḥ pretya cāpy aśnute sukham evaṃ puṇyasamāyukto naraḥ pāpaiḥ pramucyate  BrP tasmād annaṃ pradātavyam anyāyaparivarjitam yas tu prāṇāhutīpūrvam annaṃ bhuṅkte gṛhī sadā  BrP avandhyaṃ divasaṃ kuryād annadānena mānavaḥ bhojayitvā śataṃ nityaṃ naro vedavidāṃ varam  BrP nyāyaviddharmaviduṣām itihāsavidāṃ tathā na yāti narakaṃ ghoraṃ saṃsāraṃ na ca sevate  BrP sarvakāmasamāyuktaḥ pretya cāpy aśnute sukham evaṃ karmasamāyukto ramate vigatajvaraḥ  BrP rūpavān kīrtimāṃś caiva dhanavāṃś copajāyate etad vaḥ sarvam ākhyātam annadānaphalaṃ mahat mūlam etat tu dharmāṇāṃ pradānānāṃ ca bho dvijāḥ  BrP munaya ūcuḥ paralokagatānāṃ tu svakarmasthānavāsinām teṣāṃ śrāddhaṃ kathaṃ jñeyaṃ putraiś cānyaiś ca bandhubhiḥ  BrP vyāsa uvāca namaskṛtya jagannāthaṃ vārāhaṃ lokabhāvanam śṛṇudhvaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi śrāddhakalpaṃ yathoditam  BrP purā kokājale magnān pitṝn uddhṛtavān vibhuḥ śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā tadā devo yathā tatra dvijottamāḥ  BrP munaya ūcuḥ kimarthaṃ te tu kokāyāṃ nimagnāḥ pitaro mbhasi kathaṃ tenoddhṛtās te vai vārāheṇa dvijottama  BrP tasmin kokāmukhe tīrthe bhuktimuktiphalaprade śrotum icchāmahe brūhi paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi naḥ  BrP vyāsa uvāca tretādvāparayoḥ saṃdhau pitaro divyamānuṣāḥ purā merugireḥ pṛṣṭhe viśvair devaiḥ saha sthitāḥ  BrP teṣāṃ samupaviṣṭānāṃ pitṝṇāṃ somasaṃbhavā kanyā kāntimatī divyā purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitā tām ūcuḥ pitaro divyā ye tatrāsan samāgatāḥ  BrP pitara ūcuḥ kāsi bhadre prabhuḥ ko vā bhavatyā vaktum arhasi  BrP vyāsa uvāca sā provāca pitṝn devān kalā cāndramasīti ha prabhutve bhavatām eva varayāmi yadīcchatha  BrP ūrjā nāmāsti prathamaṃ svadhā ca tadanantaram bhavadbhiś cādyaiva kṛtaṃ nāma koketi bhāvitam  BrP te hi tasyā vacaḥ śrutvā pitaro divyamānuṣāḥ tasyā mukhaṃ nirīkṣanto na tṛptim adhijagmire  BrP viśvedevāś ca tāñ jñātvā kanyāmukhanirīkṣakān yogacyutān nirīkṣyaiva vihāya tridivaṃ gatāḥ  BrP bhagavān api śītāṃśur ūrjāṃ nāpaśyad ātmajām samākulamanā dadhyau kva gateti mahāyaśāḥ  BrP sa viveda tadā somaḥ prāptāṃ pitṝṃś ca kāmataḥ taiś cāvalokitāṃ hārdāt svīkṛtāṃ ca tapobalāt  BrP tataḥ krodhaparītātmā pitṝñ śaśadharo dvijāḥ śaśāpa nipatiṣyadhvaṃ yogabhraṣṭā vicetasaḥ  BrP yasmād adattāṃ matkanyāṃ kāmayadhvaṃ subāliśāḥ yasmād dhṛtavatī ceyaṃ patīn pitṛmatī satī  BrP svatantrā dharmam utsṛjya tasmād bhavatu nimnagā koketi prathitā loke śiśirādrisamāśritā  BrP itthaṃ śaptāś candramasā pitaro divyamānuṣāḥ yogabhraṣṭā nipatitā himavatpādabhūtale  BrP ūrjā tatraiva patitā girirājasya vistṛte prasthe tīrthaṃ samāsādya saptasāmudram uttamam  BrP kokā nāma tato vegān nadī tīrthaśatākulā plāvayantī gireḥ śṛṅgaṃ sarpaṇāt tu sarit smṛtā  BrP atha te pitaro viprā yogahīnā mahānadīm dadṛśuḥ śītasalilāṃ na vidus tāṃ sulocanām  BrP tatas tu girirāḍ dṛṣṭvā pitṝṃs tāṃs tu kṣudhārditān badarīm ādideśātha dhenuṃ caikāṃ madhusravām  BrP kṣīraṃ madhu ca tad divyaṃ kokāmbho badarīphalam idaṃ girivareṇaiṣāṃ poṣaṇāya nirūpitam  BrP tayā vṛttyā tu vasatāṃ pitṝṇāṃ munisattamāḥ daśa varṣasahasrāṇi yayur ekam aho yathā  BrP evaṃ loke vipitari tathaiva vigatasvadhe daityā babhūvur balino yātudhānāś ca rākṣasāḥ  BrP te tān pitṛgaṇān daityā yātudhānāś ca vegitāḥ viśvair devair virahitān sarvataḥ samupādravan  BrP daiteyān yātudhānāṃś ca dṛṣṭvaivāpatato dvijāḥ kokātaṭasthām uttuṅgāṃ śilāṃ te jagṛhū ruṣā  BrP gṛhītāyāṃ śilāyāṃ tu kokā vegavatī pitṝn chādayām āsa toyena plāvayantī himācalam  BrP pitṝn antarhitān dṛṣṭvā daiteyā rākṣasās tathā vibhītakaṃ samāruhya nirāhārās tirohitāḥ  BrP salilena viṣīdantaḥ pitaraḥ kṣudbhramāturāḥ viṣīdamānam ātmānaṃ samīkṣya salilāśayāḥ jagur janārdanaṃ devaṃ pitaraḥ śaraṇaṃ harim  BrP pitara ūcuḥ jayasva govinda jagannivāsa BrPajayo stu naḥ keśava te prasādāt BrPbjanārdanāsmān salilāntarasthān BrPcuddhartum arhasy anaghapratāpa BrPdniśācarair dāruṇadarśanaiḥ prabho BrPavareṇya vaikuṇṭha varāha viṣṇo BrPbnārāyaṇāśeṣamaheśvareśa BrPcprayāhi bhītāñ jaya padmanābha BrPdupendra yogin madhukaiṭabhaghna BrPaviṣṇo anantācyuta vāsudeva BrPbśrīśārṅgacakrāmbujaśaṅkhapāṇe BrPcrakṣasva deveśvara rākṣasebhyaḥ BrPdtvaṃ pitā jagataḥ śaṃbho nānyaḥ śaktaḥ prabādhitum niśācaragaṇaṃ bhīmam atas tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ  BrP tvannāmasaṃkīrtanato niśācarā BrPadravanti bhūtāny apayānti cārayaḥ BrPbnāśaṃ tathā saṃprati yānti viṣṇo BrPcdharmādi satyaṃ bhavatīha mukhyam BrPdvyāsa uvāca itthaṃ stutaḥ sa pitṛbhir dharaṇīdharas tu BrPatuṣṭas tadāviṣkṛtadivyamūrtiḥ BrPbkokāmukhe pitṛgaṇaṃ salile nimagnaṃ BrPcdevo dadarśa śirasātha śilāṃ vahantam BrPdtaṃ dṛṣṭvā salile magnaṃ kroḍarūpī janārdanaḥ bhītaṃ pitṛgaṇaṃ viṣṇur uddhartuṃ matir ādadhe  BrP daṃṣṭrāgreṇa samāhatya śilāṃ cikṣepa śūkaraḥ pitṝn ādāya ca vibhur ujjahāra śilātalāt  BrP varāhadaṃṣṭrāsaṃlagnāḥ pitaraḥ kanakojjvalāḥ kokāmukhe gatabhayāḥ kṛtā devena viṣṇunā  BrP uddhṛtya ca pitṝn devo viṣṇutīrthe tu śūkaraḥ dadau samāhitas tebhyo viṣṇur lohārgale jalam  BrP tataḥ svaromasaṃbhūtān kuśān ādāya keśavaḥ svedodbhavāṃs tilāṃś caiva cakre colmukam uttamam  BrP jyotiḥ sūryaprabhaṃ kṛtvā pātraṃ tīrthaṃ ca kāmikam sthitaḥ koṭivaṭasyādho vāri gaṅgādharaṃ śuci  BrP tuṅgakūṭāt samādāya yajñīyān oṣadhīrasān madhukṣīrarasān gandhān puṣpadhūpānulepanān  BrP ādāya dhenuṃ saraso ratnāny ādāya cārṇavāt daṃṣṭrayollikhya dharaṇīm abhyukṣya salilena ca  BrP gharmodbhavenopalipya kuśair ullikhya tāṃ punaḥ pariṇīyolmukenainām abhyukṣya ca punaḥ punaḥ  BrP kuśān ādāya prāgagrāṃl lomakūpāntarasthitān ṛṣīn āhūya papraccha kariṣye pitṛtarpaṇam  BrP tair apy ukte kuruṣveti viśvān devāṃs tato vibhuḥ āhūya mantratas teṣāṃ viṣṭarāṇi dadau prabhuḥ  BrP āhūya mantratas teṣāṃ vedoktavidhinā hariḥ akṣatair daivatārakṣāṃ cakre cakragadādharaḥ  BrP akṣatās tu yavauṣadhyaḥ sarvadevāṃśasaṃbhavāḥ rakṣanti sarvatra diśo rakṣārthaṃ nirmitā hi te  BrP devadānavadaityeṣu yakṣarakṣaḥsu caiva hi nahi kaścit kṣayaṃ teṣāṃ kartuṃ śaktaś carācare  BrP na kenacit kṛtaṃ yasmāt tasmāt te hy akṣatāḥ kṛtāḥ devānāṃ te hi rakṣārthaṃ niyuktā viṣṇunā purā  BrP kuśagandhayavaiḥ puṣpair arghyaṃ kṛtvā ca śūkaraḥ viśvebhyo devebhya iti tatas tān paryapṛcchata  BrP pitṝn āvāhayiṣyāmi ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ āvāhayasveti ca tair uktas tv āvāhayec chuciḥ  BrP śliṣṭamūlāgradarbhāṃs tu satilān veda vedavit jānāv āropya hastaṃ tu dadau savyena cāsanam  BrP tathaiva jānusaṃsthena kareṇaikena tān pitṝn vārāhaḥ pitṛviprāṇām āyāntu na itīrayan  BrP apahatety uvācaiva rakṣaṇaṃ cāpasavyataḥ kṛtvā cāvāhanaṃ cakre pitṝṇāṃ nāmagotrataḥ  BrP tat pitaro manojarān āgacchata pātratraye pretapātrād arghaṃ caiva prasecayet ye samānā iti japan pūrvavac cheṣam ācaret  BrP strīṇām apy evam eva syād ekoddiṣṭam udāhṛtam sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ tāsāṃ putrābhāve na vidyate  BrP pratisaṃvatsaraṃ kāryam ekoddiṣṭaṃ naraiḥ striyāḥ mṛtāhani ca tat kāryaṃ pitṝṇāṃ vidhicoditam  BrP putrābhāve sapiṇḍās tu tadabhāve sahodarāḥ kuryur etaṃ vidhiṃ samyak putrasya ca sutāḥ sutāḥ  BrP kuryān mātāmahānāṃ tu putrikātanayas tathā dvyāmuṣyāyaṇasaṃjñās tu mātāmahapitāmahān  BrP pūjayeyur yathānyāyaṃ śrāddhair naimittikair api sarvābhāve striyaḥ kuryuḥ svabhartṝṇām amantrakam  BrP tadabhāve ca nṛpatiḥ kārayet tv akuṭumbinām tajjātīyair naraiḥ samyag vāhādyāḥ sakalāḥ kriyāḥ  BrP sarveṣām eva varṇānāṃ bāndhavo nṛpatir yataḥ etā vaḥ kathitā viprā nityā naimittikās tathā  BrP vakṣye śrāddhāśrayām anyāṃ nityanaimittikāṃ kriyām darśas tatra nimittaṃ tu vidyād indukṣayānvitaḥ  BrP nityas tu niyataḥ kālas tasmin kuryād yathoditam sapiṇḍīkaraṇād ūrdhvaṃ pitur yaḥ prapitāmahaḥ  BrP sa tu lepabhujaṃ yāti praluptaḥ pitṛpiṇḍataḥ teṣāṃ hi yaś caturtho nyaḥ sa tu lepabhujo bhavet  BrP so pi saṃbandhato hīnam upabhogaṃ prapadyate pitā pitāmahaś caiva tathaiva prapitāmahaḥ  BrP piṇḍasaṃbandhino hy ete vijñeyāḥ puruṣās trayaḥ lepasaṃbandhinaś cānye pitāmahapitāmahāt  BrP prabhṛtyuktās trayas teṣāṃ yajamānaś ca saptamaḥ ity eṣa munibhiḥ proktaḥ saṃbandhaḥ sāptapauruṣaḥ  BrP yajamānāt prabhṛty ūrdhvam anulepabhujas tathā tato nye pūrvajāḥ sarve ye cānye narakaukasaḥ  BrP ye pi tiryaktvam āpannā ye ca bhūtādisaṃsthitāḥ tān sarvān yajamāno vai śrāddhaṃ kurvan yathāvidhi  BrP sa samāpyāyate viprā yena yena vadāmi tat annaprakiraṇaṃ yat tu manuṣyaiḥ kriyate bhuvi  BrP tena tṛptim upāyānti ye piśācatvam āgatāḥ yad ambu snānavastrotthaṃ bhūmau patati bho dvijāḥ  BrP tena ye tarutāṃ prāptās teṣāṃ tṛptiḥ prajāyate yās tu gandhāmbukaṇikāḥ patanti dharaṇītale  BrP tābhir āpyāyanaṃ teṣāṃ devatvaṃ ye kule gatāḥ uddhṛteṣv atha piṇḍeṣu yāś cāmbukaṇikā bhuvi  BrP tābhir āpyāyanaṃ teṣāṃ ye tiryaktvaṃ kule gatāḥ ye cādantāḥ kule bālāḥ kriyāyogād bahiṣkṛtāḥ  BrP vipannās tv anadhikārāḥ saṃmārjitajalāśinaḥ bhuktvā cācāmatāṃ yac ca yaj jalaṃ cāṅghriśaucajam  BrP brāhmaṇānāṃ tathaivānyat tena tṛptiṃ prayānti vai evaṃ yo yajamānasya yaś ca teṣāṃ dvijanmanām  BrP kaścij jalānnavikṣepaḥ śucir ucchiṣṭa eva vā tenānnena kule tatra ye ca yonyantaraṃ gatāḥ  BrP prayānty āpyāyanaṃ viprāḥ samyak śrāddhakriyāvatām anyāyopārjitair arthair yac chrāddhaṃ kriyate naraiḥ  BrP tṛpyante te na cāṇḍāla pulkasādyāsu yoniṣu evam āpyāyanaṃ viprā bahūnām eva bāndhavaiḥ  BrP śrāddhaṃ kurvadbhir atrāmbu vikṣepaiḥ saṃprajāyate tasmāc chrāddhaṃ naro bhaktyā śākenāpi yathāvidhi  BrP kurvīta kurvataḥ śrāddhaṃ kule kaścin na sīdati śrāddhaṃ deyaṃ tu vipreṣu saṃyateṣv agnihotriṣu  BrP avadāteṣu vidvatsu śrotriyeṣu viśeṣataḥ triṇāciketas trimadhus trisuparṇaḥ ṣaḍaṅgavit  BrP mātāpitṛparaś caiva svasrīyaḥ sāmavedavit ṛtvikpurohitācāryam upādhyāyaṃ ca bhojayet  BrP mātulaḥ śvaśuraḥ śyālaḥ saṃbandhī droṇapāṭhakaḥ maṇḍalabrāhmaṇo yas tu purāṇārthaviśāradaḥ  BrP akalpaḥ kalpasaṃtuṣṭaḥ pratigrahavivarjitaḥ ete śrāddhe niyoktavyā brāhmaṇāḥ paṅktipāvanāḥ  BrP nimantrayeta pūrvedyuḥ pūrvoktān dvijasattamān daive niyoge pitrye ca tāṃs tathaivopakalpayet  BrP taiś ca saṃyamibhir bhāvyaṃ yas tu śrāddhaṃ kariṣyati śrāddhaṃ dattvā ca bhuktvā ca maithunaṃ yo dhigacchati  BrP pitaras tasya vai māsaṃ tasmin retasi śerate gatvā ca yoṣitaṃ śrāddhe yo bhuṅkte yas tu gacchati  BrP retomūtrakṛtāhārās taṃ māsaṃ pitaras tayoḥ tasmāt tv aprathamaṃ kāryaṃ prājñenopanimantraṇam  BrP aprāptau taddine vāpi varjyā yoṣitprasaṅginaḥ bhikṣārtham āgatāṃś cāpi kālena saṃyatān yatīn  BrP bhojayet praṇipātādyaiḥ prasādya yatamānasaḥ yoginaś ca tadā śrāddhe bhojanīyā vipaścitā  BrP yogādhārā hi pitaras tasmāt tān pūjayet sadā brāhmaṇānāṃ sahasrāṇi eko yogī bhaved yadi  BrP yajamānaṃ ca bhoktṝṃś ca naur ivāmbhasi tārayet pitṛgāthā tathaivātra gīyate brahmavādibhiḥ  BrP yā gītā pitṛbhiḥ pūrvam ailasyāsīn mahīpateḥ kadā naḥ saṃtatāv agryaḥ kasyacid bhavitā sutaḥ  BrP yo yogibhuktaśeṣān no bhuvi piṇḍān pradāsyati gayāyām athavā piṇḍaṃ khaḍgamāṃsaṃ tathā haviḥ  BrP kālaśākaṃ tilājyaṃ ca tṛptaye kṛsaraṃ ca naḥ vaiśvadevaṃ ca saumyaṃ ca khaḍgamāṃsaṃ paraṃ haviḥ  BrP viṣāṇavarjaṃ śirasa ā pādād āśiṣāmahe dadyāc chrāddhaṃ trayodaśyāṃ maghāsu ca yathāvidhi  BrP madhusarpiḥsamāyuktaṃ pāyasaṃ dakṣiṇāyane tasmāt saṃpūjayed bhaktyā svapitṝn vidhivan naraḥ  BrP kāmān abhīpsan sakalān pāpād ātmavimocanam vasūn rudrāṃs tathādityān nakṣatragrahatārakāḥ  BrP prīṇayanti manuṣyāṇāṃ pitaraḥ śrāddhatarpitāḥ āyuḥ prajāṃ dhanaṃ vidyāṃ svargaṃ mokṣaṃ sukhāni ca  BrP prayacchanti tathā rājyaṃ pitaraḥ śrāddhatarpitāḥ tathāparāhṇaḥ pūrvāhṇāt pitṝṇām atiricyate  BrP saṃpūjya svāgatenaitān sadane bhyāgatān dvijān pavitrapāṇir ācāntān āsaneṣūpaveśayet  BrP śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā vidhānena saṃbhojya ca dvijottamān visarjayet priyāṇy uktvā praṇipatya ca bhaktitaḥ  BrP ādvāram anugacchec ca āgacched anumoditaḥ tato nityakriyāṃ kuryād bhojayec ca tathātithīn  BrP nityakriyāṃ pitṝṇāṃ ca kecid icchanti sattamāḥ na pitṝṇāṃ tathaivānye śeṣaṃ pūrvavad ācaret  BrP pṛthaktvena vadanty anye kecit pūrvaṃ ca pūrvavat tatas tad annaṃ bhuñjīta saha bhṛtyādibhir naraḥ  BrP evaṃ kurvīta dharmajñaḥ śrāddhaṃ pitryaṃ samāhitaḥ yathā ca vipramukhyānāṃ paritoṣo bhijāyate  BrP idānīṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi varjanīyān dvijādhamān mitradhruk kunakhī klībaḥ kṣayī śuklī vaṇikpathaḥ  BrP śyāvadanto tha khalvāṭaḥ kāṇo ndho badhiro jaḍaḥ mūkaḥ paṅguḥ kuṇiḥ ṣaṇḍho duścarmā vyaṅgakekarau  BrP kuṣṭhī raktekṣaṇaḥ kubjo vāmano vikaṭo lasaḥ mitraśatrur duṣkulīnaḥ paśupālo nirākṛtiḥ  BrP parivittiḥ parivettā parivedanikāsutaḥ vṛṣalīpatis tatsutaś ca na bhavec chrāddhabhug dvijaḥ  BrP vṛṣalīputrasaṃskartā anūḍho didhiṣūpatiḥ bhṛtakādhyāpako yas tu bhṛtakādhyāpitaś ca yaḥ  BrP sūtakānnopajīvī ca mṛgayuḥ somavikrayī abhiśastas tathā stenaḥ patito vārddhuṣiḥ śaṭhaḥ  BrP piśuno vedasaṃtyāgī dānāgnityāganiṣṭhuraḥ rājñaḥ purohito bhṛtyo vidyāhīno tha matsarī  BrP vṛddhadviḍ durdharaḥ krūro mūḍho devalakas tathā nakṣatrasūcakaś caiva parvakāraś ca garhitaḥ  BrP ayājyayājakaḥ ṣaṇḍho garhitā ye ca ye dhamāḥ na te śrāddhe niyoktavyā dṛṣṭvāmī paṅktidūṣakāḥ  BrP asatāṃ pragraho yatra satāṃ caivāvamānanā daṇḍo devakṛtas tatra sadyaḥ patati dāruṇaḥ  BrP hitvāgamaṃ suvihitaṃ bāliśaṃ yas tu bhojayet ādidharmaṃ samutsṛjya dātā tatra vinaśyati  BrP yas tv āśritaṃ dvijaṃ tyaktvā anyam ānīya bhojayet tanniḥśvāsāgninirdagdhas tatra dātā vinaśyati  BrP vastrābhāve kriyā nāsti yajñā vedās tapāṃsi ca tasmād vāsāṃsi deyāni śrāddhakāle viśeṣataḥ  BrP kauśeyaṃ kṣaumakārpāsaṃ dukūlam ahataṃ tathā śrāddhe tv etāni yo dadyāt kāmān āpnoti cottamān  BrP yathā devatābhyaḥ pitṛbhyaś ca mahāyogibhya eva ca namaḥ svāhāyai svadhāyai nityam eva bhavantv iti  BrP ādyāvasāne śrāddhasya trir āvṛttyā japet tadā piṇḍanirvapaṇe vāpi japed evaṃ samāhitaḥ  BrP kṣipram āyānti pitaro rākṣasāḥ pradravanti ca prīyante triṣu lokeṣu mantro yaṃ tārayaty uta  BrP kṣaumasūtraṃ navaṃ dadyāc chāṇaṃ kārpāsikaṃ tathā pattrorṇaṃ paṭṭasūtraṃ ca kauśeyaṃ ca vivarjayet  BrP varjayec cādaśaṃ prājño yadyapy avyāhataṃ bhavet na prīṇayanty athaitāni dātuś cāpy anayo bhavet  BrP na nivedyo bhavet piṇḍaḥ pitṝṇāṃ yas tu jīvati iṣṭenānnena bhakṣyeṇa bhojayet taṃ yathāvidhi  BrP piṇḍam agnau sadā dadyād bhogārthī satataṃ naraḥ patnyai dadyāt prajārthī ca madhyamaṃ mantrapūrvakam  BrP uttamāṃ dyutim anvicchan piṇḍaṃ goṣu prayacchati prajñāṃ caiva yaśaḥ kīrtim apsu caiva  BrP pāvantīṃ śatapattrāṃ ca gandhaśephālikām api kubjakaṃ tagaraṃ caiva mṛgam āraṇyaketakīm  BrP yūthikām atimuktaṃ ca śrāddhayogyāni bho dvijāḥ kamalaṃ kumudaṃ padmaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ ca yatnataḥ  BrP indīvaraṃ kokanadaṃ kahlāraṃ ca niyojayet kuṣṭhaṃ māṃsī vālakaṃ ca kukkuṭī jātipattrakam  BrP nalikośīramustaṃ ca granthiparṇī ca sundarī punar apy evamādīni gandhayogyāni cakṣate  BrP gugguluṃ candanaṃ caiva śrīvāsam aguruṃ tathā dhūpāni pitṛyogyāni ṛṣiguggulam eva ca  BrP rājamāṣāṃś ca caṇakān masūrān koradūṣakān vipruṣān markaṭāṃś caiva kodravāṃś caiva varjayet  BrP māhiṣaṃ cāmaraṃ mārgam sārdhaṃ vrajet pūyavahaṃ naraḥ tasmāt sarvaprayatnena nāharet tu vicakṣaṇaḥ  BrP niṣiddhāni varāheṇa svayaṃ pitrartham ādarāt varam evātmamāṃsasya bhakṣaṇaṃ munayaḥ kṛtam  BrP na tv eva hi niṣiddhānām ādānaṃ puṃbhir ādarāt ajñānād vā pramādād vā sakṛd etāni ca dvijāḥ  BrP bhakṣitāni niṣiddhāni prāyaścittaṃ tataś caret phalamūladadhikṣīra takragomūtrayāvakaiḥ  BrP bhojyānnabhojyasaṃbhukte pratyekaṃ saṃskṛtaḥ dadāti yajate yajñaiḥ samṛddhair āptadakṣiṇaiḥ  BrP adhītya svargam anvicchaṃs tretāgniśaraṇaḥ sadā ārdrahastaprado nityaṃ prajā dharmeṇa pālayan  BrP satyaḥ satyāni kurute nityaṃ yaḥ śuddhidarśanaḥ dharmadaṇḍena nirdagdho dharmakāmārthasādhakaḥ  BrP yantritaḥ kāryakaraṇaiḥ ṣaḍbhāgakṛtalakṣaṇaḥ grāmyadharmān na seveta svacchandenārthakovidaḥ  BrP ṛtukāle tu dharmātmā patnīm upāśrayet sadā sadopavāsī niyataḥ svādhyāyanirataḥ śuciḥ  BrP vahiskāntarite nityaṃ śayāno sti sadā gṛhe sarvātithyaṃ trivargasya kurvāṇaḥ sumanāḥ sadā  BrP śūdrāṇāṃ cānnakāmānāṃ nityaṃ siddham iti bruvan svārthād vā yadi vā kāmān na kiṃcid upalakṣayet  BrP pitṛdevātithikṛte sādhanaṃ kurute ca yat svaveśmani yathānyāyam upāste bhaikṣyam eva ca  BrP dvikālam agnihotraṃ ca juhvāno vai yathāvidhi gobrāhmaṇahitārthāya raṇe cābhimukho hataḥ  BrP tretāgnimantrapūtena samāviśya dvijo bhavet jñānavijñānasaṃpannaḥ saṃskṛto vedapāragaḥ  BrP vaiśyo bhavati dharmātmā kṣatriyaḥ svena karmaṇā etaiḥ karmaphalair devi nyūnajātikulodbhavaḥ  BrP śūdro py āgamasaṃpanno dvijo bhavati saṃskṛtaḥ brāhmaṇo vāpy asadvṛttaḥ sarvasaṃkarabhojanaḥ  BrP sa brāhmaṇyaṃ samutsṛjya śūdro bhavati tādṛśaḥ karmabhiḥ śucibhir devī śuddhātmā vijitendriyaḥ  BrP śūdro pi dvijavat sevya iti brahmābravīt svayam svabhāvakarmaṇā caiva yatra śūdro dhitiṣṭhati  BrP viśuddhaḥ sa dvijātibhyo vijñeya iti me matiḥ na yonir nāpi saṃskāro na śrutir na ca saṃtatiḥ  BrP kāraṇāni dvijatvasya vṛttam eva tu kāraṇam sarvo yaṃ brāhmaṇo loke vṛttena tu vidhīyate  BrP vṛtte sthitaś ca śūdro pi brāhmaṇatvaṃ ca gacchati brahmasvabhāvaḥ suśroṇi samaḥ sarvatra me mataḥ  BrP nirguṇaṃ nirmalaṃ brahma yatra tiṣṭhati sa dvijaḥ ete ye vimalā devi sthānabhāvanidarśakāḥ  BrP svayaṃ ca varadenoktā brahmaṇā sṛjatā prajāḥ brahmaṇo hi mahat kṣetraṃ loke carati pādavat  BrP yat tatra bījaṃ patati sā kṛṣiḥ pretya bhāvinī saṃtuṣṭena sadā bhāvyaṃ satpathālambinā sadā  BrP brāhmaṃ hi mārgam ākramya vartitavyaṃ bubhūṣatā saṃhitādhyāyinā bhāvyaṃ gṛhe vai gṛhamedhinā  BrP nityaṃ svādhyāyayuktena na cādhyayanajīvinā evaṃbhūto hi yo vipraḥ satataṃ satpathe sthitaḥ  BrP āhitāgnir adhīyāno brahmabhūyāya kalpate brāhmaṇyaṃ devi saṃprāpya rakṣitavyaṃ yatātmanā  BrP yonipratigrahādānaiḥ karmabhiś ca śucismite etat te guhyam ākhyātaṃ yathā śūdro bhaved dvijaḥ brāhmaṇo vā cyuto dharmād yathā śūdratvam āpnuyāt  BrP umovāca bhagavan sarvabhūteśa surāsuranamaskṛta dharmādharme nṛṇāṃ deva brūhi me saṃśayaṃ vibho  BrP karmaṇā manasā vācā trividhair dehinaḥ sadā badhyante bandhanaiḥ kair vā mucyante vā kathaṃ vada  BrP kena śīlena vai deva karmaṇā kīdṛśena vā samācārair guṇaiḥ kair vā svargaṃ yāntīha mānavāḥ  BrP śiva uvāca devi dharmārthatattvajñe dharmanitye ume sadā sarvaprāṇihitaḥ praśnaḥ śrūyatāṃ buddhivardhanaḥ  BrP satyadharmaratāḥ śāntāḥ sarvaliṅgavivarjitāḥ nādharmeṇa na dharmeṇa badhyante chinnasaṃśayāḥ  BrP pralayotpattitattvajñāḥ sarvajñāḥ sarvadarśinaḥ vītarāgā vimucyante puruṣāḥ karmabandhanaiḥ  BrP karmaṇā manasā vācā ye na hiṃsanti kiṃcana ye na majjanti kasmiṃścit te na badhnanti karmabhiḥ  BrP prāṇātipātād viratāḥ śīlavanto dayānvitāḥ tulyadveṣyapriyā dāntā mucyante karmabandhanaiḥ  BrP sarvabhūtadayāvanto viśvāsyāḥ sarvajantuṣu tyaktahiṃsrasamācārās te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ  BrP parasvanirmamā nityaṃ paradāravivarjikāḥ dharmalabdhārthabhoktāras te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ  BrP mātṛvat svasṛvac caiva nityaṃ duhitṛvac ca ye paradāreṣu vartante te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ  BrP svadāraniratā ye ca ṛtukālābhigāminaḥ agrāmyasukhabhogāś ca te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ  BrP stainyān nivṛttāḥ satataṃ saṃtuṣṭāḥ svadhanena ca svabhāgyāny upajīvanti te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ  BrP paradāreṣu ye nityaṃ cāritrāvṛtalocanāḥ jitendriyāḥ śīlaparās te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ  BrP eṣa daivakṛto mārgaḥ sevitavyaḥ sadā naraiḥ akaṣāyakṛtaś caiva mārgaḥ sevyaḥ sadā budhaiḥ  BrP avṛthāpakṛtaś caiva mārgaḥ sevyaḥ sadā budhaiḥ dānakarmatapoyuktaḥ śīlaśaucadayātmakaḥ svargamārgam abhīpsadbhir na sevyas tv ata uttaraḥ  BrP umovāca vācā tu badhyate yena mucyate hy athavā punaḥ tāni karmāṇi me deva vada bhūtapate nagha  BrP śiva uvāca ātmahetoḥ parārthe vā adharmāśritam eva ca ye mṛṣā na vadantīha te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ  BrP vṛttyarthaṃ dharmahetor vā kāmakārāt tathaiva ca anṛtaṃ ye na bhāṣante te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ  BrP ślakṣṇāṃ vāṇīṃ svacchavarṇāṃ madhurāṃ pāpavarjitām svagatenābhibhāṣante te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ  BrP paruṣaṃ ye na bhāṣante kaṭukaṃ niṣṭhuraṃ tathā na paiśunyaratāḥ santas te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ  BrP piśunaṃ na prabhāṣante mitrabhedakaraṃ tathā parapīḍākaraṃ caiva te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ  BrP ye varjayanti paruṣaṃ paradrohaṃ ca mānavāḥ sarvabhūtasamā dāntās te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ  BrP śaṭhapralāpād viratā viruddhaparivarjakāḥ saumyapralāpino nityaṃ te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ  BrP na kopād vyāharante ye vācaṃ hṛdayadāriṇīm śāntiṃ vindanti ye kruddhās te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ  BrP eṣa vāṇīkṛto devi dharmaḥ sevyaḥ sadā naraiḥ śubhasatyaguṇair nityaṃ varjanīyā mṛṣā budhaiḥ  BrP umovāca manasā badhyate yena karmaṇā puruṣaḥ sadā tan me brūhi mahābhāga devadeva pinākadhṛk  BrP maheśvara uvāca mānaseneha dharmeṇa saṃyuktāḥ puruṣāḥ sadā svargaṃ gacchanti kalyāṇi tan me kīrtayataḥ śṛṇu  BrP duṣpraṇītena manasā duṣpraṇītāntarākṛtiḥ naro badhyeta yeneha śṛṇu vā taṃ śubhānane  BrP araṇye vijane nyastaṃ parasvaṃ dṛśyate yadā manasāpi na gṛhṇanti te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ  BrP tathaiva paradārān ye kāmavṛttā rahogatāḥ manasāpi na hiṃsanti te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ  BrP śatruṃ mitraṃ ca ye nityaṃ tulyena manasā narāḥ bhajanti maitryaṃ saṃgamya te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ  BrP śrutavanto dayāvantaḥ śucayaḥ satyasaṃgarāḥ svair arthaiḥ parisaṃtuṣṭās te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ  BrP avairā ye tv anāyāsā maitracittaratāḥ sadā sarvabhūtadayāvantas te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ  BrP jñātavantaḥ kriyāvantaḥ kṣamāvantaḥ suhṛtpriyāḥ dharmādharmavido nityaṃ te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ  BrP śubhānām aśubhānāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ phalasaṃcaye nirākāṅkṣāś ca ye devi te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ  BrP pāpopetān varjayanti devadvijaparāḥ sadā samutthānam anuprāptās te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ  BrP śubhaiḥ karmaphalair devi mayaite parikīrtitāḥ svargamārgaparā bhūyaḥ kiṃ tvaṃ śrotum ihecchasi  BrP umovāca mahān me saṃśayaḥ kaścin martyān prati maheśvara tasmāt tvaṃ nipuṇenādya mama vyākhyātum arhasi  BrP kenāyur labhate dīrghaṃ karmaṇā puruṣaḥ prabho tapasā vāpi deveśa kenāyur labhate mahat  BrP kṣīṇāyuḥ kena bhavati karmaṇā bhuvi mānavaḥ vipākaṃ karmaṇāṃ deva vaktum arhasy anindita  BrP apare ca mahābhāgyā mandabhāgyās tathā pare akulīnāḥ kulīnāś ca saṃbhavanti tathā pare  BrP durdarśāḥ kecid ābhānti narāḥ kāṣṭhamayā iva priyadarśās tathā cānye darśanād eva mānavāḥ  BrP duṣprajñāḥ kecid ābhānti kecid ābhānti paṇḍitāḥ mahāprajñās tathā cānye jñānavijñānabhāvinaḥ  BrP alpavācās tathā kecin mahāvācās naraḥ sadā nityam udyataśastraś ca hanti bhūtagaṇān naraḥ  BrP nirdayaḥ sarvabhūtebhyo nityam udvegakārakaḥ api kīṭapataṃgānām aśaraṇyaḥ sunirghṛṇaḥ  BrP evaṃbhūto naro devi nirayaṃ pratipadyate viparītas tu dharmātmā svarūpeṇābhijāyate  BrP nirayaṃ yāti hiṃsātmā yāti svargam ahiṃsakaḥ yātanāṃ niraye raudrāṃ sakṛcchrāṃ labhate naraḥ  BrP yaḥ kaścin nirayāt tasmāt samuttarati karhicit mānuṣyaṃ labhate vāpi hīnāyus tatra jāyate  BrP pāpena karmaṇā devi yukto hiṃsādibhir yataḥ ahitaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ hīnāyur upajāyate  BrP śubhena karmaṇā devi prāṇighātavivarjitaḥ śubhena karmaṇā devi prāṇighātavivarjitaḥ nikṣiptaśastro nirdaṇḍo na hiṃsati kadācana  BrP na ghātayati no hanti ghnantaṃ naivānumodate sarvabhūteṣu sasneho yathātmani tathā pare  BrP īdṛśaḥ puruṣo nityaṃ devi devatvam aśnute upapannān sukhān bhogān sadāśnāti mudā yutaḥ  BrP atha cen mānuṣe loke kadācid upapadyate eṣa dīrghāyuṣāṃ mārgaḥ suvṛttānāṃ sukarmaṇām prāṇihiṃsāvimokṣeṇa brahmaṇā samudīritaḥ  BrP umovāca kiṃśīlaḥ kiṃsamācāraḥ puruṣaḥ kaiś ca karmabhiḥ svargaṃ samabhipadyeta saṃpradānena kena vā  BrP maheśvara uvāca dātā brāhmaṇasatkartā dīnārtakṛpaṇādiṣu bhakṣabhojyānnapānānāṃ vāsasāṃ ca mahāmatiḥ  BrP pratiśrayān sabhāḥ kuryāt prapāḥ puṣkariṇīs tathā nityakādīni karmāṇi karoti prayataḥ śuciḥ  BrP āsanaṃ śayanaṃ yānaṃ gṛhaṃ ratnaṃ dhanaṃ tathā sasyajātāni sarvāṇi sakṣetrāṇy atha yoṣitaḥ  BrP supraśāntamanā nityaṃ yaḥ prayacchati mānavaḥ evaṃbhūto naro devi devaloke bhijāyate  BrP tatroṣya suciraṃ kālaṃ bhuktvā bhogān anuttamān sahāpsarobhir mudito ramitvā nandanādiṣu  BrP tasmāc cyuto api yācyamānā nivartante jihvālobhasamanvitāḥ  BrP na dhanāni na vāsāṃsi na bhogān na ca kāñcanam na gāś ca nānnavikṛtiṃ prayacchanti kadācana  BrP apralubdhāś ca ye lubdhā nāstikā dānavarjitaḥ evaṃbhūtā narā devi nirayaṃ yānty abuddhayaḥ  BrP te vai manuṣyatāṃ yānti yadā kālasya paryayāt dhanarikte kule janma labhante svalpabuddhayaḥ  BrP kṣutpipāsāparītāś ca sarvalokabahiṣkṛtāḥ nirāśāḥ sarvabhogebhyo jīvanty adharmajīvikāḥ  BrP alpabhogakule jātā alpabhogaratā narāḥ anena karmaṇā devi bhavanty adhanino narāḥ  BrP apare dambhino nityaṃ māninaḥ parato ratāḥ āsanārhasya ye pīṭhaṃ na yacchanty alpacetasaḥ  BrP mārgārhasya ca ye mārgaṃ na prayacchanty abuddhayaḥ arghārhān na ca saṃskārair arcayanti yathāvidhi  BrP pādyam ācamanīyaṃ vā prayacchanty abhibuddhayaḥ śubhaṃ cābhimataṃ premṇā guruṃ nābhivadanti ye  BrP abhimānapravṛddhena lobhena samam āsthitāḥ saṃmānyāṃś cāvamanyante vṛddhān paribhavanti ca  BrP evaṃvidhā narā devi sarve nirayagāminaḥ te ced yadi narās tasmān nirayād uttaranti ca  BrP varṣapūgais tato janma labhante kutsite kule śvapākapulkasādīnāṃ kutsitānām acetasām  BrP kuleṣu te bhijāyante guruvṛddhopatāpinaḥ na dambhī na ca mānī yo devatātithipūjakaḥ  BrP lokapūjyo namaskartā prasūto madhuraṃ vacaḥ sarvakarmapriyakaraḥ sarvabhūtapriyaḥ sadā  BrP adveṣī sumukhaḥ ślakṣṇaḥ snigdhavāṇīpradaḥ sadā svāgatenaiva sarveṣāṃ bhūtānām avihiṃsakaḥ  BrP yathārthaṃ satkriyāpūrvam arcayann avatiṣṭhate mārgārhāya dadan mārgaṃ gurum abhyarcayan sadā  BrP atithipragraharatas tathābhyāgatapūjakaḥ evaṃbhūto naro devi svargatiṃ pratipadyate  BrP tato kuśalākuśalaṃ sadā  BrP varjayanto śubhaṃ karma sevamānāḥ śubhaṃ tathā labhante svargatiṃ nityam iha loke yathāsukham  BrP sa cen manuṣyatāṃ yāti medhāvī tatra jāyate śrutaṃ yajñānugaṃ yasya kalyāṇam  BrP ye tu mūḍhā durācārā viyonau maithune ratāḥ puruṣeṣu suduṣprajñāḥ klībatvam upayānti te  BrP paśūṃś ca ye vai badhnanti ye caiva gurutalpagāḥ prakīrṇamaithunā ye ca klībā jāyanti vai narāḥ  BrP umovāca avadyaṃ kiṃ tu vai karma niravadyaṃ tathaiva ca śreyaḥ kurvann avāpnoti mānavo devasattama  BrP maheśvara uvāca śreyāṃsaṃ mārgam anvicchan sadā yaḥ pṛcchati dvijān dharmānveṣī guṇākāṅkṣī sa rākṣasopamāḥ  BrP yajvānaś ca tathaivānye nirmohāś ca tathā pare kena karmavipākena bhavantīha vadasva me  BrP maheśvara uvāca āgamālokadharmāṇāṃ maryādāḥ pūrvanirmitāḥ pramāṇenānuvartante dṛśyante ha dṛḍhavratāḥ  BrP adharmaṃ dharmam ity āhur ye ca mohavaśaṃ gatāḥ avratā naṣṭamaryādās te narā brahmarākṣasāḥ  BrP ye vai kālakṛtodyogāt saṃbhavantīha mānavāḥ nirhomā nirvaṣaṭkārās te bhavanti narādhamāḥ  BrP eṣa devi mayā sarva saṃśayacchedanāya te kuśalākuśalo nṝṇāṃ vyākhyāto dharmasāgaraḥ  BrP vyāsa uvāca śrutvaivaṃ sā jaganmātā bhartur vacanam āditaḥ hṛṣṭā babhūva suprītā vismitā ca tadā dvijāḥ  BrP ye tatrāsan munivarās tripurāreḥ samīpataḥ tīrthayātrāprasaṅgena gatās tasmin girau dvijāḥ  BrP te pi saṃpūjya taṃ devaṃ śūlapāṇiṃ praṇamya ca papracchuḥ saṃśayaṃ caiva lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā  BrP munaya ūcuḥ trilocana namas te stu dakṣakratuvināśana pṛcchāmas tvāṃ jagannātha saṃśayaṃ hṛdi saṃsthitam  BrP saṃsāre smin mahāghore bhairave lomaharṣaṇe bhramanti suciraṃ kālaṃ puruṣāś cālpamedhasaḥ  BrP yenopāyena mucyante janmasaṃsārabandhanāt brūhi tac chrotum icchāmaḥ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi naḥ  BrP maheśvara uvāca karmapāśanibaddhānāṃ narāṇāṃ duḥkhabhāginām nānyopāyaṃ prapaśyāmi vāsudevāt paraṃ dvijāḥ  BrP ye pūjayanti taṃ devaṃ śaṅkhacakragadādharam vāṅmanaḥkarmabhiḥ samyak te yānti paramāṃ gatim  BrP kiṃ teṣāṃ jīviteneha paśuvac ceṣṭitena ca yeṣāṃ na pravaṇaṃ cittaṃ vāsudeve jaganmaye  BrP ṛṣaya ūcuḥ pinākin bhaganetraghna sarvalokanamaskṛta māhātmyaṃ vāsudevasya śrotum icchāma śaṃkara  BrP maheśvara uvāca pitāmahād api varaḥ śāśvataḥ puruṣo hariḥ kṛṣṇo jāmbūnadābhāso vyabhre sūrya ivoditaḥ  BrP daśabāhur mahātejā devatāriniṣūdanaḥ śrīvatsāṅko hṛṣīkeśaḥ sarvadaivatayūthapaḥ  BrP brahmā tasyodarabhavas tasyāhaṃ ca śirobhavaḥ śiroruhebhyo jyotīṃṣi romabhyaś ca surāsurāḥ  BrP ṛṣayo dehasaṃbhūtās tasya lokāś ca śāśvatāḥ pitāmahagṛhaṃ sākṣāt sarvadevagṛhaṃ ca saḥ  BrP so syāḥ pṛthivyāḥ kṛtsnāyāḥ sraṣṭā tribhuvaneśvaraḥ saṃhartā caiva bhūtānāṃ sthāvarasya carasya ca  BrP sa hi devadevaḥ sākṣād devanāthaḥ paraṃtapaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvasaṃsraṣṭā sarvagaḥ sarvatomukhaḥ  BrP na tasmāt paramaṃ bhūtaṃ triṣu lokeṣu kiṃcana sanātano mahābhāgo govinda iti viśrutaḥ  BrP sa sarvān pārthivān saṃkhye ghātayiṣyati mānadaḥ surakāryārtham utpanno mānuṣyaṃ vapur āsthitaḥ  BrP nahi devagaṇāḥ śaktās trivikramavinākṛtāḥ bhuvane devakāryāṇi kartuṃ nāyakavarjitaḥ  BrP nāyakaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ sarvabhūtanamaskṛtaḥ etasya devanāthasya kāryasya ca parasya ca  BrP brahmabhūtasya satataṃ brahmarṣiśaraṇasya ca brahmā vasati nābhisthaḥ śarīre haṃ ca saṃsthitaḥ  BrP sarvāḥ sukhaṃ saṃsthitāś ca śarīre tasya devatāḥ sa devaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ śrīgarbhaḥ śrīsahoṣitaḥ  BrP śārṅgacakrāyudhaḥ khaḍgī sarvanāgaripudhvajaḥ uttamena suśīlena śaucena ca damena ca  BrP parākrameṇa vīryeṇa vapuṣā darśanena ca ārohaṇapramāṇena vīryeṇārjavasaṃpadā  BrP ānṛśaṃsyena rūpeṇa balena ca samanvitaḥ astraiḥ samuditaḥ sarvair divyair adbhutadarśanaiḥ  BrP yogamāyāsahasrākṣo virūpākṣo mahāmanāḥ vācā mitrajanaślāghī jñātibandhujanapriyaḥ  BrP kṣamāvāṃś cānahaṃvādī sa devo brahmadāyakaḥ bhayahartā bhayārtānāṃ mitrānandavivardhanaḥ  BrP śaraṇyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ dīnānāṃ pālane rataḥ śrutavān atha saṃpannaḥ sarvabhūtanamaskṛtaḥ  BrP samāśritānām upakṛc chatrūṇāṃ bhayakṛt tathā nītijño nītisaṃpanno brahmavādī jitendriyaḥ  BrP bhavārtham eva devānāṃ buddhyā paramayā yutaḥ prājāpatye śubhe mārge mānave dharmasaṃskṛte  BrP samutpatsyati govindo manor vaṃśe mahātmanaḥ aṃśo nāma manoḥ putro hy antardhāmā tataḥ param  BrP antardhāmno havirdhāmā prajāpatir aninditaḥ prācīnabarhir bhavitā havirdhāmnaḥ suto dvijāḥ  BrP tasya pracetaḥpramukhā bhaviṣyanti daśātmajāḥ prācetasas tathā dakṣo bhaviteha prajāpatiḥ  BrP dākṣāyaṇyas tathādityo manur ādityatas tataḥ manoś ca vaṃśaja ilā sudyumnaś ca bhaviṣyati  BrP budhāt purūravāś cāpi tasmād āyur bhaviṣyati nahuṣo bhavitā tasmād yayātis tasya cātmajaḥ  BrP yadus tasmān mahāsattvaḥ kroṣṭā tasmād bhaviṣyati kroṣṭuś caiva mahān putro vṛjinīvān bhaviṣyati  BrP vṛjinīvataś ca bhavitā uṣaṅgur aparājitaḥ uṣaṅgor bhavitā putraḥ śūraś citrarathas tathā  BrP tasya tv avarajaḥ putraḥ śūro nāma bhaviṣyati teṣāṃ vikhyātavīryāṇāṃ cāritraguṇaśālinām  BrP yajvināṃ ca viśuddhānāṃ vaṃśe brāhmaṇasattamāḥ sa śūraḥ kṣatriyaśreṣṭho mahāvīryo mahāyaśāḥ  BrP svavaṃśavistārakaraṃ janayiṣyati mānadam vasudevam iti khyātaṃ putram ānakadundubhim  BrP tasya putraś caturbāhur vāsudevo bhaviṣyati dātā brāhmaṇasatkartā brahmabhūto dvijapriyaḥ  BrP rājño baddhān sa sarvān vai mokṣayiṣyati yādavaḥ jarāsaṃdhaṃ tu rājānaṃ nirjitya girigahvare  BrP sarvapārthivaratnāḍhyo bhaviṣyati sa vīryavān pṛthivyām apratihato vīryeṇāpi bhaviṣyati  BrP vikrameṇa ca saṃpannaḥ sarvapārthivapārthivaḥ śūraḥ saṃhanano bhūto dvārakāyāṃ vasan prabhuḥ  BrP pālayiṣyati gāṃ devīṃ vinirjitya durāśayān taṃ bhavantaḥ samāsādya brāhmaṇair arhaṇair varaiḥ  BrP arcayantu yathānyāyaṃ brahmāṇam iva śāśvatam yo hi māṃ draṣṭum iccheta brahmāṇaṃ ca pitāmaham  BrP draṣṭavyas tena bhagavān vāsudevaḥ pratāpavān dṛṣṭe tasminn ahaṃ dṛṣṭo na me trāsti vicāraṇā  BrP pitāmaho vāsudeva iti vitta tapodhanāḥ sa yasya puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ prītiyukto bhaviṣyati  BrP tasya devagaṇaḥ prīto brahmapūrvo bhaviṣyati yas tu taṃ mānavo loke saṃśrayiṣyati keśavam  BrP tasya kīrtir yaśaś caiva svargaś caiva bhaviṣyati dharmāṇāṃ deśikaḥ sākṣād bhaviṣyati sa dharmavān  BrP dharmavidbhiḥ sa deveśo namaskāryaḥ sadācyutaḥ dharma eva sadā hi syād asminn abhyarcite vibhau  BrP sa hi devo mahātejāḥ prajāhitacikīrṣayā dharmārthaṃ puruṣavyāghra ṛṣikoṭīḥ sasarja ca  BrP tāḥ sṛṣṭās tena vidhinā parvate gandhamādane sanatkumārapramukhās tiṣṭhanti tapasānvitāḥ  BrP tasmāt sa vāgmī dharmajño namasyo dvijapuṃgavāḥ vandito hi sa vandeta mānito mānayīta ca  BrP dṛṣṭaḥ paśyed aharahaḥ saṃśritaḥ pratisaṃśrayet arcitaś cārcayen nityaṃ sa devo dvijasattamāḥ  BrP evaṃ tasyānavadyasya viṣṇor vai paramaṃ tapaḥ ādidevasya mahataḥ sajjanācaritaṃ sadā  BrP bhuvane bhyarcito nityaṃ devair api sanātanaḥ abhayenānurūpeṇa prapadya tam anuvratāḥ  BrP karmaṇā manasā vācā sa namasyo dvijaiḥ sadā yatnavadbhir upasthāya draṣṭavyo devakīsutaḥ  BrP eṣa vai vihito mārgo mayā vai munisattamāḥ taṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvadeveśaṃ dṛṣṭāḥ syuḥ surasattamāḥ  BrP mahāvarāhaṃ taṃ devaṃ sarvalokapitāmaham ahaṃ caiva namasyāmi nityam eva jagatpatim  BrP tatra ca tritayaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ samastā hi vayaṃ devās tasya dehe vasāmahe  BrP tasyaiva cāgrajo bhrātā sitādrinicayaprabhaḥ halī bala iti khyāto bhaviṣyati dharādharaḥ  BrP triśirās tasya devasya dṛṣṭo nanta iti prabhoḥ suparṇo yasya vīryeṇa kaśyapasyātmajo balī  BrP antaṃ naivāśakad draṣṭuṃ devasya paramātmanaḥ sa ca śeṣo vicarate parayā vai mudā yutaḥ  BrP antarvasati bhogena parirabhya vasuṃdharām ya eṣa viṣṇuḥ so nanto bhagavān vasudhādharaḥ  BrP yo rāmaḥ sa hṛṣīkeśo cyutaḥ sarvadharādharaḥ tāv ubhau puruṣavyāghrau divyau divyaparākramau  BrP draṣṭavyau mānanīyau ca cakralāṅgaladhāriṇau eṣa vo nugrahaḥ prokto mayā puṇyas tapodhanāḥ tad bhavanto yaduśreṣṭhaṃ pūjayeyuḥ prayatnataḥ  BrP munaya ūcuḥ aho kṛṣṇasya māhātmyaṃ śrutam asmābhir adbhutam sarvapāpaharaṃ puṇyaṃ dhanyaṃ saṃsāranāśanam  BrP saṃpūjya vidhivad bhaktyā vāsudevaṃ mahāmune kāṃ gatiṃ yānti manujā vāsudevārcane ratāḥ  BrP kiṃ prāpnuvanti te mokṣaṃ kiṃ vā svargaṃ mahāmune athavā kiṃ muniśreṣṭha prāpnuvanty ubhayaṃ phalam  BrP chettum arhasi sarvajña saṃśayaṃ no hṛdi sthitam chettā nānyo sti loke smiṃs tvadṛte munisattama  BrP vyāsa uvāca sādhu sādhu muniśreṣṭhā bhavadbhir yad udāhṛtam śṛṇudhvam ānupūrvyeṇa vaiṣṇavānāṃ sukhāvaham  BrP dīkṣāmātreṇa kṛṣṇasya narā mokṣaṃ vrajanti vai kiṃ punar ye sadā bhaktyā pūjayanty acyutaṃ dvijāḥ  BrP na teṣāṃ durlabhaḥ svargo mokṣaś ca munisattamāḥ labhante vaiṣṇavāḥ kāmān yān yān vāñchanti durlabhān  BrP ratnaparvatam āruhya naro ratnaṃ yathādadet svecchayā muniśārdūlās tathā kṛṣṇān manorathān  BrP kalpavṛkṣaṃ samāsādya phalāni svecchayā yathā gṛhṇāti puruṣo viprās tathā kṛṣṇān manorathān  BrP śraddhayā vidhivat pūjya vāsudevaṃ jagadgurum dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ prāpnuvanti narāḥ phalam  BrP ārādhya taṃ jagannāthaṃ viśuddhenāntarātmanā prāpnuvanti narāḥ kāmān surāṇām api durlabhān  BrP ye rcayanti sadā bhaktyā vāsudevākhyam avyayam na teṣāṃ durlabhaṃ kiṃcid vidyate bhuvanatraye  BrP dhanyās te puruṣā loke ye rcayanti sadā harim sarvapāpaharaṃ devaṃ sarvakāmaphalapradam  BrP brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ striyaḥ śūdrāntyajātayaḥ saṃpūjya taṃ suravaraṃ prāpnuvanti parāṃ gatim  BrP tasmāc chṛṇudhvaṃ munayo yat pṛcchata mamānaghāḥ pravakṣyāmi samāsena gatiṃ teṣāṃ mahātmanām  BrP tyaktvā mānuṣyakaṃ dehaṃ rogāyatanam adhruvam jarāmaraṇasaṃyuktaṃ jalabudbudasaṃnibham  BrP māṃsaśoṇitadurgandhaṃ viṣṭhāmūtrādibhir yutam asthisthūṇam amedhyaṃ ca snāyucarmaśirānvitam  BrP kāmagena vimānena divyagandharvanādinā taruṇādityavarṇena kiṅkiṇījālamālinā  BrP upagīyamānā gandharvair apsarobhir alaṃkṛtāḥ vrajanti lokapālānāṃ bhavanaṃ tu pṛthak pṛthak  BrP manvantarapramāṇaṃ tu bhuktvā kālaṃ pṛthak pṛthak bhuvanāni pṛthak teṣāṃ sarvabhogair alaṃkṛtāḥ  BrP tato ntarikṣaṃ lokaṃ te yānti sarvasukhapradam tatra bhuktvā varān bhogān daśamanvantaraṃ dvijāḥ  BrP tasmād gandharvalokaṃ tu yānti vai vaiṣṇavā dvijāḥ viṃśanmanvantaraṃ kālaṃ tatra bhuktvā manoramān  BrP bhogān ādityalokaṃ tu tasmād yānti supūjitāḥ triṃśanmanvantaraṃ tatra bhogān bhuktvātidaivatān  BrP tasmād vrajanti te viprāś candralokaṃ sukhapradam manvantarāṇāṃ te tatra catvāriṃśad guṇānvitam  BrP kālaṃ bhuktvā śubhān bhogāñ jarāmaraṇavarjitāḥ tasmān nakṣatralokaṃ tu vimānaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam  BrP vrajanti te muniśreṣṭhā guṇaiḥ sarvair alaṃkṛtāḥ manvantarāṇāṃ pañcāśad bhuktvā bhogān yathepsitān  BrP tasmād vrajanti te viprā devalokaṃ sudurlabham ṣaṣṭimanvantaraṃ yāvat tatra bhuktvā sudurlabhān  BrP bhogān nānāvidhān viprā ṛgdvyaṣṭakasamanvitān śakralokaṃ punas tasmād gacchanti surapūjitāḥ  BrP manvantarāṇāṃ tatraiva bhuktvā kālaṃ ca saptatim bhogān uccāvacān divyān manasaḥ prītivardhanān  BrP tasmād vrajanti te lokaṃ prājāpatyam anuttamam bhuktvā tatrepsitān bhogān sarvakāmaguṇānvitān  BrP manvantaram aśītiṃ ca kālaṃ sarvasukhapradam tasmāt paitāmahaṃ lokaṃ yānti te vaiṣṇavā dvijāḥ  BrP manvantarāṇāṃ navati krīḍitvā tatra vai sukham ihāgatya punas tasmād viprāṇāṃ pravare kule  BrP jāyante yogino viprā vedaśāstrārthapāragāḥ evaṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu bhuktvā bhogān yathepsitān  BrP ihāgatya punar yānti upary upari ca kramāt saṃbhave saṃbhave te tu śatavarṣaṃ dvijottamāḥ  BrP bhuktvā yathepsitān bhogān yānti lokāntaraṃ tataḥ daśajanma yadā teṣāṃ krameṇaivaṃ prapūryate  BrP tadā lokaṃ harer divyaṃ brahmalokād vrajanti te gatvā tatrākṣayān bhogān bhuktvā sarvaguṇānvitān  BrP manvantaraśataṃ yāvaj janmamṛtyuvivarjitāḥ gacchanti bhuvanaṃ paścād vārāhasya dvijottamāḥ  BrP divyadehāḥ kuṇḍalino mahākāyā mahābalāḥ krīḍanti tatra viprendrāḥ kṛtvā rūpaṃ caturbhujam  BrP daśa koṭisahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ dvijasattamāḥ tiṣṭhanti śāśvate bhāve sarvair devair namaskṛtāḥ  BrP tato yānti tu te dhīrā narasiṃhagṛhaṃ dvijāḥ krīḍante tatra muditā varṣakoṭyayutāni ca  BrP tadante vaiṣṇavaṃ yānti puraṃ siddhaniṣevitam krīḍante tatra saukhyena varṣāṇām ayutāni ca  BrP brahmaloke punar viprā gacchanti sādhakottamāḥ tatra sthitvā ciraṃ kālaṃ varṣakoṭiśatān bahūn  BrP nārāyaṇapuraṃ yānti tatas te sādhakeśvarāḥ bhuktvā bhogāṃś ca vividhān varṣakoṭyarbudāni ca  BrP aniruddhapuraṃ paścād divyarūpā mahābalāḥ gacchanti sādhakavarāḥ stūyamānāḥ surāsuraiḥ  BrP tatra koṭisahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ ca caturdaśa tiṣṭhanti vaiṣṇavās tatra jarāmaraṇavarjitāḥ  BrP pradyumnasya puraṃ paścād gacchanti vigatajvarāḥ tatra tiṣṭhanti te viprā lakṣakoṭiśatatrayam  BrP svacchandagāmino hṛṣṭā balaśaktisamanvitāḥ gacchanti yoginaḥ paścād yatra saṃkarṣaṇaḥ prabhuḥ  BrP tatroṣitvā ciraṃ kālaṃ bhuktvā bhogān sahasraśaḥ viśanti vāsudevaiti virūpākhye nirañjane  BrP vinirmuktāḥ pare tattve jarāmaraṇavarjite tatra gatvā vimuktās te bhaveyur nātra saṃśayaḥ  BrP evaṃ krameṇa bhuktiṃ te prāpnuvanti manīṣiṇaḥ muktiṃ ca muniśārdūlā vāsudevārcane ratāḥ  BrP vyāsa uvāca ekādaśyām ubhe pakṣe nirāhāraḥ samāhitaḥ snātvā samyag vidhānena dhautavāsā jitendriyaḥ  BrP saṃpūjya vidhivad viṣṇuṃ śraddhayā susamāhitaḥ puṣpair gandhais tathā dīpair dhūpair naivedyakais tathā  BrP upahārair bahuvidhair japyair homapradakṣiṇaiḥ stotrair nānāvidhair divyair gītavādyair manoharaiḥ  BrP daṇḍavatpraṇipātaiś ca jayaśabdais tathottamaiḥ evaṃ saṃpūjya vidhivad rātrau kṛtvā prajāgaram  BrP kathāṃ vā gītikāṃ viṣṇor gāyan viṣṇuparāyaṇaḥ yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ sthānaṃ naro nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ  BrP munaya ūcuḥ prajāgare gītikāyāḥ phalaṃ viṣṇor mahāmune brūhi tac chrotum icchāmaḥ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi naḥ  BrP vyāsa uvāca śṛṇudhvaṃ muniśārdūlāḥ pravakṣyāmy anupūrvaśaḥ gītikāyāḥ phalaṃ viṣṇor jāgare yad udāhṛtam  BrP avantī nāma nagarī babhūva bhuvi viśrutā tatrāste bhagavān viṣṇuḥ śaṅkhacakragadādharaḥ  BrP tasyā nagaryāḥ paryante cāṇḍālo gītikovidaḥ sadvṛttyotpāditadhano bhṛtyānāṃ bharaṇe rataḥ  BrP viṣṇubhaktaḥ sa cāṇḍālo māsi māsi dṛḍhavrataḥ ekādaśyāṃ samāgamya sopavāso tha gāyati  BrP gītikā viṣṇunāmāṅkāḥ prādurbhāvasamāśritāḥ gāndhāraṣaḍjanaiṣāda svarapañcamadhaivataiḥ  BrP rātrijāgaraṇe viṣṇuṃ gāthābhir upagāyati prabhāte ca praṇamyeśaṃ dvādaśyāṃ gṛham etya ca  BrP jāmātṛbhāgineyāṃś ca bhojayitvā sakanyakāḥ tataḥ saparivāras tu paścād bhuṅkte dvijottamāḥ  BrP evaṃ tasyāsatas tatra kurvato viṣṇuprīṇanam gītikābhir vicitrābhir vayaḥ pratigataṃ bahu  BrP ekadā caitramāse tu kṛṣṇaikādaśigocare viṣṇuśuśrūṣaṇārthāya yayau vanam anuttamam  BrP vanajātāni puṣpāṇi grahītuṃ bhaktitatparaḥ kṣiprātaṭe mahāraṇye vibhītakataror adhaḥ  BrP dṛṣṭaḥ sa rākṣasenātha gṛhītaś cāpi bhakṣitum cāṇḍālas tam athovāca nādya bhakṣyas tvayā hy aham  BrP prātar bhokṣyasi kalyāṇa satyam eṣyāmy ahaṃ punaḥ adya kāryaṃ mama mahat tasmān muñcasva rākṣasa  BrP śvaḥ satyena sameṣyāmi tataḥ
