ṣaḍrātrabhojanaś caiva tathā cāṣṭāhabhojanaḥ  BrP māsopavāsī mūlāśī phalāhāras tathaiva ca vāyubhakṣaś ca piṇyāka dadhigomayabhojanaḥ  BrP gomūtrabhojanaś caiva kāśapuṣpāśanas tathā śaivālabhojanaś caiva tathā cānyena vartayan  BrP vartayañ śīrṇaparṇaiś ca prakīrṇaphalabhojanaḥ vividhāni ca kṛcchrāṇi sevate siddhikāṅkṣayā  BrP cāndrāyaṇāni vidhival liṅgāni vividhāni ca cāturāśramyayuktāni dharmādharmāśrayāṇy api  BrP upāśrayān apy aparān pākhaṇḍān vividhān api viviktāś ca śilāchāyās tathā prasravaṇāni ca  BrP pulināni viviktāni vividhāni vanāni ca kānaneṣu viviktāś ca śailānāṃ mahatīr guhāḥ  BrP niyamān vividhāṃś cāpi vividhāni tapāṃsi ca yajñāṃś ca vividhākārān vidyāś ca vividhās tathā  BrP vaṇikpathaṃ dvijakṣatra vaiśyaśūdrāṃs tathaiva ca dānaṃ ca vividhākāraṃ dīnāndhakṛpaṇādiṣu  BrP abhimanyeta saṃdhātuṃ tathaiva vividhān guṇān sattvaṃ rajas tamaś caiva dharmārthau kāma eva ca  BrP prakṛtyātmānam evātmā evaṃ pravibhajaty uta svāhākāravaṣaṭkārau svadhākāranamaskriye  BrP yajanādhyayane dānaṃ tathaivāhuḥ pratigraham yājanādhyāpane caiva tathānyad api kiṃcana  BrP janmamṛtyuvidhānena tathā viśasanena ca śubhāśubhabhayaṃ sarvam etad āhuḥ sanātanam  BrP prakṛtiḥ kurute devī bhayaṃ pralayam eva ca divasānte guṇān etān atītyaiko vatiṣṭhate  BrP raśmijālam ivādityas tatkālaṃ saṃniyacchati evam evaiṣa tat sarvaṃ krīḍārtham abhimanyate  BrP ātmarūpaguṇān etān vividhān hṛdayapriyān evam etāṃ prakurvāṇaḥ sargapralayadharmiṇīm  BrP kriyāṃ kriyāpathe raktas triguṇas triguṇādhipaḥ kriyākriyāpathopetas tathā tad iti manyate  BrP prakṛtyā sarvam evedaṃ jagad andhīkṛtaṃ vibho rajasā tamasā caiva vyāptaṃ sarvam anekadhā  BrP evaṃ dvaṃdvāny atītāni mama vartanti nityaśaḥ matta etāni jāyante pralaye yānti mām api  BrP nistartavyāṇy athaitāni sarvāṇīti narādhipa manyate pakṣabuddhitvāt tathaiva sukṛtāny api  BrP bhoktavyāni mamaitāni devalokagatena vai ihaiva cainaṃ bhokṣyāmi śubhāśubhaphalodayam  BrP sukham evaṃ tu kartavyaṃ sakṛt kṛtvā sukhaṃ mama yāvad eva tu me saukhyaṃ jātyāṃ jātyāṃ bhaviṣyati  BrP bhaviṣyati na me duḥkhaṃ kṛtenehāpy anantakam sukhaduḥkhaṃ hi mānuṣyaṃ niraye cāpi majjanam  BrP nirayāc cāpi mānuṣyaṃ kālenaiṣyāmy ahaṃ punaḥ manuṣyatvāc ca devatvaṃ devatvāt pauruṣaṃ punaḥ  BrP manuṣyatvāc ca nirayaṃ paryāyeṇopagacchati eṣa evaṃ dvijātīnām ātmā vai sa guṇair vṛtaḥ  BrP tena devamanuṣyeṣu nirayaṃ copapadyate mamatvenāvṛto nityaṃ tatraiva parivartate  BrP sargakoṭisahasrāṇi maraṇāntāsu mūrtiṣu ya evaṃ kurute karma śubhāśubhaphalātmakam  BrP sa evaṃ phalam āpnoti triṣu lokeṣu mūrtimān prakṛtiḥ kurute karma śubhāśubhaphalātmakam  BrP prakṛtiś ca tathāpnoti triṣu lokeṣu kāmagā tiryagyonimanuṣyatve devaloke tathaiva ca  BrP trīṇi sthānāni caitāni jānīyāt prākṛtāni ha aliṅgaprakṛtitvāc ca liṅgair apy anumīyate  BrP tathaiva pauruṣaṃ liṅgam anumānād dhi manyate sa liṅgāntaram āsādya prākṛtaṃ liṅgam avraṇam  BrP vraṇadvārāṇy adhiṣṭhāya karmāṇy ātmani manyate śrotrādīni tu sarvāṇi pañca karmendriyāṇy atha  BrP rāgādīni pravartante guṇeṣv iha guṇaiḥ saha aham etāni vai kurvan mamaitānīndriyāṇi ha  BrP nirindriyo hi manyeta vraṇavān asmi nirvraṇaḥ aliṅgo liṅgam ātmānam akālaṃ kālam ātmanaḥ  BrP asattvaṃ sattvam ātmānam amṛtaṃ mṛtam ātmanaḥ amṛtyuṃ mṛtyum ātmānam acaraṃ caram ātmanaḥ  BrP akṣetraṃ kṣetram ātmānam asaṅgaṃ saṅgam ātmanaḥ atattvaṃ tattvam ātmānam abhavaṃ bhavam ātmanaḥ  BrP akṣaraṃ kṣaram ātmānam abuddhatvād dhi manyate evam apratibuddhatvād abuddhajanasevanāt  BrP sargakoṭisahasrāṇi patanāntāni gacchati janmāntarasahasrāṇi maraṇāntāni gacchati  BrP tiryagyonimanuṣyatve devaloke tathaiva ca candramā iva kośānāṃ punas tatra sahasraśaḥ  BrP nīyate pratibuddhatvād evam eva kubuddhimān kalā pañcadaśī yonis tad dhāma iti paṭhyate  BrP nityam eva vijānīhi somaṃ vai ṣoḍaśāṃśakaiḥ kalayā jāyate jasraṃ punaḥ punar abuddhimān  BrP dhīmāṃś cāyaṃ na bhavati nṛpa evaṃ hi jāyate ṣoḍaśī tu kalā sūkṣmā sa soma upadhāryatām  BrP na tūpayujyate devair devān api yunakti saḥ mamatvaṃ kṣapayitvā tu jāyate nṛpasattama prakṛtes triguṇāyās tu sa eva triguṇo bhavet  BrP janaka uvāca akṣarakṣarayor eṣa dvayoḥ saṃbandha iṣyate strīpuṃsayor vā saṃbandhaḥ sa vai puruṣa ucyate  BrP ṛte tu puruṣaṃ neha strī garbhān dhārayaty uta ṛte striyaṃ na puruṣo rūpaṃ nirvartate tathā  BrP anyonyasyābhisaṃbandhād anyonyaguṇasaṃśrayāt rūpaṃ nirvartayed etad evaṃ sarvāsu yoniṣu  BrP ratyartham atisaṃyogād anyonyaguṇasaṃśrayāt ṛtau nirvartate rūpaṃ tad vakṣyāmi nidarśanam  BrP ye guṇāḥ puruṣasyeha ye ca mātur guṇās tathā asthi snāyu ca majjā ca jānīmaḥ pitṛto dvija  BrP tvaṅmāṃsaśoṇitaṃ ceti mātṛjāny anuśuśruma evam etad dvijaśreṣṭha vedaśāstreṣu paṭhyate  BrP pramāṇaṃ yac ca vedoktaṃ śāstroktaṃ yac ca paṭhyate vedaśāstrapramāṇaṃ ca pramāṇaṃ tat sanātanam  BrP evam evābhisaṃbandhau nityaṃ prakṛtipūruṣau yac cāpi bhagavaṃs tasmān mokṣadharmo na vidyate  BrP athavānantarakṛtaṃ kiṃcid eva nidarśanam tan mamācakṣva tattvena pratyakṣo hy asi sarvadā  BrP mokṣakāmā vayaṃ cāpi kāṅkṣāmo yad anāmayam ajeyam ajaraṃ nityam atīndriyam anīśvaram  BrP vasiṣṭha uvāca yad etad uktaṃ bhavatā vedaśāstranidarśanam evam etad yathā vakṣye tattvagrāhī yathā bhavān  BrP dhāryate hi tvayā grantha ubhayor vedaśāstrayoḥ na ca granthasya tattvajño yathātattvaṃ nareśvara  BrP yo hi vede ca śāstre ca granthadhāraṇatatparaḥ na ca granthārthatattvajñas tasya taddhāraṇaṃ vṛthā  BrP bhāraṃ sa vahate tasya granthasyārthaṃ na vetti yaḥ yas tu granthārthatattvajño nāsya granthāgamo vṛthā  BrP granthasyārthaṃ sa pṛṣṭas tu mādṛśo vaktum arhati yathātattvābhigamanād arthaṃ tasya sa vindati  BrP na yaḥ samutsukaḥ kaścid granthārthaṃ sthūlabuddhimān sa kathaṃ mandavijñāno granthaṃ vakṣyati nirṇayāt  BrP ajñātvā granthatattvāni vādaṃ yaḥ kurute naraḥ lobhād vāpy athavā dambhāt sa pāpī narakaṃ vrajet  BrP nirṇayaṃ cāpi cchidrātmā na tad vakṣyati tattvataḥ so pīhāsyārthatattvajño yasmān naivātmavān api  BrP tasmāt tvaṃ śṛṇu rājendra yathaitad anudṛśyate yathā tattvena sāṃkhyeṣu yogeṣu ca mahātmasu  BrP yad eva yogāḥ paśyanti sāṃkhyaṃ tad anugamyate ekaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca yaḥ paśyati sa buddhimān  BrP tvaṅ māṃsaṃ rudhiraṃ medaḥ pittaṃ majjāsthi snāyu ca etad aindriyakaṃ tāta yad bhavān ittham āttha mām  BrP dravyād dravyasya nirvṛttir indriyād indriyaṃ tathā dehād deham avāpnoti bījād bījaṃ tathaiva ca  BrP nirindriyasya bījasya nirdravyasyāpi dehinaḥ kathaṃ guṇā bhaviṣyanti nirguṇatvān mahātmanaḥ  BrP guṇā guṇeṣu jāyante tatraiva viramanti ca evaṃ guṇāḥ prakṛtijā jāyante na ca yānti ca  BrP tvaṅ māṃsaṃ rudhiraṃ medaḥ pittaṃ majjāsthi snāyu ca aṣṭau tāny atha śukreṇa jānīhi prākṛtena vai  BrP pumāṃś caivāpumāṃś caiva strīliṅgaṃ prākṛtaṃ smṛtam vāyur eṣa pumāṃś caiva rasa ity abhidhīyate  BrP aliṅgā prakṛtir liṅgair upalabhyati sātmajaiḥ yathā puṣpaphalair nityaṃ mūrtaṃ cāmūrtayas tathā  BrP evam apy anumānena sa liṅgam upalabhyate pañcaviṃśatikas tāta liṅgeṣu niyatātmakaḥ  BrP anādinidhano nantaḥ sarvadarśanakevalaḥ kevalaṃ tv abhimānitvād guṇeṣu guṇa ucyate  BrP guṇā guṇavataḥ santi nirguṇasya kuto guṇāḥ tasmād evaṃ vijānanti ye janā guṇadarśinaḥ  BrP yadā tv eṣa guṇān etān prākṛtān abhimanyate tadā sa guṇavān eva guṇabhedān prapaśyati  BrP yat tad buddheḥ paraṃ prāhuḥ sāṃkhyayogaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ budhyamānaṃ mahāprājñāḥ prabuddhaparivarjanāt  BrP aprabuddhaṃ yathā vyaktaṃ svaguṇaiḥ prāhur īśvaram nirguṇaṃ ceśvaraṃ nityam adhiṣṭhātāram eva ca  BrP prakṛteś ca guṇānāṃ ca pañcaviṃśatikaṃ budhāḥ sāṃkhyayoge ca kuśalā budhyante paramaiṣiṇaḥ  BrP yadā prabuddham avyaktam avasthātananīravaḥ budhyamānaṃ na budhyante vagacchanti samaṃ tadā  BrP etan nidarśanaṃ samyaṅ na samyag anudarśanam budhyamānaṃ prabudhyante dvābhyāṃ pṛthag ariṃdama  BrP paraspareṇaitad uktaṃ kṣarākṣaranidarśanam ekatvam akṣaraṃ prāhur nānātvaṃ kṣaram ucyate  BrP pañcaviṃśatiniṣṭho yaṃ tadā samyak pracakṣate ekatvadarśanaṃ cāsya nānātvaṃ cāsya darśanam  BrP tattvavit tattvayor eva pṛthag etan nidarśanam pañcaviṃśatibhis tattvaṃ tattvam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ  BrP nistattvaṃ pañcaviṃśasya param āhur manīṣiṇaḥ varjyasya varjyam ācāraṃ tattvaṃ tattvāt sanātanam  BrP karālajanaka uvāca nānātvaikatvam ity uktaṃ tvayaitad dvijasattama paśyatas tad dhi saṃdigdham etayor vai nidarśanam  BrP tathā buddhaprabuddhābhyāṃ budhyamānasya cānagha sthūlabuddhyā na paśyāmi tattvam etan na saṃśayaḥ  BrP akṣarakṣarayor uktaṃ tvayā yad api kāraṇam tad apy asthirabuddhitvāt pranaṣṭam iva me nagha  BrP tad etac chrotum icchāmi nānātvaikatvadarśanam dvaṃdvaṃ caivāniruddhaṃ ca budhyamānaṃ ca tattvataḥ  BrP vidyāvidye ca bhagavann akṣaraṃ kṣaram eva ca sāṃkhyayogaṃ ca kṛtsnena buddhābuddhiṃ pṛthak pṛthak  BrP vasiṣṭha uvāca hanta te saṃpravakṣyāmi yad etad anupṛcchasi yogakṛtyaṃ mahārāja pṛthag eva śṛṇuṣva me  BrP yogakṛtyaṃ tu yogānāṃ dhyānam eva paraṃ balam tac cāpi dvividhaṃ dhyānam āhur vidyāvido janāḥ  BrP ekāgratā ca manasaḥ prāṇāyāmas tathaiva ca prāṇāyāmas tu saguṇo nirguṇo mānasas tathā  BrP mūtrotsarge purīṣe ca bhojane ca narādhipa dvikālaṃ nopabhuñjīta śeṣaṃ bhuñjīta tatparaḥ  BrP indriyāṇīndriyārthebhyo nivartya manasā muniḥ daśadvādaśabhir vāpi caturviṃśāt paraṃ yataḥ  BrP sa codanābhir matimān nātmānaṃ codayed atha tiṣṭhantam ajaraṃ taṃ tu yat tad uktaṃ manīṣibhiḥ  BrP viśvātmā satataṃ jñeya ity evam anuśuśruma dravyaṃ hy ahīnamanaso nānyatheti viniścayaḥ  BrP vimuktaḥ sarvasaṅgebhyo laghvāhāro jitendriyaḥ pūrvarātre parārdhe ca dhārayīta mano hṛdi  BrP sthirīkṛtyendriyagrāmaṃ manasā mithileśvara mano buddhyā sthiraṃ kṛtvā pāṣāṇa iva niścalaḥ  BrP sthāṇuvac cāpy akampyaḥ syād dāruvac cāpi niścalaḥ buddhyā vidhividhānajñas tato yuktaṃ pracakṣate  BrP na śṛṇoti na cāghrāti na ca paśyati kiṃcana na ca sparśaṃ vijānāti na ca saṃkalpate manaḥ  BrP na cāpi manyate kiṃcin na ca budhyeta kāṣṭhavat tadā prakṛtim āpannaṃ yuktam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ  BrP na bhāti hi yathā dīpo dīptis tadvac ca dṛśyate niliṅgaś cādhaś cordhvaṃ ca tiryaggatim avāpnuyāt  BrP tadā tadupapannaś ca yasmin dṛṣṭe ca kathyate hṛdayastho ntarātmeti jñeyo jñas tāta madvidhaiḥ  BrP nirdhūma iva saptārcir āditya iva raśmivān vaidyuto gnir ivākāśe paśyaty ātmānam ātmani  BrP yaṃ paśyanti mahātmāno dhṛtimanto manīṣiṇaḥ brāhmaṇā brahmayonisthā hy ayonim amṛtātmakam  BrP tad evāhur aṇubhyo ṇu tan mahadbhyo mahattaram sarvatra sarvabhūteṣu dhruvaṃ tiṣṭhan na dṛśyate  BrP buddhidravyeṇa dṛśyena manodīpena lokakṛt mahatas tamasas tāta pāre tiṣṭhan na tāmasaḥ  BrP tamaso dūra ity uktas tattvajñair vedapāragaiḥ vimalo vimataś caiva nirliṅgo liṅgasaṃjñakaḥ  BrP yoga eṣa hi lokānāṃ kim anyad yogalakṣaṇam evaṃ paśyan prapaśyeta ātmānam ajaraṃ param  BrP yogadarśanam etāvad uktaṃ te tattvato mayā sāṃkhyajñānaṃ pravakṣyāmi parisaṃkhyānidarśanam  BrP avyaktam āhuḥ prakhyānaṃ parāṃ prakṛtim ātmanaḥ tasmān mahat samutpannaṃ dvitīyaṃ rājasattama  BrP ahaṃkāras tu mahatas tṛtīya iti naḥ śrutam pañcabhūtāny ahaṃkārād āhuḥ sāṃkhyātmadarśinaḥ  BrP etāḥ prakṛtayas tv aṣṭau vikārāś cāpi ṣoḍaśa pañca caiva viśeṣāś ca tathā pañcendriyāṇi ca  BrP etāvad eva tattvānāṃ sāṃkhyam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ sāṃkhye sāṃkhyavidhānajñā nityaṃ sāṃkhyapathe sthitāḥ  BrP yasmād yad abhijāyeta tat tatraiva pralīyate līyante pratilomāni gṛhyante cāntarātmanā  BrP ānulomyena jāyante līyante pratilomataḥ guṇā guṇeṣu satataṃ sāgarasyormayo yathā  BrP sargapralaya etāvān prakṛter nṛpasattama ekatvaṃ pralaye cāsya bahutvaṃ ca tathā sṛji  BrP evam eva ca rājendra vijñeyaṃ jñānakovidaiḥ adhiṣṭhātāram avyaktam asyāpy etan nidarśanam  BrP ekatvaṃ ca bahutvaṃ ca prakṛter anu tattvavān ekatvaṃ pralaye cāsya bahutvaṃ ca pravartanāt  BrP bahudhātmā prakurvīta prakṛtiṃ prasavātmikām tac ca kṣetraṃ mahān ātmā pañcaviṃśo dhitiṣṭhati  BrP adhiṣṭhāteti rājendra procyate yatisattamaiḥ adhiṣṭhānād adhiṣṭhātā kṣetrāṇām iti naḥ śrutam  BrP kṣetraṃ jānāti cāvyaktaṃ kṣetrajña iti cocyate avyaktike pure śete puruṣaś ceti kathyate  BrP anyad eva ca kṣetraṃ syād anyaḥ kṣetrajña ucyate kṣetram avyakta ity uktaṃ jñātāraṃ pañcaviṃśakam  BrP anyad eva ca jñānaṃ syād anyaj jñeyaṃ tad ucyate jñānam avyaktam ity uktaṃ jñeyo vai pañcaviṃśakaḥ  BrP avyaktaṃ kṣetram ity uktaṃ tathā sattvaṃ tatheśvaram anīśvaram atattvaṃ ca tattvaṃ tat pañcaviṃśakam  BrP sāṃkhyadarśanam etāvat parisaṃkhyā na vidyate saṃkhyā prakurute caiva prakṛtiṃ ca pravakṣyate  BrP catvāriṃśac caturviṃśat pratisaṃkhyāya tattvataḥ saṃkhyā sahasrakṛtyā tu nistattvaḥ pañcaviṃśakaḥ  BrP pañcaviṃśat prabuddhātmā budhyamāna iti śrutaḥ yadā budhyati ātmānaṃ tadā bhavati kevalaḥ  BrP samyagdarśanam etāvad bhāṣitaṃ tava tattvataḥ evam etad vijānantaḥ sāmyatāṃ pratiyānty uta  BrP samyaṅnidarśanaṃ nāma pratyakṣaṃ prakṛtes tathā guṇavattvād yathaitāni nirguṇebhyas tathā bhavet  BrP na tv evaṃ vartamānānām āvṛttir vartate punaḥ vidyate kṣarabhāvaś ca na parasparam avyayam  BrP paśyanty amatayo ye na samyak teṣu ca darśanam te vyaktiṃ pratipadyante punaḥ punar ariṃdama  BrP sarvam etad vijānanto na sarvasya prabodhanāt vyaktibhūtā bhaviṣyanti vyaktasyaivānuvartanāt  BrP sarvam avyaktam ity uktam asarvaḥ pañcaviṃśakaḥ ya evam abhijānanti na bhayaṃ teṣu vidyate  BrP vasiṣṭha uvāca sāṃkhyadarśanam etāvad uktaṃ te nṛpasattama vidyāvidye tv idānīṃ me tvaṃ nibodhānupūrvaśaḥ  BrP abhedyam āhur avyaktaṃ sargapralayadharmiṇaḥ sargapralaya ity uktaṃ vidyāvidye ca viṃśakaḥ  BrP parasparasya vidyā vai tan nibodhānupūrvaśaḥ yathoktam ṛṣibhis tāta sāṃkhyasyātinidarśanam  BrP karmendriyāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ vidyā buddhīndriyaṃ smṛtam buddhīndriyāṇāṃ ca tathā viśeṣā iti naḥ śrutam  BrP viṣayāṇāṃ manas teṣāṃ vidyām āhur manīṣiṇaḥ manasaḥ pañca bhūtāni vidyā ity abhicakṣate  BrP ahaṃkāras tu bhūtānāṃ pañcānāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ ahaṃkāras tathā vidyā buddhir vidyā nareśvara  BrP buddhyā prakṛtir avyaktaṃ tattvānāṃ parameśvaraḥ vidyā jñeyā naraśreṣṭha vidhiś ca paramaḥ smṛtaḥ  BrP avyaktam aparaṃ prāhur vidyā vai pañcaviṃśakaḥ sarvasya sarvam ity uktaṃ jñeyajñānasya pāragaḥ  BrP jñānam avyaktam ity uktaṃ jñeyaṃ vai pañcaviṃśakam tathaiva jñānam avyaktaṃ vijñātā pañcaviṃśakaḥ  BrP vidyāvidye tu tattvena mayokte vai viśeṣataḥ akṣaraṃ ca kṣaraṃ caiva yad uktaṃ tan nibodha me  BrP ubhāv etau kṣarāv uktau ubhāv etāv anakṣarau kāraṇaṃ tu pravakṣyāmi yathājñānaṃ tu jñānataḥ  BrP anādinidhanāv etau ubhāv eveśvarau matau tattvasaṃjñāv ubhāv eva procyete jñānacintakaiḥ  BrP sargapralayadharmitvād avyaktaṃ prāhur avyayam tad etad guṇasargāya vikurvāṇaṃ punaḥ punaḥ  BrP guṇānāṃ mahadādīnām utpadyati parasparam adhiṣṭhānaṃ kṣetram āhur etad vai pañcaviṃśakam  BrP yad antarguṇajālaṃ tu tad vyaktātmani saṃkṣipet tad ahaṃ tad guṇais tais tu pañcaviṃśe vilīyate  BrP guṇā guṇeṣu līyante tad ekā prakṛtir bhavet kṣetrajño pi tadā tāvat kṣetrajñaḥ saṃpraṇīyate  BrP yadākṣaraṃ prakṛtir yaṃ gacchate guṇasaṃjñitā nirguṇatvaṃ ca vai dehe guṇeṣu parivartanāt  BrP evam eva ca kṣetrajñaḥ kṣetrajñānaparikṣayāt prakṛtyā nirguṇas tv eṣa ity evam anuśuśruma  BrP kṣaro bhavaty eṣa yadā guṇavatī guṇeṣv atha prakṛtiṃ tv atha jānāti nirguṇatvaṃ tathātmanaḥ  BrP tathā viśuddho bhavati prakṛteḥ parivarjanāt anyo ham anyeyam iti yadā budhyati buddhimān  BrP tadaiṣo vyathatām eti na ca miśratvam āvrajet prakṛtyā caiṣa rājendra miśro nyo nyasya dṛśyate  BrP yadā tu guṇajālaṃ tat prākṛtaṃ vijugupsate paśyate ca paraṃ paśyaṃs tadā paśyan nu saṃsṛjet  BrP kiṃ mayā kṛtam etāvad yo haṃ kālanimajjanaḥ yathā matsyo hy abhijñānād anuvartitavāñ jalam  BrP aham eva hi saṃmohād anyam anyaṃ janāj janam matsyo yathodakajñānād anuvartitavān iha  BrP matsyo nyatvam athājñānād udakān nābhimanyate ātmānaṃ tad avajñānād anyaṃ caiva na vedmy aham  BrP mamāstu dhik kubuddhasya yo haṃ magna imaṃ punaḥ anuvartitavān mohād anyam anyaṃ janāj janam  BrP ayam anubhaved bandhur anena saha me kṣayam sāmyam ekatvatāṃ yāto yādṛśas tādṛśas tv aham  BrP tulyatām iha paśyāmi sadṛśo ham anena vai ayaṃ hi vimalo vyaktam aham īdṛśakas tadā  BrP yo ham ajñānasaṃmohād ajñayā saṃpravṛttavān saṃsargād atisaṃsargāt sthitaḥ kālam imaṃ tv aham  BrP so ham evaṃ vaśībhūtaḥ kālam etaṃ na buddhavān uttamādhamamadhyānāṃ tām ahaṃ katham āvase  BrP samānamāyayā ceha sahavāsam ahaṃ katham gacchāmy abuddhabhāvatvād ihedānīṃ sthiro bhava  BrP sahavāsaṃ na yāsyāmi kālam etaṃ vivañcanāt vañcito hy anayā yad dhi nirvikāro vikārayā  BrP na tat tadaparāddhaṃ syād aparādho hy ayaṃ mama yo ham atrābhavaṃ saktaḥ parāṅmukham upasthitaḥ  BrP tato smin bahurūpo tha sthito mūrtir amūrtimān amūrtiś cāpy amūrtātmā mamatvena pradharṣitaḥ  BrP prakṛtyā ca tayā tena tāsu tāsv iha yoniṣu nirmamasya mamatvena vikṛtaṃ tāsu tāsu ca  BrP yoniṣu vartamānena naṣṭasaṃjñena cetasā samatā na mayā kācid ahaṃkāre kṛtā mayā  BrP ātmānaṃ bahudhā kṛtvā so yaṃ bhūyo yunakti mām cāvyaktam etad vai pañcaviṃśakam  BrP budhyamāno bhavaty eṣa mamātmaka iti śrutaḥ anyonyapratibuddhena vadanty avyaktam acyutam  BrP avyaktabodhanāc caiva budhyamānaṃ vadanty uta pañcaviṃśaṃ BrPbāyuś ca kīrtiṃ ca tapaś ca dharmaṃ BrPcdharmeṇa mokṣaṃ labhate manuṣyaḥ BrPddharmo tra mātāpitarau narasya BrPadharmaḥ sakhā cātra pare ca loke BrPbtrātā ca dharmas tv iha mokṣadaś ca BrPcdharmād ṛte nāsti tu kiṃcid eva BrPdidaṃ rahasyaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ ca purāṇaṃ vedasaṃmitam na deyaṃ duṣṭamataye nāstikāya viśeṣataḥ  BrP idaṃ mayoktaṃ pravaraṃ purāṇaṃ BrPapāpāpahaṃ dharmavivardhanaṃ ca BrPbśrutaṃ bhavadbhiḥ paramaṃ rahasyam BrPcājñāpayadhvaṃ munayo vrajāmi BrPd
